# <a name="sensitive-information-type-entity-definitions"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-104">敏感信息类型属性定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-104">Sensitive information type entity definitions</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="088e4-105">合规性中心 (DLP) 中的数据丢失防护包括许多准备好用于 DLP 策略的敏感信息类型。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-105">Data loss prevention (DLP) in the Compliance Center includes many sensitive information types that are ready to use in your DLP policies.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="088e4-106">本文列出了所有这些敏感信息类型，并显示了 DLP 策略在检测到每种类型时查找的信息。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-106">This article lists all of these sensitive information types and shows what a DLP policy looks for when it detects each type.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="088e4-107">敏感信息类型通过正则表达式或函数可以识别的模式定义。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-107">A sensitive information type is defined by a pattern that can be identified by a regular expression or a function.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="088e4-108">确证性证据（如关键字和校验和）可用于标识敏感信息类型。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-108">Corroborative evidence, like keywords and checksums, can be used to identify a sensitive information type.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="088e4-109">可信度和相似度也会在评估过程中使用。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-109">Confidence level and proximity are also used in the evaluation process.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="088e4-110">敏感信息类型需要以下订阅之一：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-110">Sensitive information types require one of these subscriptions:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-111">Microsoft 365 E3</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-111">Microsoft 365 E3</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-112">Microsoft 365 E5</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-112">Microsoft 365 E5</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="088e4-113">敏感信息类型用于：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-113">Sensitive information types are used in:</span></span>

- [<span data-ttu-id="088e4-117">通信合规性</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-117">Communication compliance</span></span>](communication-compliance.md)
- [<span data-ttu-id="088e4-118">自动标记策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-118">Auto-labelling policies</span></span>](apply-sensitivity-label-automatically.md#how-to-configure-auto-labeling-for-office-apps)

## <a name="aba-routing-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-119">ABA 路由号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-119">ABA routing number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-120">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-120">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="088e4-121">9 个数字，可能采用格式化或无格式模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-121">nine digits that may be in a formatted or unformatted pattern</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-122">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-122">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="088e4-123">格式化：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-123">Formatted:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-124">四个数字，以 0、1、2、3、6、7 或 8 开头</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-124">four digits beginning with 0, 1, 2, 3, 6, 7, or 8</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-125">连字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-125">a hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-126">四个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-126">four digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-127">连字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-127">a hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-128">一个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-128">a digit</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="088e4-129">无格式：九个以 0、1、2、3、6、7 或 8 开头的连续数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-129">Unformatted: nine consecutive digits beginning with 0, 1, 2, 3, 6, 7, or 8</span></span> 

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-130">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-130">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="088e4-131">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-131">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-132">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-132">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="088e4-133">如果策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，则策略具有中等可信度：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-133">A policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-134">函数 Func_aba_routing 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-134">The function Func_aba_routing finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-135">找到 Keyword_ABA_Routing 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-135">A keyword from Keyword_ABA_Routing is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="088e4-136">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，置信度较低：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-136">A DLP policy has low confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-137">函数 Func_aba_routing 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-137">The function Func_aba_routing finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
    <!-- ABA Routing Number -->
    <Entity id="cb353f78-2b72-4c3c-8827-92ebe4f69fdf" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_aba_routing" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_ABA_Routing" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_aba_routing" />
      </Pattern>
    </Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-143">abarouting#</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-143">abarouting#</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-147">bankrouting#</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-147">bankrouting#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-148">bankroutingnumber</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-148">bankroutingnumber</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-150">routing no</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-150">routing no</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-151">路由号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-151">routing number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-152">routing transit number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-152">routing transit number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-153">routing#</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-153">routing#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-154">RTN</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-154">RTN</span></span>


## <a name="argentina-national-identity-dni-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-155">阿根廷国家/ (DNI) 号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-155">Argentina national identity (DNI) number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-156">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-156">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="088e4-157">带或不带句号的八个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-157">Eight digits with or without periods</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-158">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-158">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="088e4-159">八个数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-159">Eight digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-160">两个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-160">two digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-161">可选时间段</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-161">an optional period</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-162">三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-162">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-163">可选时间段</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-163">an optional period</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-164">三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-164">three digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-165">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-165">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="088e4-166">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-166">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-167">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-167">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="088e4-168">在 300 个字符的邻近度内，DLP 策略具有中等可信度，即检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-168">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-169">正则表达式 Regex_argentina_national_id 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-169">The regular expression Regex_argentina_national_id finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-170">找到 Keyword_argentina_national_id 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-170">A keyword from Keyword_argentina_national_id is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Argentina National Identity (DNI) Number -->
<Entity id="eefbb00e-8282-433c-8620-8f1da3bffdb2" recommendedConfidence="75" patternsProximity="300">
   <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
      <IdMatch idRef="Regex_argentina_national_id"/>
      <Match idRef="Keyword_argentina_national_id"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

#### <a name="keyword_argentina_national_id"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-172">Keyword_argentina_national_id</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-172">Keyword_argentina_national_id</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-176">dni</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-176">dni</span></span>

## <a name="australia-bank-account-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-182">澳大利亚银行帐号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-182">Australia bank account number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-183">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-183">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="088e4-184">包含或不带银行省/市/县分支机构号码的六到十个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-184">six to ten digits with or without a bank state branch number</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-185">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-185">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="088e4-186">帐号为 6 到 10 位数。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-186">Account number is 6 to 10 digits.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="088e4-187">澳大利亚银行州级分部编号：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-187">Australia bank state branch number:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-188">三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-188">three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-189">连字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-189">a hyphen</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-190">三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-190">three digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-191">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-191">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="088e4-192">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-192">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-193">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-193">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="088e4-194">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-194">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-195">正则表达式Regex_australia_bank_account_number查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-195">The regular expression Regex_australia_bank_account_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-196">找到 Keyword_australia_bank_account_number 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-196">A keyword from Keyword_australia_bank_account_number is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-197">正则表达式 Regex_australia_bank_account_number_bsb 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-197">The regular expression Regex_australia_bank_account_number_bsb finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="088e4-198">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-198">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-199">正则表达式Regex_australia_bank_account_number查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-199">The regular expression Regex_australia_bank_account_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-200">找到 Keyword_australia_bank_account_number 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-200">A keyword from Keyword_australia_bank_account_number is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Australia Bank Account Number -->
<Entity id="74a54de9-2a30-4aa0-a8aa-3d9327fc07c7" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_australia_bank_account_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_australia_bank_account_number" />
        <Match idRef="Regex_australia_bank_account_number_bsb" />
  </Pattern>
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_australia_bank_account_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_australia_bank_account_number" />
  </Pattern>
 </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-201">关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-201">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_australia_bank_account_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-202">Keyword_australia_bank_account_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-202">Keyword_australia_bank_account_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-203">swift bank code</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-203">swift bank code</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-204">correspondent bank</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-204">correspondent bank</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-205">base currency</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-205">base currency</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-206">usa account</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-206">usa account</span></span>

## <a name="australia-business-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-216">澳大利亚商务号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-216">Australia business number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="088e4-217">此敏感信息类型仅适用于：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-217">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-218">数据丢失防护策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-218">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-219">通信合规性策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-219">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-220">信息治理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-220">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-221">记录管理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-221">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-222">Microsoft 云应用安全</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-222">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>


### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-223">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-223">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="088e4-224">带可选分隔符的 11 个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-224">11 digits with optional delimiters</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-225">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-225">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="088e4-226">带可选分隔符的 11 个数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-226">11 digits with optional delimiters:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-227">两个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-227">two digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-228">可选连字符或空格</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-228">an optional hyphen or space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-229">三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-229">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-230">可选连字符或空格</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-230">an optional hyphen or space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-231">三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-231">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-232">可选连字符或空格</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-232">an optional hyphen or space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-233">三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-233">three digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-234">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-234">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="088e4-235">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-235">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-236">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-236">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="088e4-237">在 300 个字符的邻近度内，DLP 策略可高可信度地检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-237">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-238">该函数Func_australian_business_number查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-238">The function Func_australian_business_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-239">找到来自Keywords_australian_business_number关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-239">A keyword from Keywords_australian_business_number is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="088e4-240">在 300 个字符的邻近度内，DLP 策略具有中等可信度，即检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-240">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-241">该函数Func_australian_business_number查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-241">The function Func_australian_business_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Australia Business Number -->
      <Entity id="76e83b3b-01ee-4530-aced-e667a6609f49" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_australian_business_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_australian_business_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_australian_business_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="australia-company-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-251">澳大利亚公司编号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-251">Australia company number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="088e4-252">此敏感信息类型仅适用于：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-252">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-253">数据丢失防护策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-253">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-254">通信合规性策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-254">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-255">信息治理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-255">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-256">记录管理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-256">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-257">Microsoft 云应用安全</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-257">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-258">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-258">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="088e4-259">带分隔符的九个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-259">nine digits with delimiters</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-260">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-260">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="088e4-261">带分隔符的九个数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-261">nine digits with delimiters:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-262">三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-262">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-263">空格</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-263">a space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-264">三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-264">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-265">空格</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-265">a space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-266">三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-266">three digits</span></span>


### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-267">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-267">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="088e4-268">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-268">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-269">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-269">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="088e4-270">在 300 个字符的邻近度内，DLP 策略可高可信度地检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-270">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-271">该函数Func_Australian_Company_Number查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-271">The function Func_Australian_Company_Number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-272">找到搜索Keyword_Australian_Company_Number关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-272">A keyword from Keyword_Australian_Company_Number is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="088e4-273">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，置信度较低：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-273">A DLP policy has low confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-274">该函数Func_Australian_Company_Number查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-274">The function Func_Australian_Company_Number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Australia Company Number -->
      <Entity id="b1fba4f7-7b3e-4bb9-8f9a-9366df604dbb" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_Australian_Company_Number" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_Australian_Company_Number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_Australian_Company_Number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

#### <a name="keyword_australia_company_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-276">Keyword_australia_company_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-276">Keyword_australia_company_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-277">can</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-277">acn</span></span>

## <a name="australia-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-284">澳大利亚驾驶证号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-284">Australia driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-285">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-285">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="088e4-286">九个字母和数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-286">nine letters and digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-287">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-287">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="088e4-288">九个字母和数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-288">nine letters and digits:</span></span> 

- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-289">两个数字或字母 (不区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-289">two digits or letters (not case-sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-290">两个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-290">two digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-291">五个数字或字母 (不区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-291">five digits or letters (not case-sensitive)</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="088e4-292">或</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-292">OR</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-293">一到两个可选字母 (不区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-293">one to two optional letters (not case-sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-294">四到九个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-294">four to nine digits</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="088e4-295">或</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-295">OR</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-296">九个数字或字母 (不区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-296">nine digits or letters (not case-sensitive)</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-297">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-297">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="088e4-298">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-298">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-299">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-299">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="088e4-300">在 300 个字符的邻近度内，DLP 策略具有中等可信度，即检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-300">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-301">正则表达式 Regex_australia_drivers_license_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-301">The regular expression Regex_australia_drivers_license_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-302">找到 Keyword_australia_drivers_license_number 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-302">A keyword from Keyword_australia_drivers_license_number is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-303">未找到 Keyword_australia_drivers_license_number_exclusions 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-303">No keyword from Keyword_australia_drivers_license_number_exclusions is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Australia Drivers License Number -->
<Entity id="1cbbc8f5-9216-4392-9eb5-5ac2298d1356" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
   <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_australia_drivers_license_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_australia_drivers_license_number" />
        <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_australia_drivers_license_number_exclusions" />
        </Any>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="australia-medical-account-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-403">澳大利亚医疗帐号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-403">Australia medical account number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-404">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-404">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="088e4-405">10-11 个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-405">10-11 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-406">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-406">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="088e4-407">10-11 个数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-407">10-11 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-408">第一个数字的范围为 2-6</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-408">1st digit is in the range 2-6</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-409">第 9 个数字是一个检查数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-409">9th digit is a check digit</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-410">第 10 个数字是问题数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-410">10th digit is the issue digit</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-411">第 11 个数字 (可选) 为个人号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-411">11th digit (optional) is the individual number</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-412">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-412">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="088e4-413">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-413">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-414">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-414">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="088e4-415">在 300 个字符的邻近度内，DLP 策略可高可信度地检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-415">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-416">函数 Func_australian_medical_account_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-416">The function Func_australian_medical_account_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-417">找到 Keyword_Australia_Medical_Account_Number 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-417">A keyword from Keyword_Australia_Medical_Account_Number is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-418">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-418">The checksum passes.</span></span>


```xml
  <!-- Australia Medical Account Number -->
<Entity id="104a99a0-3d3b-4542-a40d-ab0b9e1efe63" recommendedConfidence="85" patternsProximity="300">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_australian_medical_account_number"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_Australia_Medical_Account_Number"/>
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-419">关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-419">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_australia_medical_account_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-420">Keyword_Australia_Medical_Account_Number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-420">Keyword_Australia_Medical_Account_Number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-421">bank account details</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-421">bank account details</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-422">medicare payments</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-422">medicare payments</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-423">mortgage account</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-423">mortgage account</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-424">bank payments</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-424">bank payments</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-425">information branch</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-425">information branch</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-426">credit card loan</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-426">credit card loan</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-427">department of human services</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-427">department of human services</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-428">local service</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-428">local service</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-429">一</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-429">medicare</span></span>

   
## <a name="australia-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-430">澳大利亚护照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-430">Australia passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-431">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-431">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="088e4-432">一个字母后跟七个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-432">A letter followed by seven digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-433">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-433">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="088e4-434">字母 (区分大小写) 后跟七个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-434">A letter (not case-sensitive) followed by seven digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-435">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-435">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="088e4-436">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-436">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-437">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-437">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="088e4-438">在 300 个字符的邻近度内，DLP 策略具有中等可信度，即检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-438">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-439">正则表达式 Regex_australia_passport_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-439">The regular expression Regex_australia_passport_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-440">找到来自Keyword_passport或Keyword_australia_passport_number关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-440">A keyword from Keyword_passport or Keyword_australia_passport_number is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Australia Passport Number -->
<Entity id="29869db6-602d-4853-ab93-3484f905df50" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_australia_passport_number" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_passport" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_australia_passport_number" />
        </Any>
   </Pattern>
</Entity>   
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-441">关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-441">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_passport"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-442">Keyword_passport</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-442">Keyword_passport</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-443">Passport Number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-443">Passport Number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-444">Passport No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-444">Passport No</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-445">Passport #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-445">Passport #</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-446">Passport#</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-446">Passport#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-447">PassportID</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-447">PassportID</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-448">Passportno</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-448">Passportno</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-449">passportnumber</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-449">passportnumber</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-450">パスポート</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-450">パスポート</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-451">パスポート番号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-451">パスポート番号</span></span>

## <a name="australia-tax-file-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-474">澳大利亚税务文件编号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-474">Australia tax file number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-475">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-475">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="088e4-476">八到九个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-476">eight to nine digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-477">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-477">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="088e4-478">8 到 9 个数字通常显示空格，如下所示：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-478">eight to nine digits typically presented with spaces as follows:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-479">三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-479">three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-480">可选空格</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-480">an optional space</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-481">三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-481">three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-482">可选空格</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-482">an optional space</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-483">两到三个数字，其中最后一个数字是一个检查数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-483">two to three digits where the last digit is a check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-484">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-484">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="088e4-485">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-485">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-486">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-486">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="088e4-487">在 300 个字符的邻近度内，DLP 策略可高可信度地检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-487">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-488">函数 Func_australian_tax_file_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-488">The function Func_australian_tax_file_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-489">未找到 Keyword_Australia_Tax_File_Number 或 Keyword_number_exclusions 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-489">No keyword from Keyword_Australia_Tax_File_Number or Keyword_number_exclusions is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-490">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-490">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
   <!-- Australia Tax File Number -->
    <Entity id="e29bc95f-ff70-4a37-aa01-04d17360a4c5" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_australian_tax_file_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_Australia_Tax_File_Number" />
      </Pattern>
    </Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-495">medicare levy</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-495">medicare levy</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-496">portfolio number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-496">portfolio number</span></span>

## <a name="austria-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-502">奥地利驾驶证号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-502">Austria driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-503">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-503">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="088e4-504">八个数字，不带空格和分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-504">eight digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-505">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-505">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="088e4-506">八个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-506">eight digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-507">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-507">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="088e4-508">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-508">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-509">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-509">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="088e4-510">在 300 个字符的邻近度内，DLP 策略具有中等可信度，即检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-510">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-511">正则表达式查找  `Regex_austria_eu_driver's_license_number` 与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-511">The regular expression  `Regex_austria_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-512">找到或  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` 找到 `Keywords_austria_eu_driver's_license_number` 的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-512">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_austria_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Austria Driver's License Number -->
      <Entity id="682f18ce-44eb-482b-8198-2bcb96a0761e" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_austria_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_austria_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="austria-identity-card"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-639">奥地利身份证</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-639">Austria identity card</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="088e4-640">此敏感信息类型仅适用于：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-640">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-641">数据丢失防护策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-641">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-642">通信合规性策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-642">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-643">信息治理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-643">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-644">记录管理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-644">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-645">Microsoft 云应用安全</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-645">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-646">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-646">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="088e4-647">字母、数字和特殊字符的 24 个字符组合</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-647">A 24-character combination of letters, digits, and special characters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-648">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-648">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="088e4-649">24 个字符：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-649">24 characters:</span></span>
  
-  <span data-ttu-id="088e4-650">22 个字母 (不区分大小写) 数字、反斜杠、正斜杠或加号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-650">22 letters (not case-sensitive), digits, backslashes, forward slashes, or plus signs</span></span> 
    
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-651">两个字母 (不区分大小写) 、数字、反斜杠、正斜杠、加号或等号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-651">two letters (not case-sensitive), digits, backslashes, forward slashes, plus signs, or equal signs</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-652">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-652">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="088e4-653">不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-653">Not applicable</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-654">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-654">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="088e4-655">在 300 个字符的邻近度内，DLP 策略具有中等可信度，即检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-655">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-656">正则表达式查找  `Regex_austria_eu_national_id_card` 与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-656">The regular expression  `Regex_austria_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-657">找到一个  `Keywords_austria_eu_national_id_card` 关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-657">A keyword from  `Keywords_austria_eu_national_id_card` is found.</span></span> 
   
```xml
      <!-- Austria Identity Card -->
      <Entity id="5ec06c3b-007e-4820-8343-7ff73b889735" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_austria_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_austria_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-658">关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-658">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keywords_austria_eu_national_id_card"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-659">Keywords_austria_eu_national_id_card</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-659">Keywords_austria_eu_national_id_card</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-660">标识号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-660">identity number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-661">national id</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-661">national id</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-662">personalausichsich österreich</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-662">personalausweis republik österreich</span></span>

## <a name="austria-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-663">奥地利护照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-663">Austria passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-664">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-664">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="088e4-665">一个字母后跟一个可选空格和七个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-665">One letter followed by an optional space and seven digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-666">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-666">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="088e4-667">一个字母、七个数字和一个空格的组合：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-667">A combination of one letter, seven digits, and one space:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-668">一个字母 (不区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-668">one letter (not case-sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-669">一个 (可选) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-669">one space (optional)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-670">七个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-670">seven digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-671">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-671">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="088e4-672">不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-672">not applicable</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-673">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-673">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="088e4-674">在 300 个字符的邻近度内，DLP 策略可高可信度地检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-674">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-675">正则表达式查找  `Regex_austria_eu_passport_number` 与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-675">The regular expression  `Regex_austria_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-676">找到或  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` 找到 `Keywords_austria_eu_passport_number` 的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-676">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_austria_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-677">正则表达式查找 `Regex_eu_passport_date1` DD.MM.YYYY 格式的日期或找到 `Keywords_eu_passport_date` 的关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-677">The regular expression `Regex_eu_passport_date1` finds date in the format DD.MM.YYYY or a keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_date` is found</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="088e4-678">在 300 个字符的邻近度内，DLP 策略具有中等可信度，即检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-678">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-679">正则表达式查找  `Regex_austria_eu_passport_number` 与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-679">The regular expression  `Regex_austria_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-680">找到或  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` 找到 `Keywords_austria_eu_passport_number` 的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-680">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_austria_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Austria Passport Number -->
      <Entity id="1c96ae4e-303b-447d-86c7-77113ac266bf" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_austria_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_austria_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Regex_eu_passport_date1" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_date" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_austria_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_austria_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-694">reisepassnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-694">reisepassnummer</span></span>

## <a name="austria-social-security-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-701">奥地利社会保险号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-701">Austria social security number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-702">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-702">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="088e4-703">10 个数字，采用指定格式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-703">10 digits in the specified format</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-704">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-704">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="088e4-705">10 个数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-705">10 digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-706">对应于序列号的三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-706">three digits that correspond to a serial number</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-707">一个检查数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-707">one check digit</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-708">对应于 DD.2016 (日期的六个数字) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-708">six digits that correspond to the birth date (DDMMYY)</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-709">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-709">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="088e4-710">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-710">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-711">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-711">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="088e4-712">在 300 个字符的邻近度内，DLP 策略可高可信度地检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-712">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-713">该  `Func_austria_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` 函数查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-713">The function  `Func_austria_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-714">找到一个  `Keywords_austria_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` 关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-714">a keyword from  `Keywords_austria_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="088e4-715">在 300 个字符的邻近度内，DLP 策略具有中等可信度，即检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-715">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-716">该  `Func_austria_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` 函数查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-716">The function  `Func_austria_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Austria Social Security Number -->
      <Entity id="6896a906-86c9-4d19-a2da-6e43ccd19b7b" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_austria_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_austria_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_austria_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
          <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_austria_eu_telephone_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_austria_eu_mobile_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="austria-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-742">奥地利税务标识号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-742">Austria tax identification number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-743">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-743">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="088e4-744">带可选连字符和正斜杠的九个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-744">nine digits with optional hyphen and forward slash</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-745">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-745">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="088e4-746">带可选连字符和正斜杠的九个数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-746">nine digits with optional hyphen and forward slash:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-747">两个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-747">two digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-748">可选连字符 (可选) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-748">a hyphen (optional)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-749">三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-749">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-750">可选 (斜杠) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-750">a forward slash (optional)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-751">四个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-751">four digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-752">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-752">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="088e4-753">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-753">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-754">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-754">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="088e4-755">在 300 个字符的邻近度内，DLP 策略可高可信度地检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-755">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-756">该  `Func_austria_eu_tax_file_number` 函数查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-756">The function  `Func_austria_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-757">找到一个  `Keywords_austria_eu_tax_file_number` 关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-757">A keyword from  `Keywords_austria_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="088e4-758">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，置信度较低：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-758">A DLP policy has low confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-759">该  `Func_austria_eu_tax_file_number` 函数查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-759">The function  `Func_austria_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Austria Tax Identification Number -->
      <Entity id="4fd58d22-af28-4451-b18a-6f722430a56d" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_austria_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_austria_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_austria_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="austria-value-added-tax"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-782">奥地利增值税</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-782">Austria value added tax</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="088e4-783">此敏感信息类型仅适用于：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-783">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-784">数据丢失防护策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-784">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-785">通信合规性策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-785">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-786">信息治理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-786">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-787">记录管理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-787">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-788">Microsoft 云应用安全</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-788">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-789">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-789">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="088e4-790">11 个字符字母数字模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-790">11-character alphanumeric pattern</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-791">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-791">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="088e4-792">11 个字符字母数字模式：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-792">11-character alphanumeric pattern:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-793">A 或 a</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-793">A or a</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-794">T 或 t</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-794">T or t</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-795">可选空间</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-795">Optional space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-796">U 或 u</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-796">U or u</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-797">可选空间</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-797">optional space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-798">两个或三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-798">two or three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-799">可选空间</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-799">optional space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-800">四个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-800">four digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-801">可选空间</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-801">optional space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-802">一个或两个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-802">one or two digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-803">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-803">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="088e4-804">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-804">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-805">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-805">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="088e4-806">在 300 个字符的邻近度内，DLP 策略可高可信度地检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-806">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-807">该Func_Austria_Value_Added_Tax查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-807">The function Func_Austria_Value_Added_Tax finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-808">找到来自Keyword_Austria_Value_Added_Tax关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-808">A keyword from Keyword_Austria_Value_Added_Tax is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="088e4-809">在 300 个字符的邻近度内，DLP 策略具有中等可信度，即检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-809">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-810">该Func_Austria_Value_Added_Tax查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-810">The function Func_Austria_Value_Added_Tax finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Austria Value Added Tax -->
      <Entity id="b6a3eda2-c56c-4b69-a5f7-dca34db00f48" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_Austria_Value_Added_Tax" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_Austria_Value_Added_Tax" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_Austria_Value_Added_Tax" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="azure-documentdb-auth-key"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-828">Azure DocumentDB 身份验证密钥</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-828">Azure DocumentDB auth key</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-829">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-829">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="088e4-830">字符串"DocumentDb"后跟下面模式中列出的字符和字符串。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-830">The string "DocumentDb" followed by the characters and strings outlined in the pattern below.</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-831">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-831">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-832">字符串"DocumentDb"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-832">The string "DocumentDb"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-833">3-200 位小写字母或大写字母、数字、符号、特殊字符或空格之间的任意组合</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-833">Any combination of between 3-200 lower- or uppercase letters, digits, symbols, special characters, or spaces</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-834">大于符号 (>) 、等号 (=) 、引号 (") 或撇号 (') </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-834">A greater than symbol (>), an equal sign (=), a quotation mark ("), or an apostrophe (')</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-835">86 个小写字母或大写字母、数字、正斜杠 (/) 或加号 (+) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-835">Any combination of 86 lower- or uppercase letters, digits, forward slash (/), or plus sign (+)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-836">两个等号 (=) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-836">Two equal signs (=)</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-837">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-837">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="088e4-838">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-838">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-839">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-839">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="088e4-840">在 300 个字符的邻近度内，DLP 策略可高可信度地检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-840">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-841">正则表达式CEP_Regex_AzureDocumentDBAuthKey查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-841">The regular expression CEP_Regex_AzureDocumentDBAuthKey finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-842">正则表达式CEP_CommonExampleKeywords找不到与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-842">The regular expression CEP_CommonExampleKeywords doesn't find content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Azure Document DB Auth Key -->
<Entity id="0f587d92-eb28-44a9-bd1c-90f2892b47aa" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="CEP_Regex_AzureDocumentDBAuthKey" />
        <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="CEP_CommonExampleKeywords" />
          </Any>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="azure-iaas-database-connection-string-and-azure-sql-connection-string"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-857">Azure IAAS 数据库连接字符串和 Azure SQL连接字符串</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-857">Azure IAAS database connection string and Azure SQL connection string</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-858">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-858">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="088e4-859">字符串"Server"、"server"或"data source"后跟以下模式中列出的字符和字符串，包括字符串"cloudapp.azure"。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-859">The string "Server", "server", or "data source" followed by the characters and strings outlined in the pattern below, including the string "cloudapp.azure.</span></span><!--no-hyperlink--><span data-ttu-id="088e4-860">com"或"cloudapp.azure"。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-860">com" or "cloudapp.azure.</span></span><!--no-hyperlink--><span data-ttu-id="088e4-861">net"或"database.windows"。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-861">net" or "database.windows.</span></span><!--no-hyperlink--><span data-ttu-id="088e4-862">net"，字符串"Password"或"password"或"pwd"。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-862">net", and the string "Password" or "password" or "pwd".</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-863">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-863">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-864">字符串"Server"、"server"或"data source"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-864">the string "Server", "server", or "data source"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-865">零到两个空格字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-865">zero to two whitespace characters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-866">等号 (=) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-866">an equal sign (=)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-867">零到两个空格字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-867">zero to two whitespace characters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-868">1-200 位小写字母或大写字母、数字、符号、特殊字符或空格之间的任意组合</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-868">any combination of between 1-200 lower- or uppercase letters, digits, symbols, special characters, or spaces</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-869">字符串"cloudapp.azure"。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-869">The string "cloudapp.azure.</span></span><!--no-hyperlink--><span data-ttu-id="088e4-870">com"、"cloudapp.azure"。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-870">com", "cloudapp.azure.</span></span><!--no-hyperlink--><span data-ttu-id="088e4-871">net"或"database.windows"。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-871">net", or "database.windows.</span></span><!--no-hyperlink--><span data-ttu-id="088e4-872">net"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-872">net"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-873">1-300 位小写字母或大写字母、数字、符号、特殊字符或空格之间的任意组合</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-873">any combination of between 1-300 lower- or uppercase letters, digits, symbols, special characters, or spaces</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-874">字符串"Password"、"password"或"pwd"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-874">the string "Password", "password", or "pwd"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-875">零到两个空格字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-875">zero to two whitespace characters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-876">等号 (=) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-876">an equal sign (=)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-877">零到两个空格字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-877">zero to two whitespace characters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-878">一个或多个不是分号 (;) 、引号 (") 或撇 (字符) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-878">one or more characters that aren't a semicolon (;), quotation mark ("), or apostrophe (')</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-879">a semicolon (;) ， quotation mark (") ， or apostrophe (') </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-879">a semicolon (;), quotation mark ("), or apostrophe (')</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-880">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-880">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="088e4-881">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-881">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-882">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-882">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="088e4-883">在 300 个字符的邻近度内，DLP 策略可高可信度地检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-883">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-884">正则表达式CEP_Regex_AzureConnectionString查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-884">The regular expression CEP_Regex_AzureConnectionString finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-885">正则表达式CEP_CommonExampleKeywords找不到与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-885">The regular expression CEP_CommonExampleKeywords doesn't find content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
<!--Azure IAAS Database Connection String and Azure SQL Connection String-->
<Entity id="ce1a126d-186f-4700-8c0c-486157b953fd" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="CEP_Regex_AzureConnectionString" />
        <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="CEP_CommonExampleKeywords" />
        </Any>
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-915">等号 (=) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-915">an equal sign (=)</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="088e4-920">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-920">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-921">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-921">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="088e4-922">在 300 个字符的邻近度内，DLP 策略可高可信度地检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-922">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-923">正则表达式CEP_Regex_AzureIoTConnectionString查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-923">The regular expression CEP_Regex_AzureIoTConnectionString finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-924">正则表达式CEP_CommonExampleKeywords找不到与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-924">The regular expression CEP_CommonExampleKeywords doesn't find content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
<!--Azure IoT Connection String-->
<Entity id="0b34bec3-d5d6-4974-b7b0-dcdb5c90c29d" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="CEP_Regex_AzureIoTConnectionString" />
        <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="CEP_CommonExampleKeywords" />
        </Any>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-950">正则表达式CEP_Regex_AzurePublishSettingPasswords查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-950">The regular expression CEP_Regex_AzurePublishSettingPasswords finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-951">正则表达式CEP_CommonExampleKeywords找不到与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-951">The regular expression CEP_CommonExampleKeywords doesn't find content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

<Entity id="75f4cc8a-a68e-49e5-89ce-fa8f03d286a5" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
       <IdMatch idRef="CEP_Regex_AzurePublishSettingPasswords" />
       <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
           <Match idRef="CEP_CommonExampleKeywords" />
       </Any>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
