## <a name="azure-redis-cache-connection-string"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-966">Azure Redis 缓存连接字符串</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-966">Azure Redis cache connection string</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-967">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-967">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="088e4-968">字符串"redis.cache.windows"。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-968">The string "redis.cache.windows.</span></span><!--no-hyperlink--><span data-ttu-id="088e4-969">net"后跟以下模式中列出的字符和字符串，包括字符串"password"或"pwd"。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-969">net" followed by the characters and strings outlined in the pattern below, including the string "password" or "pwd".</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-970">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-970">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-971">字符串"redis.cache.windows"。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-971">the string "redis.cache.windows.</span></span><!--no-hyperlink--><span data-ttu-id="088e4-972">net"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-972">net"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-973">1-200 位小写字母或大写字母、数字、符号、特殊字符或空格之间的任意组合</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-973">any combination of between 1-200 lower- or uppercase letters, digits, symbols, special characters, or spaces</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-974">字符串"password"或"pwd"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-974">the string "password" or "pwd"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-975">零到两个空格字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-975">zero to two whitespace characters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-976">等号 (=) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-976">an equal sign (=)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-977">零到两个空格字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-977">zero to two whitespace characters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-978">43 个字符的任意组合，即小写或大写字母、数字、正斜杠 (/) 或加号 (+) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-978">any combination of 43 characters that are lower- or uppercase letters, digits, forward slash (/), or plus sign (+)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-979">等号 (=) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-979">an equal sign (=)</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-980">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-980">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="088e4-981">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-981">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-982">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-982">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="088e4-983">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-983">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-984">正则表达式CEP_Regex_AzureRedisCacheConnectionString查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-984">The regular expression CEP_Regex_AzureRedisCacheConnectionString finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-985">正则表达式CEP_CommonExampleKeywords找不到与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-985">The regular expression CEP_CommonExampleKeywords doesn't find content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
<!--Azure Redis Cache Connection String-->
<Entity id="095a7e6c-efd8-46d5-af7b-5298d53a49fc" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="CEP_Regex_AzureRedisCacheConnectionString" />
        <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="CEP_CommonExampleKeywords" />
        </Any>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-996">testacs。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-996">testacs.</span></span><!--no-hyperlink--><span data-ttu-id="088e4-997">com</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-997">com</span></span>

## <a name="azure-sas"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-1000">Azure SAS</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-1000">Azure SAS</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-1001">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-1001">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="088e4-1002">字符串"sig"后跟以下模式中列出的字符和字符串。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-1002">The string "sig" followed by the characters and strings outlined in the pattern below.</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-1003">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-1003">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-1004">字符串"sig"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-1004">the string "sig"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-1005">零到两个空格字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-1005">zero to two whitespace characters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-1006">等号 (=) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-1006">an equal sign (=)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-1007">零到两个空格字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-1007">zero to two whitespace characters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-1008">小写字母或大写字母、数字或百分号之间的 43-53 个字符的任意组合 (%) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-1008">any combination of between 43-53 characters that are lower- or uppercase letters, digits, or the percent sign (%)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-1009">字符串"%3d"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-1009">the string "%3d"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-1010">不是小写或大写字母、数字或百分号的任何字符 (%) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-1010">any character that isn't a lower- or uppercase letter, digit, or percent sign (%)</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-1011">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-1011">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="088e4-1012">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-1012">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-1013">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-1013">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="088e4-1014">在 300 个字符的邻近度内，DLP 策略可高可信度地检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-1014">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-1015">正则表达式CEP_Regex_AzureSAS查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-1015">The regular expression CEP_Regex_AzureSAS finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
<!--Azure SAS-->
<Entity id="4d235014-e564-47f4-a6fb-6ebb4a826834" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="CEP_Regex_AzureSAS" />
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="azure-service-bus-connection-string"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-1016">Azure 服务总线连接字符串</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-1016">Azure service bus connection string</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-1023">等号 (=) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-1023">an equal sign (=)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-1024">零到两个空格字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-1024">zero to two whitespace characters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-1025">1-200 位小写字母或大写字母、数字、符号、特殊字符或空格之间的任意组合</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-1025">any combination of between 1-200 lower- or uppercase letters, digits, symbols, special characters, or spaces</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-1026">字符串"servicebus.windows"。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-1026">the string "servicebus.windows.</span></span><!--no-hyperlink--><span data-ttu-id="088e4-1027">net"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-1027">net"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-1028">1-200 位小写字母或大写字母、数字、符号、特殊字符或空格之间的任意组合</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-1028">any combination of between 1-200 lower- or uppercase letters, digits, symbols, special characters, or spaces</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-1029">字符串"SharedAccessKey"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-1029">the string "SharedAccessKey"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-1030">零到两个空格字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-1030">zero to two whitespace characters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-1031">等号 (=) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-1031">an equal sign (=)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-1032">零到两个空格字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-1032">zero to two whitespace characters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-1033">43 个字符的任意组合，即小写或大写字母、数字、正斜杠 (/) 或加号 (+) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-1033">any combination of 43 characters that are lower- or uppercase letters, digits, forward slash (/), or plus sign (+)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-1034">等号 (=) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-1034">an equal sign (=)</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-1035">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-1035">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="088e4-1036">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-1036">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-1037">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-1037">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="088e4-1038">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-1038">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-1039">正则表达式CEP_Regex_AzureServiceBusConnectionString查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-1039">The regular expression CEP_Regex_AzureServiceBusConnectionString finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-1040">正则表达式CEP_CommonExampleKeywords找不到与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-1040">The regular expression CEP_CommonExampleKeywords doesn't find content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
<!--Azure Service Bus Connection String-->
<Entity id="b9a6578f-a83f-4fcd-bf44-2130bae49a6f" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="CEP_Regex_AzureServiceBusConnectionString" />
        <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="CEP_CommonExampleKeywords" />
        </Any>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="azure-storage-account-key"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-1055">Azure 存储帐户密钥</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-1055">Azure storage account key</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-1056">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-1056">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="088e4-1057">字符串"DefaultEndpointsProtocol"后跟以下模式中列出的字符和字符串，包括字符串"AccountKey"。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-1057">The string "DefaultEndpointsProtocol" followed by the characters and strings outlined in the pattern below, including the string "AccountKey".</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-1058">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-1058">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-1059">字符串"DefaultEndpointsProtocol"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-1059">the string "DefaultEndpointsProtocol"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-1060">零到两个空格字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-1060">zero to two whitespace characters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-1061">等号 (=) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-1061">an equal sign (=)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-1062">零到两个空格字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-1062">zero to two whitespace characters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-1063">1-200 位小写字母或大写字母、数字、符号、特殊字符或空格之间的任意组合</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-1063">any combination of between 1-200 lower- or uppercase letters, digits, symbols, special characters, or spaces</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-1064">字符串"AccountKey"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-1064">the string "AccountKey"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-1065">零到两个空格字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-1065">zero to two whitespace characters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-1066">等号 (=) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-1066">an equal sign (=)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-1067">零到两个空格字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-1067">zero to two whitespace characters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-1068">86 个字符的任意组合，即小写或大写字母、数字、正斜杠 (/) 或加号 (+) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-1068">any combination of 86 characters that are lower- or uppercase letters, digits, forward slash (/), or plus sign (+)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-1069">两个等 (=) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-1069">two equal signs (=)</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-1070">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-1070">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="088e4-1071">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-1071">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-1072">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-1072">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="088e4-1073">在 300 个字符的邻近度内，DLP 策略可高可信度地检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-1073">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-1074">正则表达式CEP_Regex_AzureStorageAccountKey查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-1074">The regular expression CEP_Regex_AzureStorageAccountKey finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-1075">正则表达式CEP_AzureEmulatorStorageAccountFilter找不到与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-1075">The regular expression CEP_AzureEmulatorStorageAccountFilter doesn't find content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-1076">正则表达式CEP_CommonExampleKeywords找不到与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-1076">The regular expression CEP_CommonExampleKeywords doesn't find content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
<!--Azure Storage Account Key-->
<Entity id="c7bc98e8-551a-4c35-a92d-d2c8cda714a7" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="CEP_Regex_AzureStorageAccountKey" />
        <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="CEP_AzureEmulatorStorageAccountFilter" />
            <Match idRef="CEP_CommonExampleKeywords" />
        </Any>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

<span data-ttu-id="088e4-1082"> (，此敏感信息类型使用正则表达式（而不是关键字列表）标识这些关键字。) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-1082">(Technically, this sensitive information type identifies these keywords by using a regular expression, not a keyword list.)</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-1083">contoso</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-1083">contoso</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-1086">沙盒</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-1086">sandbox</span></span>

## <a name="azure-storage-account-key-generic"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-1094">Azure 存储帐户密钥 (通用) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-1094">Azure Storage account key (generic)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-1095">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-1095">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="088e4-1096">86 位小写字母或大写字母、数字、正斜杠 (/) 或加号 (+) 的任意组合，前面或后跟以下模式中列出的字符。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-1096">Any combination of 86 lower- or uppercase letters, digits, the forward slash (/), or plus sign (+), preceded or followed by the characters outlined in the pattern below.</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-1097">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-1097">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-1098">零到大于符号 (>) 、撇号 (') 、等号 (=) 、引号 (") 或数字符号 (#) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-1098">zero to one of the greater than symbol (>), apostrophe ('), equal sign (=), quotation mark ("), or number sign (#)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-1099">86 个字符的任意组合，即小写或大写字母、数字、正斜杠 (/) 或加号 (+) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-1099">any combination of 86 characters that are lower- or uppercase letters, digits, the forward slash (/), or plus sign (+)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-1100">两个等 (=) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-1100">two equal signs (=)</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-1101">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-1101">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="088e4-1102">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-1102">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-1103">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-1103">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="088e4-1104">在 300 个字符的邻近度内，DLP 策略可高可信度地检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-1104">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-1105">正则表达式CEP_Regex_AzureStorageAccountKeyGeneric查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-1105">The regular expression CEP_Regex_AzureStorageAccountKeyGeneric finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
<!--Azure Storage Account Key (Generic)-->
<Entity id="7ff41bd0-5419-4523-91d6-383b3a37f084" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="CEP_Regex_AzureStorageAccountKeyGeneric" />
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```
## <a name="belgium-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-1106">比利时驾驶证号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-1106">Belgium driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-1107">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-1107">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="088e4-1108">10 个数字，不带空格和分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-1108">10 digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-1109">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-1109">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="088e4-1110">10 个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-1110">10 digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-1111">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-1111">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="088e4-1112">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-1112">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-1113">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-1113">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="088e4-1114">在 300 个字符的邻近度内，DLP 策略具有中等可信度，即检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-1114">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-1115">正则表达式查找  `Regex_belgium_eu_driver's_license_number` 与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-1115">The regular expression  `Regex_belgium_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-1116">找到或 `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` 找到 `Keywords_belgium_eu_driver's_license_number` 的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-1116">A keyword from `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_belgium_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span>
    
```xml
      <!-- Belgium Driver's License Number -->
      <Entity id="d89fd329-9324-433c-b687-2c37bd5166f3" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_belgium_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_belgium_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="belgium-national-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-1249">比利时国家/区号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-1249">Belgium national number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-1250">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-1250">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="088e4-1251">11 个数字加上可选的分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-1251">11 digits plus optional delimiters</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-1252">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-1252">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="088e4-1253">11 个数字加分隔符：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-1253">11 digits plus delimiters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-1254">YY 格式的六个数字和两个可选句点。MM.DD出生日期</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-1254">six digits and two optional periods in the format YY.MM.DD for date of birth</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-1255">点、短划线、空格中的可选分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-1255">An optional delimiter from dot, dash, space</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-1256">三个连续的数字 (为男性的奇数，即使对于男性) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-1256">three sequential digits (odd for males, even for females)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-1257">点、短划线、空格中的可选分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-1257">An optional delimiter from dot, dash, space</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-1258">两个检查数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-1258">two check digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-1259">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-1259">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="088e4-1260">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-1260">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-1261">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-1261">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="088e4-1262">在 300 个字符的邻近度内，DLP 策略具有中等可信度，即检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-1262">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-1263">函数 Func_belgium_national_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-1263">The function Func_belgium_national_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-1264">找到 Keyword_belgium_national_number 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-1264">A keyword from Keyword_belgium_national_number is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-1265">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-1265">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="088e4-1266">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，置信度较低：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-1266">A DLP policy has low confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-1267">函数 Func_belgium_national_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-1267">The function Func_belgium_national_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-1268">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-1268">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Belgium National Number -->
       <Entity id="fb969c9e-0fd1-4b18-8091-a2123c5e6a54" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_belgium_national_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_belgium_national_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_belgium_national_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="belgium-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-1327">比利时护照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-1327">Belgium passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-1328">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-1328">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="088e4-1329">两个字母后跟六个数字，无空格或分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-1329">two letters followed by six digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-1330">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-1330">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="088e4-1331">两个字母，后跟六个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-1331">two letters and followed by six digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-1332">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-1332">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="088e4-1333">不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-1333">not applicable</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-1334">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-1334">Definition</span></span>

 <span data-ttu-id="088e4-1335">在 300 个字符的邻近度内，DLP 策略可高可信度地检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-1335">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-1336">正则表达式查找  `Regex_belgium_eu_passport_number` 与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-1336">The regular expression  `Regex_belgium_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-1337">找到或  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` 找到 `Keywords_belgium_eu_passport_number` 的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-1337">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_belgium_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-1338">正则表达式查找 `Regex_eu_passport_date2` DD MM YY 格式的日期或找到 `Keywords_eu_passport_date` `Keywords_belgium_eu_passport_number` 的关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-1338">The regular expression `Regex_eu_passport_date2` finds date in the format DD MM YY or a keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_date` or `Keywords_belgium_eu_passport_number` is found</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="088e4-1339">在 300 个字符的邻近度内，DLP 策略具有中等可信度，即检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-1339">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-1340">正则表达式查找  `Regex_belgium_eu_passport_number` 与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-1340">The regular expression  `Regex_belgium_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-1341">找到或  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` 找到 `Keywords_belgium_eu_passport_number` 的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-1341">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_belgium_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 

```xml
      <!-- Belgium Passport Number -->
      <Entity id="d7b1315b-21ca-4774-a32a-596010ff78fd" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_belgium_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_belgium_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Regex_eu_passport_date2" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_date" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_belgium_eu_passport_date" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_belgium_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_belgium_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>

```

## <a name="belgium-value-added-tax-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-1365">比利时增值税编号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-1365">Belgium value added tax number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="088e4-1366">此敏感信息类型仅适用于：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-1366">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-1367">数据丢失防护策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-1367">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-1368">通信合规性策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-1368">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-1369">信息治理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-1369">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-1370">记录管理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-1370">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-1371">Microsoft 云应用安全</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-1371">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-1372">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-1372">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="088e4-1373">12 个字符字母数字模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-1373">12-character alphanumeric pattern</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-1374">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-1374">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="088e4-1375">12 个字符字母数字模式：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-1375">12-character alphanumeric pattern:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-1376">字母 B 或 b</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-1376">a letter B or b</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-1377">字母 E 或 e</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-1377">a letter E or e</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-1378">数字 0</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-1378">a digit 0</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-1379">从 1 到 9 的数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-1379">a digit from 1 to 9</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-1380">可选点或连字符或空格</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-1380">an optional dot or Hyphen or space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-1381">四个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-1381">four digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-1382">可选点或连字符或空格</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-1382">an optional dot or Hyphen or space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-1383">四个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-1383">four digits</span></span>


### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-1384">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-1384">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="088e4-1385">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-1385">Yes</span></span>


### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-1386">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-1386">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="088e4-1387">在 300 个字符的邻近度内，DLP 策略可高可信度地检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-1387">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-1388">该函数Func_belgium_value_added_tax_number查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-1388">The function Func_belgium_value_added_tax_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-1389">找到来自Keywords_belgium_value_added_tax_number的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-1389">A keyword from Keywords_belgium_value_added_tax_number is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="088e4-1390">在 300 个字符的邻近度内，DLP 策略具有中等可信度，即检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-1390">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-1391">该函数Func_belgium_value_added_tax_number查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-1391">The function Func_belgium_value_added_tax_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Belgium Value Added Tax Number -->
      <Entity id="85b5b3c3-f2de-4ae8-ac46-fd3cb38bf9ed" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_belgium_value_added_tax_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_belgium_value_added_tax_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_belgium_value_added_tax_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
    </Version>
```
### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-1392">关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-1392">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_belgium_value_added_tax_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-1393">Keyword_belgium_value_added_tax_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-1393">Keyword_belgium_value_added_tax_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-1394">n？ tva</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-1394">nº tva</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-1396">vat no</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-1396">vat no</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-1397">numéro t.v.a</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-1397">numéro t.v.a</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-1398">umsatzsteuer-identifikationsnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-1398">umsatzsteuer-identifikationsnummer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-1399">umsatzsteuernummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-1399">umsatzsteuernummer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-1400">btw</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-1400">btw</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-1401">btw#</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-1401">btw#</span></span>

## <a name="brazil-cpf-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-1403">巴西 CPF 号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-1403">Brazil CPF number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-1404">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-1404">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="088e4-1405">11 个数字（包括校验位），可以格式化，也可以非格式化</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-1405">11 digits that include a check digit and can be formatted or unformatted</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-1406">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-1406">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="088e4-1407">格式化：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-1407">Formatted:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-1408">三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-1408">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-1409">a period</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-1409">a period</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-1410">三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-1410">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-1411">a period</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-1411">a period</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-1412">三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-1412">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-1413">连字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-1413">a hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-1414">两个数字是检查数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-1414">two digits that are check digits</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="088e4-1415">无格式：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-1415">Unformatted:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-1416">11 个数字，其中最后两个数字是校验位</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-1416">11 digits where the last two digits are check digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-1417">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-1417">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="088e4-1418">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-1418">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-1419">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-1419">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="088e4-1420">在 300 个字符的邻近度内，DLP 策略可高可信度地检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-1420">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-1421">函数 Func_brazil_cpf 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-1421">The function Func_brazil_cpf finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-1422">找到 Keyword_brazil_cpf 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-1422">A keyword from Keyword_brazil_cpf is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-1423">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-1423">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="088e4-1424">在 300 个字符的邻近度内，DLP 策略具有中等可信度，即检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-1424">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-1425">函数 Func_brazil_cpf 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-1425">The function Func_brazil_cpf finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-1426">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-1426">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Brazil CPF Number -->
<Entity id="78e09124-f2c3-4656-b32a-c1a132cd2711" recommendedConfidence="85" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_brazil_cpf"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_brazil_cpf"/>
  </Pattern>
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_brazil_cpf"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

#### <a name="keyword_brazil_cpf"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-1428">Keyword_brazil_cpf</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-1428">Keyword_brazil_cpf</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-1429">CPF</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-1429">CPF</span></span>

## <a name="brazil-legal-entity-number-cnpj"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-1438">CNPJ (巴西法律实体) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-1438">Brazil legal entity number (CNPJ)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-1439">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-1439">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="088e4-1440">14 个数字（包括注册号、分行号码和校验位），再加上分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-1440">14 digits that include a registration number, branch number, and check digits, plus delimiters</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-1441">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-1441">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="088e4-1442">14 个数字，再加上分隔符：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-1442">14 digits, plus delimiters:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-1443">两个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-1443">two digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-1444">a period</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-1444">a period</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-1445">三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-1445">three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-1446">a period</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-1446">a period</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-1447">前八 (三个数字是注册号码) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-1447">three digits (these first eight digits are the registration number)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-1448">正斜杠</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-1448">a forward slash</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-1449">四位数分支号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-1449">four-digit branch number</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-1450">连字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-1450">a hyphen</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-1451">两个数字是检查数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-1451">two digits that are check digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-1452">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-1452">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="088e4-1453">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-1453">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-1454">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-1454">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="088e4-1455">在 300 个字符的邻近度内，DLP 策略可高可信度地检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-1455">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-1456">函数 Func_brazil_cnpj 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-1456">The function Func_brazil_cnpj finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-1457">找到 Keyword_brazil_cnpj 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-1457">A keyword from Keyword_brazil_cnpj is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-1458">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-1458">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="088e4-1459">在 300 个字符的邻近度内，DLP 策略具有中等可信度，即检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-1459">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-1460">函数 Func_brazil_cnpj 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-1460">The function Func_brazil_cnpj finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-1461">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-1461">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Brazil Legal Entity Number (CNPJ) -->
<Entity id="9b58b5cd-5e90-4df6-b34f-1ebcc88ceae4" recommendedConfidence="85" patternsProximity="300">
   <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_brazil_cnpj"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_brazil_cnpj"/>
  </Pattern>
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_brazil_cnpj"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="brazil-national-identification-card-rg"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-1483">巴西国家身份证 (RG) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-1483">Brazil national identification card (RG)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-1484">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-1484">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="088e4-1485">Registro Geral (旧格式) ：九个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-1485">Registro Geral (old format): Nine digits</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="088e4-1486">Registro de Identidade (RIC)  (新格式) ：11 个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-1486">Registro de Identidade (RIC) (new format): 11 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-1487">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-1487">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="088e4-1488">Registro Geral（旧格式）：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-1488">Registro Geral (old format):</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-1489">两个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-1489">two digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-1490">a period</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-1490">a period</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-1491">三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-1491">three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-1492">a period</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-1492">a period</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-1493">三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-1493">three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-1494">连字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-1494">a hyphen</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-1495">一个数字，是一个检查数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-1495">one digit that is a check digit</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="088e4-1496">Registro de Identidade (RIC)  (新格式) ：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-1496">Registro de Identidade (RIC) (new format):</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-1497">10 个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-1497">10 digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-1498">连字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-1498">a hyphen</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-1499">一个数字，是一个检查数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-1499">one digit that is a check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-1500">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-1500">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="088e4-1501">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-1501">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-1502">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-1502">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="088e4-1503">在 300 个字符的邻近度内，DLP 策略可高可信度地检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-1503">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-1504">函数 Func_brazil_rg 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-1504">The function Func_brazil_rg finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-1505">找到 Keyword_brazil_rg 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-1505">A keyword from Keyword_brazil_rg is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-1506">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-1506">The checksum passes.</span></span>


```xml
      <!-- Brazil National ID Card (RG) -->
      <Entity id="486de900-db70-41b3-a886-abdf25af119c" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_brazil_rg" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_brazil_rg" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-1507">关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-1507">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_brazil_rg"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-1508">Keyword_brazil_rg</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-1508">Keyword_brazil_rg</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-1509">Cédula de identidade</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-1509">Cédula de identidade</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-1510">identity card</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-1510">identity card</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-1511">national id</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-1511">national id</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-1512">número de rregistro</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-1512">número de rregistro</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-1513">registro de Iidentidade</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-1513">registro de Iidentidade</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-1514">registro geral</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-1514">registro geral</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-1515">RG (关键字区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-1515">RG (this keyword is case-sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-1516">RIC (关键字区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-1516">RIC (this keyword is case-sensitive)</span></span> 


## <a name="bulgaria-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-1517">保加利亚驾驶证号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-1517">Bulgaria driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-1518">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-1518">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="088e4-1519">不带空格和分隔符的九个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-1519">nine digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-1520">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-1520">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="088e4-1521">九个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-1521">nine digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-1522">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-1522">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="088e4-1523">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-1523">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-1524">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-1524">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="088e4-1525">在 300 个字符的邻近度内，DLP 策略具有中等可信度，即检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-1525">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-1526">正则表达式查找  `Regex_bulgaria_eu_driver's_license_number` 与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-1526">The regular expression  `Regex_bulgaria_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-1527">找到或  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` 找到 `Keywords_bulgaria_eu_driver's_license_number` 的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-1527">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_bulgaria_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Bulgaria Driver's License Number -->
      <Entity id="66d39258-94c2-43b2-804b-aa312258e54b" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_bulgaria_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_bulgaria_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>    
```

## <a name="bulgaria-uniform-civil-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-1654">保加利亚统一编号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-1654">Bulgaria uniform civil number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="088e4-1655">此敏感信息类型仅适用于：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-1655">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-1656">数据丢失防护策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-1656">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-1657">通信合规性策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-1657">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-1658">信息治理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-1658">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-1659">记录管理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-1659">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-1660">Microsoft 云应用安全</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-1660">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-1661">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-1661">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="088e4-1662">10 个数字，不带空格和分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-1662">10 digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-1663">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-1663">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="088e4-1664">10 个数字，不带空格和分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-1664">10 digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-1665">六个数字，对应于 YYMMDD (出生日期) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-1665">six digits that correspond to the birth date (YYMMDD)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-1666">对应于出生日期的两个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-1666">two digits that correspond to the birth order</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-1667">对应于性别的一个数字：一个偶数（男性）和一个奇数（对于男性）</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-1667">one digit that corresponds to gender: An even digit for male and an odd digit for female</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-1668">一个检查数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-1668">one check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-1669">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-1669">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="088e4-1670">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-1670">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-1671">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-1671">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="088e4-1672">在 300 个字符的邻近度内，DLP 策略可高可信度地检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-1672">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-1673">该  `Func_bulgaria_eu_national_id_card` 函数查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-1673">The function  `Func_bulgaria_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-1674">找到一个  `Keywords_bulgaria_eu_national_id_card` 关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-1674">A keyword from  `Keywords_bulgaria_eu_national_id_card` is found.</span></span> 

<span data-ttu-id="088e4-1675">在 300 个字符的邻近度内，DLP 策略具有中等可信度，即检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-1675">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-1676">该  `Func_bulgaria_eu_national_id_card` 函数查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-1676">The function  `Func_bulgaria_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Bulgaria Uniform Civil Number -->
      <Entity id="100d58b1-0a35-4fb1-aa89-e4a86fb53fcc" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_bulgaria_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_bulgaria_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_bulgaria_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_bulgaria_eu_telephone_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_bulgaria_eu_mobile_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="bulgaria-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-1721">保加利亚护照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-1721">Bulgaria passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-1722">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-1722">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="088e4-1723">不带空格和分隔符的九个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-1723">nine digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-1724">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-1724">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="088e4-1725">九个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-1725">nine digits</span></span> 
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-1726">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-1726">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="088e4-1727">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-1727">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-1728">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-1728">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="088e4-1729">在 300 个字符的邻近度内，DLP 策略可高可信度地检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-1729">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-1730">正则表达式查找  `Regex_bulgaria_eu_passport_number` 与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-1730">The regular expression  `Regex_bulgaria_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-1731">找到或  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` 找到 `Keywords_bulgaria_eu_passport_number` 的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-1731">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_bulgaria_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-1732">正则表达式查找 `Regex_eu_passport_date1` DD.MM.YYYY 格式的日期或找到 `Keywords_eu_passport_date` 的关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-1732">The regular expression `Regex_eu_passport_date1` finds date in the format DD.MM.YYYY or a keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_date` is found</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="088e4-1733">在 300 个字符的邻近度内，DLP 策略具有中等可信度，即检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-1733">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-1734">正则表达式查找  `Regex_bulgaria_eu_passport_number` 与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-1734">The regular expression  `Regex_bulgaria_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-1735">找到或  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` 找到 `Keywords_bulgaria_eu_passport_number` 的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-1735">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_bulgaria_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 

```xml
      <!-- Bulgaria Passport Number -->
      <Entity id="f7172b82-c588-4216-845e-4e54e397f29a" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_bulgaria_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_bulgaria_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Regex_eu_passport_date1" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_date" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_bulgaria_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_bulgaria_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="canada-bank-account-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-1755">加拿大银行帐号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-1755">Canada bank account number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-1756">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-1756">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="088e4-1757">7 个或 12 个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-1757">7 or 12 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-1758">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-1758">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="088e4-1759">加拿大银行帐号是 7 个或 12 个数字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-1759">A Canada Bank Account Number is 7 or 12 digits.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="088e4-1760">加拿大银行帐户的银行代号是：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-1760">A Canada bank account transit number is:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-1761">五个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-1761">five digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-1762">连字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-1762">a hyphen</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-1763">三个数字 OR</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-1763">three digits OR</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-1764">零"0"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-1764">a zero "0"</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-1765">八个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-1765">eight digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-1766">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-1766">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="088e4-1767">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-1767">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-1768">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-1768">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="088e4-1769">在 300 个字符的邻近度内，DLP 策略可高可信度地检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-1769">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-1770">正则表达式 Regex_canada_bank_account_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-1770">The regular expression Regex_canada_bank_account_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-1771">找到 Keyword_canada_bank_account_number 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-1771">A keyword from Keyword_canada_bank_account_number is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-1772">正则表达式 Regex_canada_bank_account_transit_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-1772">The regular expression Regex_canada_bank_account_transit_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="088e4-1773">在 300 个字符的邻近度内，DLP 策略可高可信度地检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-1773">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-1774">正则表达式 Regex_canada_bank_account_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-1774">The regular expression Regex_canada_bank_account_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-1775">找到 Keyword_canada_bank_account_number 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-1775">A keyword from Keyword_canada_bank_account_number is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Canada Bank Account Number -->
<Entity id="552e814c-cb50-4d94-bbaa-bb1d1ffb34de" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_canada_bank_account_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_canada_bank_account_number" />
        <Match idRef="Regex_canada_bank_account_transit_number" />
   </Pattern>
   <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_canada_bank_account_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_canada_bank_account_number" />
   </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="canada-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-1799">加拿大驾驶证号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-1799">Canada driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-1800">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-1800">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="088e4-1801">因省而异</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-1801">Varies by province</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-1802">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-1802">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="088e4-1803">各种模式，涵盖艾伯塔、 不列颠哥伦比亚、 马尼托巴、 新不伦瑞克、 纽芬兰/拉布拉多、 新斯科舍、 安大略、 爱德华王子岛，魁北克和萨斯喀彻温</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-1803">Various patterns covering Alberta, British Columbia, Manitoba, New Brunswick, Newfoundland/Labrador, Nova Scotia, Ontario, Prince Edward Island, Quebec, and Saskatchewan</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-1804">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-1804">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="088e4-1805">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-1805">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-1806">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-1806">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="088e4-1807">在 300 个字符的邻近度内，DLP 策略具有中等可信度，即检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-1807">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-1808">函数 Func_[province_name]_drivers_license_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-1808">The function Func_[province_name]_drivers_license_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-1809">找到 Keyword_[province_name]_drivers_license_name 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-1809">A keyword from Keyword_[province_name]_drivers_license_name is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-1810">找到 Keyword_canada_drivers_license 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-1810">A keyword from Keyword_canada_drivers_license is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Canada Driver's License Number -->
    <Entity id="37186abb-8e48-4800-ad3c-e3d1610b3db0" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_alberta_drivers_license_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_alberta_drivers_license_name" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_canada_drivers_license" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_british_columbia_drivers_license_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_british_columbia_drivers_license_name" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_canada_drivers_license" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_manitoba_drivers_license_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_manitoba_drivers_license_name" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_canada_drivers_license" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_new_brunswick_drivers_license_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_new_brunswick_drivers_license_name" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_canada_drivers_license" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_newfoundland_labrador_drivers_license_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_newfoundland_labrador_drivers_license_name" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_canada_drivers_license" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_nova_scotia_drivers_license_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_nova_scotia_drivers_license_name" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_canada_drivers_license" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_ontario_drivers_license_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_ontario_drivers_license_name" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_canada_drivers_license" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_prince_edward_island_drivers_license_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_prince_edward_island_drivers_license_name" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_canada_drivers_license" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_quebec_drivers_license_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_quebec_drivers_license_name" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_canada_drivers_license" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_saskatchewan_drivers_license_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_saskatchewan_drivers_license_name" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_canada_drivers_license" />
      </Pattern>
    </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-1811">关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-1811">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_province_name_drivers_license_name"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-1812">Keyword_[province_name]_drivers_license_name</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-1812">Keyword_[province_name]_drivers_license_name</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-1813">省/市/自治区的缩写，例如 AB</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-1813">The province abbreviation, for example AB</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-1814">省名称，例如 Alberta</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-1814">The province name, for example Alberta</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_canada_drivers_license"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-1815">Keyword_canada_drivers_license</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-1815">Keyword_canada_drivers_license</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-1816">DL</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-1816">DL</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-1817">DLS</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-1817">DLS</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-1818">CDL</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-1818">CDL</span></span>

## <a name="canada-health-service-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-1946">加拿大卫生服务号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-1946">Canada health service number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-1947">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-1947">Format</span></span>

 <span data-ttu-id="088e4-1948">10 个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-1948">10 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-1949">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-1949">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="088e4-1950">10 个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-1950">10 digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-1951">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-1951">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="088e4-1952">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-1952">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-1953">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-1953">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="088e4-1954">在 300 个字符的邻近度内，DLP 策略具有中等可信度，即检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-1954">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-1955">正则表达式 Regex_canada_health_service_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-1955">The regular expression Regex_canada_health_service_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-1956">找到 Keyword_canada_health_service_number 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-1956">A keyword from Keyword_canada_health_service_number is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Canada Health Service Number -->
<Entity id="59c0bf39-7fab-482c-af25-00faa4384c94" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_canada_health_service_number" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_canada_health_service_number" />
        </Any>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="canada-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-1968">加拿大护照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-1968">Canada passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-1969">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-1969">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="088e4-1970">两个小写字母后跟六个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-1970">two uppercase letters followed by six digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-1971">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-1971">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="088e4-1972">两个小写字母后跟六个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-1972">two uppercase letters followed by six digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-1973">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-1973">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="088e4-1974">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-1974">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-1975">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-1975">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="088e4-1976">在 300 个字符的邻近度内，DLP 策略具有中等可信度，即检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-1976">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-1977">正则表达式 Regex_canada_passport_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-1977">The regular expression Regex_canada_passport_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-1978">找到来自Keyword_canada_passport_number或Keyword_passport关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-1978">A keyword from Keyword_canada_passport_number or Keyword_passport is found.</span></span>

```xml 
<!-- Canada Passport Number -->
<Entity id="14d0db8b-498a-43ed-9fca-f6097ae687eb" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_canada_passport_number" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_canada_passport_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_passport" />
        </Any>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```
