## <a name="canada-personal-health-identification-number-phin"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-2008">加拿大个人健康标识号 (PHIN) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-2008">Canada personal health identification number (PHIN)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-2009">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-2009">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="088e4-2010">九个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-2010">nine digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-2011">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-2011">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="088e4-2012">九个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-2012">nine digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-2013">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-2013">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="088e4-2014">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-2014">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-2015">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-2015">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="088e4-2016">在 300 个字符的邻近度内，DLP 策略具有中等可信度，即检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-2016">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-2017">正则表达式 Regex_canada_phin 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-2017">The regular expression Regex_canada_phin finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-2018">至少找到两个Keyword_canada_phin或Keyword_canada_provinces关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-2018">At least two keywords from Keyword_canada_phin or Keyword_canada_provinces are found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Canada PHIN -->
<Entity id="722e12ac-c89a-4ec8-a1b7-fea3469f89db" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_canada_phin" />
        <Any minMatches="2">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_canada_phin" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_canada_provinces" />
        </Any>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="canada-social-insurance-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-2051">加拿大社会保险号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-2051">Canada social insurance number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-2052">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-2052">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="088e4-2053">九个数字（可选连字符或空格）</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-2053">nine digits with optional hyphens or spaces</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-2054">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-2054">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="088e4-2055">格式化：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-2055">Formatted:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-2056">三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-2056">three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-2057">连字符或空格</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-2057">a hyphen or space</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-2058">三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-2058">three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-2059">连字符或空格</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-2059">a hyphen or space</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-2060">三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-2060">three digits</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="088e4-2061">无格式：九个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-2061">Unformatted: nine digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-2062">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-2062">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="088e4-2063">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-2063">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-2064">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-2064">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="088e4-2065">在 300 个字符的邻近度内，DLP 策略可高可信度地检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-2065">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-2066">函数 Func_canadian_sin 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-2066">The function Func_canadian_sin finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-2067">至少两个以下任意组合：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-2067">At least two of any combination of the following:</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="088e4-2068">找到 Keyword_sin 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-2068">A keyword from Keyword_sin is found.</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="088e4-2069">找到 Keyword_sin_collaborative 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-2069">A keyword from Keyword_sin_collaborative is found.</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="088e4-2070">函数 Func_eu_date 找到正确日期格式的日期。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-2070">The function Func_eu_date finds a date in the right date format.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-2071">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-2071">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="088e4-2072">在 300 个字符的邻近度内，DLP 策略具有中等可信度，即检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-2072">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-2073">函数 Func_unformatted_canadian_sin 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-2073">The function Func_unformatted_canadian_sin finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-2074">找到 Keyword_sin 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-2074">A keyword from Keyword_sin is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-2075">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-2075">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Canada Social Insurance Number -->
<Entity id="a2f29c85-ecb8-4514-a610-364790c0773e" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_canadian_sin" />
        <Any minMatches="2">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_sin" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_sin_collaborative" />
          <Match idRef="Func_eu_date" />
        </Any>
  </Pattern>
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_unformatted_canadian_sin" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_sin" />
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-2076">关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-2076">Keywords</span></span>

## <a name="chile-identity-card-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-2100">智利身份证号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-2100">Chile identity card number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-2101">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-2101">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="088e4-2102">七到八个数字加上分隔符一个检查数字或字母</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-2102">seven to eight digits plus delimiters a check digit or letter</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-2103">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-2103">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="088e4-2104">七到八个数字加分隔符：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-2104">seven to eight digits plus delimiters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-2105">一到两个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-2105">one to two digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-2106">可选时间段</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-2106">an optional period</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-2107">三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-2107">three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-2108">可选时间段</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-2108">an optional period</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-2109">三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-2109">three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-2110">短划线</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-2110">a dash</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-2111">一个数字或 (不区分大小写) 一个数字或字母，这是一个检查数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-2111">one digit or letter (not case-sensitive) which is a check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-2112">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-2112">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="088e4-2113">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-2113">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-2114">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-2114">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="088e4-2115">在 300 个字符的邻近度内，DLP 策略可高可信度地检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-2115">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-2116">函数 Func_chile_id_card 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-2116">The function Func_chile_id_card finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-2117">找到 Keyword_chile_id_card 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-2117">A keyword from Keyword_chile_id_card is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-2118">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-2118">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="088e4-2119">在 300 个字符的邻近度内，DLP 策略具有中等可信度，即检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-2119">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-2120">函数 Func_chile_id_card 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-2120">The function Func_chile_id_card finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-2121">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-2121">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Chile Identity Card Number -->
<Entity id="4e979794-49a0-407e-a0b9-2c536937b925" recommendedConfidence="85" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_chile_id_card"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_chile_id_card"/>
  </Pattern>
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_chile_id_card"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="china-resident-identity-card-prc-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-2158">中国居民身份证 (中国) 号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-2158">China resident identity card (PRC) number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-2159">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-2159">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="088e4-2160">18 个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-2160">18 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-2161">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-2161">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="088e4-2162">18 个数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-2162">18 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-2163">六个数字，即地址代码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-2163">six digits that are an address code</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-2164">八个数字，格式为 YYYYMMDD，表示出生日期</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-2164">eight digits in the form YYYYMMDD, which are the date of birth</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-2165">三个数字，即订单代码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-2165">three digits that are an order code</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-2166">一个数字，是一个检查数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-2166">one digit that is a check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-2167">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-2167">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="088e4-2168">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-2168">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-2169">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-2169">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="088e4-2170">在 300 个字符的邻近度内，DLP 策略可高可信度地检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-2170">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-2171">函数 Func_china_resident_id 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-2171">The function Func_china_resident_id finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-2172">找到 Keyword_china_resident_id 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-2172">A keyword from Keyword_china_resident_id is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-2173">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-2173">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="088e4-2174">在 300 个字符的邻近度内，DLP 策略具有中等可信度，即检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-2174">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-2175">函数 Func_china_resident_id 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-2175">The function Func_china_resident_id finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-2176">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-2176">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- China Resident Identity Card (PRC) Number -->
<Entity id="c92daa86-2d16-4871-901f-816b3f554fc1" recommendedConfidence="85" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_china_resident_id"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_china_resident_id"/>
  </Pattern>
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_china_resident_id"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-2177">关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-2177">Keywords</span></span>

### <a name="keyword_china_resident_id"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-2178">Keyword_china_resident_id</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-2178">Keyword_china_resident_id</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-2179">Resident Identity Card</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-2179">Resident Identity Card</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-2180">中国</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-2180">PRC</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-2181">National Identification Card</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-2181">National Identification Card</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-2182">身份证</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-2182">身份证</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-2183">居民 身份证</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-2183">居民 身份证</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-2184">居民身份证</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-2184">居民身份证</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-2185">鉴定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-2185">鉴定</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-2188">鑑定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-2188">鑑定</span></span> 

   
## <a name="credit-card-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-2189">信用卡号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-2189">Credit card number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-2190">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-2190">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="088e4-2191">14 到 16 个数字，可以格式化或无格式 (ddddddddd) 且必须通过 Luhn 测试。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-2191">14 to 16 digits that can be formatted or unformatted (dddddddddddddddd) and that must pass the Luhn test.</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-2192">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-2192">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="088e4-2193">复杂而强大的模式，可检测来自全球所有主要品牌的卡，包括 Visa、MasterCard、Discover Card、JCB、American Express、名片和二十一点卡。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-2193">Complex and robust pattern that detects cards from all major brands worldwide, including Visa, MasterCard, Discover Card, JCB, American Express, gift cards, and diner cards.</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-2194">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-2194">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="088e4-2195">是，Luhn 校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-2195">Yes, the Luhn checksum</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-2196">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-2196">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="088e4-2197">在 300 个字符的邻近度内，DLP 策略可高可信度地检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-2197">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-2198">函数 Func_credit_card 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-2198">The function Func_credit_card finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-2199">下列其中一项为真：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-2199">One of the following is true:</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="088e4-2200">找到 Keyword_cc_verification 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-2200">A keyword from Keyword_cc_verification is found.</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="088e4-2201">找到 Keyword_cc_name 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-2201">A keyword from Keyword_cc_name is found.</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="088e4-2202">函数 Func_expiration_date 找到正确日期格式的日期。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-2202">The function Func_expiration_date finds a date in the right date format.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-2203">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-2203">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="088e4-2204">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，置信度较低：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-2204">A DLP policy has low confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-2205">函数 Func_credit_card 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-2205">The function Func_credit_card finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-2206">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-2206">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Credit Card Number -->
<Entity id="50842eb7-edc8-4019-85dd-5a5c1f2bb085" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_credit_card" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_cc_verification" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_cc_name" />
          <Match idRef="Func_expiration_date" />
        </Any>
  </Pattern>
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_credit_card" />
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="croatia-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-2466">克罗地亚驾驶证号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-2466">Croatia driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-2467">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-2467">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="088e4-2468">八个数字，不带空格和分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-2468">eight digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-2469">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-2469">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="088e4-2470">八个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-2470">eight digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-2471">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-2471">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="088e4-2472">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-2472">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-2473">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-2473">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="088e4-2474">在 300 个字符的邻近度内，DLP 策略具有中等可信度，即检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-2474">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-2475">正则表达式查找  `Regex_croatia_eu_driver's_license_number` 与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-2475">The regular expression  `Regex_croatia_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-2476">找到或 `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` 找到 `Keywords_croatia_eu_driver's_license_number` 的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-2476">A keyword from `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_croatia_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 

```xml
      <!-- Croatia Driver's License Number -->
      <Entity id="005b3ef1-47dd-4e68-bb02-c6db484d00f2" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_croatia_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_croatia_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="croatia-identity-card-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-2600">克罗地亚身份证号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-2600">Croatia identity card number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="088e4-2601">此敏感信息类型实体包含在欧盟国家标识号敏感信息类型中。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-2601">This sensitive information type entity is included in the EU National Identification Number sensitive information type.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="088e4-2602">它作为独立的敏感信息类型实体提供。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-2602">It's available as a stand-alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-2603">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-2603">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="088e4-2604">九个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-2604">nine digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-2605">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-2605">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="088e4-2606">九个连续的数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-2606">nine consecutive digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-2607">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-2607">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="088e4-2608">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-2608">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-2609">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-2609">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="088e4-2610">在 300 个字符的邻近度内，DLP 策略具有中等可信度，即检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-2610">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-2611">函数 Func_croatia_id_card 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-2611">The function Func_croatia_id_card finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-2612">找到 Keyword_croatia_id_card 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-2612">A keyword from Keyword_croatia_id_card is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!--Croatia Identity Card Number-->
<Entity id="ff12f884-c20a-4189-b185-34c8e7258d47" recommendedConfidence="75" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_croatia_id_card"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_croatia_id_card"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="croatia-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-2643">克罗地亚护照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-2643">Croatia passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-2644">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-2644">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="088e4-2645">不带空格和分隔符的九个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-2645">nine digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-2646">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-2646">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="088e4-2647">九个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-2647">nine digits</span></span> 
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-2648">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-2648">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="088e4-2649">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-2649">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-2650">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-2650">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="088e4-2651">在 300 个字符的邻近度内，DLP 策略可高可信度地检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-2651">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-2652">正则表达式查找  `Regex_croatia_eu_passport_number` 与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-2652">The regular expression  `Regex_croatia_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-2653">找到或  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` 找到 `Keywords_croatia_eu_passport_number` 的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-2653">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_croatia_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-2654">正则表达式查找 `Regex_eu_passport_date1` DD.MM.YYYY 格式的日期或找到 `Keywords_eu_passport_date` 的关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-2654">The regular expression `Regex_eu_passport_date1` finds date in the format DD.MM.YYYY or a keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_date` is found</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="088e4-2655">在 300 个字符的邻近度内，DLP 策略具有中等可信度，即检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-2655">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-2656">正则表达式查找  `Regex_croatia_eu_passport_number` 与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-2656">The regular expression  `Regex_croatia_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-2657">找到或  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` 找到 `Keywords_croatia_eu_passport_number` 的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-2657">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_croatia_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Croatia Passport Number -->
      <Entity id="7d7a729d-32d8-4204-8d01-d5e6a6c25581" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_croatia_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_croatia_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Regex_eu_passport_date1" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_date" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_croatia_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_croatia_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-2668">passportnumbers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-2668">passportnumbers</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-2669">passport numbers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-2669">passport numbers</span></span>

#### <a name="keywords_croatia_eu_passport_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-2670">Keywords_croatia_eu_passport_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-2670">Keywords_croatia_eu_passport_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-2671">broj putov一</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-2671">broj putovnice</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-2674">br putov一</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-2674">br putovnice</span></span>
   
## <a name="croatia-personal-identification-oib-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-2675">克罗地亚个人标识 (OIB) 号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-2675">Croatia personal identification (OIB) number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-2676">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-2676">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="088e4-2677">11 个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-2677">11 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-2678">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-2678">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="088e4-2679">11 个数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-2679">11 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-2680">10 个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-2680">10 digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-2681">最终数字是一个检查数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-2681">final digit is a check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-2682">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-2682">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="088e4-2683">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-2683">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-2684">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-2684">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="088e4-2685">在 300 个字符的邻近度内，DLP 策略可高可信度地检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-2685">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-2686">函数 Func_croatia_oib_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-2686">The function Func_croatia_oib_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-2687">找到来自Keywords_croatia_eu_tax_file_number关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-2687">A keyword from Keywords_croatia_eu_tax_file_number is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-2688">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-2688">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="088e4-2689">在 300 个字符的邻近度内，DLP 策略具有中等可信度，即检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-2689">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-2690">函数 Func_croatia_oib_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-2690">The function Func_croatia_oib_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-2691">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-2691">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Croatia Personal Identification (OIB) Number -->
      <Entity id="31983b6d-db95-4eb2-a630-b44bd091968d" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_croatia_oib_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_croatia_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_croatia_oib_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-2692">关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-2692">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_croatia_oib_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-2693">Keyword_croatia_oib_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-2693">Keyword_croatia_oib_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-2694">majstorski broj graana</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-2694">majstorski broj građana</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-2695">master citizen number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-2695">master citizen number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-2696">nacionalni identifciocijski broj</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-2696">nacionalni identifikacijski broj</span></span>

## <a name="croatia-social-security-number-or-equivalent-identification"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-2722">克罗地亚社会保险号或等效标识</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-2722">Croatia social security number or equivalent identification</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="088e4-2723">此敏感信息类型实体仅在欧盟社会保险号或等效 ID 敏感信息类型中可用。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-2723">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Social Security Number or Equivalent ID sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-2724">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-2724">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="088e4-2725">11 个数字，不带空格和分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-2725">11 digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-2726">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-2726">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="088e4-2727">11 个数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-2727">11 digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-2728">10 个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-2728">10 digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-2729">一个检查数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-2729">one check digit</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-2730">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-2730">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="088e4-2731">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-2731">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-2732">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-2732">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="088e4-2733">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-2733">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-2734">该  `Func_croatia_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` 函数查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-2734">The function  `Func_croatia_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-2735">找到一个  `Keywords_croatia_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` 关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-2735">A keyword from  `Keywords_croatia_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="088e4-2736">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-2736">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-2737">该  `Func_croatia_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` 函数查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-2737">The function  `Func_croatia_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU SSN or Equivalent Number -->
<Entity id="d24e32a4-c0bb-4ba8-899d-6303b95742d9" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_croatia_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_croatia_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
        </Pattern> 
       <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_croatia_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
        </Pattern>      
</Entity>
```

## <a name="cyprus-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-2754">塞浦路斯驾驶证号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-2754">Cyprus drivers license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-2755">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-2755">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="088e4-2756">12 个数字，不含空格和分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-2756">12 digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-2757">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-2757">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="088e4-2758">12 个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-2758">12 digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-2759">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-2759">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="088e4-2760">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-2760">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-2761">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-2761">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="088e4-2762">在 300 个字符的邻近度内，DLP 策略具有中等可信度，即检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-2762">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-2763">正则表达式查找  `Regex_cyprus_eu_driver's_license_number` 与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-2763">The regular expression  `Regex_cyprus_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-2764">找到或  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` 找到 `Keywords_cyprus_eu_driver's_license_number` 的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-2764">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_cyprus_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Cyprus Driver's License Number -->
      <Entity id="356fa104-f9ac-4aff-a0e4-2e6e65ea06c4" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_cyprus_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_cyprus_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="cyprus-identity-card"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-2889">塞浦路斯身份证</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-2889">Cyprus identity card</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="088e4-2890">此敏感信息类型仅适用于：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-2890">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-2891">数据丢失防护策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-2891">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-2892">通信合规性策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-2892">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-2893">信息治理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-2893">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-2894">记录管理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-2894">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-2895">Microsoft 云应用安全</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-2895">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-2896">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-2896">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="088e4-2897">10 个数字，不带空格和分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-2897">10 digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-2898">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-2898">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="088e4-2899">10 个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-2899">10 digits</span></span> 
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-2900">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-2900">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="088e4-2901">不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-2901">not applicable</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-2902">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-2902">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="088e4-2903">在 300 个字符的邻近度内，DLP 策略具有中等可信度，即检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-2903">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-2904">正则表达式查找  `Regex_cyprus_eu_national_id_card` 与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-2904">The regular expression  `Regex_cyprus_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-2905">找到一个  `Keywords_cyprus_eu_national_id_card` 关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-2905">A keyword from  `Keywords_cyprus_eu_national_id_card` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml 
      <!-- Cyprus Identity Card -->
      <Entity id="3ba8afe5-7a6c-4929-8247-0001b6878438" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_cyprus_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_cyprus_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-2906">关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-2906">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keywords_cyprus_eu_national_id_card"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-2907">Keywords_cyprus_eu_national_id_card</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-2907">Keywords_cyprus_eu_national_id_card</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-2908">id card number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-2908">id card number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-2909">标识卡号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-2909">identity card number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-2910">kim karti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-2910">kimlik karti</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-2911">national identification number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-2911">national identification number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-2912">个人 ID 号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-2912">personal id number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-2913">ταυτοτητασ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-2913">ταυτοτητασ</span></span>


## <a name="cyprus-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-2914">塞浦路斯护照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-2914">Cyprus passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-2915">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-2915">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="088e4-2916">一个字母后跟 6-8 个数字，无空格或分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-2916">one letter followed by 6-8 digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-2917">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-2917">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="088e4-2918">一个字母后跟六到八个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-2918">one letter followed by six to eight digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-2919">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-2919">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="088e4-2920">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-2920">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-2921">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-2921">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="088e4-2922">在 300 个字符的邻近度内，DLP 策略可高可信度地检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-2922">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-2923">正则表达式查找  `Regex_cyprus_eu_passport_number` 与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-2923">The regular expression  `Regex_cyprus_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-2924">找到或  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` 找到 `Keywords_cyprus_eu_passport_number` 的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-2924">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_cyprus_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-2925">正则表达式查找 `Regex_cyprus_eu_passport_date` DD/MM/YYYY 格式的日期或找到 `Keywords_cyprus_eu_passport_date` 的关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-2925">The regular expression `Regex_cyprus_eu_passport_date` finds date in the format DD/MM/YYYY or a keyword from `Keywords_cyprus_eu_passport_date` is found</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="088e4-2926">在 300 个字符的邻近度内，DLP 策略具有中等可信度，即检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-2926">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-2927">正则表达式查找  `Regex_cyprus_eu_passport_number` 与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-2927">The regular expression  `Regex_cyprus_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-2928">找到或  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` 找到 `Keywords_cyprus_eu_passport_number` 的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-2928">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_cyprus_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span>  
    
```xml
      <!-- Cyprus Passport Number -->
      <Entity id="9193e2e8-7f8c-43c1-a274-ac40d651936f" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_cyprus_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_cyprus_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Regex_cyprus_eu_passport_date" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_cyprus_eu_passport_date" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_cyprus_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_cyprus_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-2929">关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-2929">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keywords_eu_passport_number_common"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-2930">Keywords_eu_passport_number_common</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-2930">Keywords_eu_passport_number_common</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-2931">passport#</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-2931">passport#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-2932">passport#</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-2932">passport #</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-2933">passportid</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-2933">passportid</span></span>

## <a name="cyprus-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-2957">塞浦路斯税务标识号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-2957">Cyprus tax identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="088e4-2958">此敏感信息类型仅适用于：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-2958">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-2959">数据丢失防护策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-2959">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-2960">通信合规性策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-2960">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-2961">信息治理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-2961">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-2962">记录管理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-2962">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-2963">Microsoft 云应用安全</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-2963">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-2964">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-2964">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="088e4-2965">指定模式中八个数字和一个字母</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-2965">eight digits and one letter in the specified pattern</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-2966">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-2966">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="088e4-2967">八个数字和一个字母：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-2967">eight digits and one letter:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-2968">a "0" or "9"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-2968">a "0" or "9"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-2969">七个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-2969">seven digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-2970">一个字母 (不区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-2970">one letter (not case-sensitive)</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-2971">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-2971">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="088e4-2972">不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-2972">not applicable</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-2973">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-2973">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="088e4-2974">在 300 个字符的邻近度内，DLP 策略可高可信度地检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-2974">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-2975">该  `Func_cyprus_eu_tax_file_number` 函数查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-2975">The function  `Func_cyprus_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-2976">找到一个  `Keywords_cyprus_eu_tax_file_number` 关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-2976">A keyword from  `Keywords_cyprus_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="088e4-2977">在 300 个字符的邻近度内，DLP 策略具有中等可信度，即检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-2977">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-2978">该  `Func_cyprus_eu_tax_file_number` 函数查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-2978">The function  `Func_cyprus_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Cyprus Tax Identification Number -->
      <Entity id="40e64bd9-55f3-4a09-9bd6-1db18dced9dd" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_cyprus_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_cyprus_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_cyprus_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="czech-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-3006">捷克驾驶证号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-3006">Czech driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-3007">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-3007">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="088e4-3008">两个字母后跟六个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-3008">two letters followed by six digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-3009">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-3009">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="088e4-3010">八个字母和数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-3010">eight letters and digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-3011">字母"E" (不区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-3011">letter 'E' (not case-sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-3012">一个字母</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-3012">a letter</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-3013">可选 (空格) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-3013">a space (optional)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-3014">六个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-3014">six digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-3015">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-3015">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="088e4-3016">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-3016">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-3017">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-3017">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="088e4-3018">在 300 个字符的邻近度内，DLP 策略具有中等可信度，即检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-3018">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-3019">正则表达式查找  `Regex_czech_republic_eu_driver's_license_number` 与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-3019">The regular expression  `Regex_czech_republic_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-3020">找到或  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` 找到 `Keywords_czech_republic_eu_driver's_license_number` 的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-3020">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_czech_republic_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 

```xml
      <Entity id="86b40d3b-d8ea-4c36-aab0-ef9416a6769c" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_czech_republic_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_czech_republic_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>

```

## <a name="czech-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-3146">捷克护照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-3146">Czech passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-3147">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-3147">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="088e4-3148">不带空格或分隔符的八个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-3148">eight digits without spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-3149">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-3149">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="088e4-3150">不带空格或分隔符的八个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-3150">eight digits without spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-3151">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-3151">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="088e4-3152">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-3152">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-3153">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-3153">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="088e4-3154">在 300 个字符的邻近度内，DLP 策略可高可信度地检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-3154">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-3155">正则表达式查找  `Regex_czech_republic_eu_passport_number` 与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-3155">The regular expression  `Regex_czech_republic_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-3156">找到或  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` 找到 `Keywords_czech_republic_eu_passport_number` 的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-3156">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_czech_republic_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-3157">正则表达式查找 `Regex_eu_passport_date1` DD.MM.YYYY 格式的日期或找到 `Keywords_eu_passport_date` 的关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-3157">The regular expression `Regex_eu_passport_date1` finds date in the format DD.MM.YYYY or a keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_date` is found</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="088e4-3158">在 300 个字符的邻近度内，DLP 策略具有中等可信度，即检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-3158">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-3159">正则表达式查找  `Regex_czech_republic_eu_passport_number` 与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-3159">The regular expression  `Regex_czech_republic_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-3160">找到或  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` 找到 `Keywords_czech_republic_eu_passport_number` 的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-3160">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_czech_republic_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Czech Republic Passport Number -->
      <Entity id="7bcd8ce8-5e92-4bbe-bc92-fa669f0369fa" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_czech_republic_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_czech_republic_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Regex_eu_passport_date1" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_date" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_czech_republic_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_czech_republic_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="czech-personal-identity-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-3182">捷克个人标识号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-3182">Czech personal identity number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-3183">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-3183">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="088e4-3184">九个数字，带可选正斜杠 (旧格式) 10 个数字，带可选正斜杠 (新格式) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-3184">nine digits with optional forward slash (old format) 10 digits with optional forward slash (new format)</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-3185">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-3185">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="088e4-3186">九个数字 (旧格式) ：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-3186">nine digits (old format):</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-3187">六个数字，表示出生日期</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-3187">six digits that represent date of birth</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-3188">可选正斜杠</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-3188">an optional forward slash</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-3189">三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-3189">three digits</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="088e4-3190">10 个数字 (新) ：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-3190">10 digits (new format):</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-3191">六个数字，表示出生日期</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-3191">six digits that represent date of birth</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-3192">可选正斜杠</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-3192">an optional forward slash</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-3193">四个数字，其中最后一个数字是一个检查数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-3193">four digits where last digit is a check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-3194">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-3194">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="088e4-3195">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-3195">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-3196">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-3196">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="088e4-3197">在 300 个字符的邻近度内，DLP 策略可高可信度地检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-3197">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-3198">函数 Func_czech_id_card 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-3198">The function Func_czech_id_card finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-3199">找到 Keyword_czech_id_card 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-3199">A keyword from Keyword_czech_id_card is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-3200">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-3200">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="088e4-3201">在 300 个字符的邻近度内，DLP 策略具有中等可信度，即检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-3201">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-3202">该函数Func_czech_id_card_new_format查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-3202">The function Func_czech_id_card_new_format finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-3203">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-3203">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Czech Personal Identity Number -->
      <!-- Czech Personal Identity Number -->
      <Entity id="60c0725a-4eb6-455b-9dda-05d8a7396497" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_czech_id_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_czech_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
        <Version minEngineVersion="15.20.3000.000">
          <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
            <IdMatch idRef="Func_czech_id_card_new_format" />
          </Pattern>
        </Version>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="czech-social-security-number-or-equivalent-identification"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-3250">捷克身份证号或等效标识</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-3250">Czech social security number or equivalent identification</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="088e4-3251">此敏感信息类型实体仅在欧盟社会保险号或等效 ID 敏感信息类型中可用。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-3251">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Social Security Number or Equivalent ID sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-3252">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-3252">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="088e4-3253">指定模式中的 10 个数字和反杠</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-3253">10 digits and a backslash in the specified pattern</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-3254">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-3254">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="088e4-3255">10 个数字和反杠：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-3255">10 digits and a backslash:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-3256">与 YYMMDD (出生日期对应的六) ：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-3256">six digits that correspond to the birth date (YYMMDD):</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-3257">反杠</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-3257">a backslash</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-3258">三个数字，对应于一个序列号，该序列号分隔在同一日期出生日期的人</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-3258">three digits that correspond to a serial number that separates persons born on the same date</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-3259">一个检查数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-3259">one check digit</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-3260">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-3260">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="088e4-3261">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-3261">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-3262">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-3262">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="088e4-3263">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-3263">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-3264">该  `Func_czech_republic_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` 函数查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-3264">The function  `Func_czech_republic_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-3265">找到一个  `Keywords_czech_republic_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` 关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-3265">A keyword from  `Keywords_czech_republic_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="088e4-3266">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-3266">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-3267">该  `Func_czech_republic_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` 函数查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-3267">The function  `Func_czech_republic_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 

```xml
 <!-- EU SSN or Equivalent Number -->
<Entity id="d24e32a4-c0bb-4ba8-899d-6303b95742d9" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_czech_republic_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_czech_republic_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
        </Pattern> 
       <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_czech_republic_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
        </Pattern>      
</Entity>
```

## <a name="denmark-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-3283">丹麦驾驶证号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-3283">Denmark driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-3284">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-3284">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="088e4-3285">八个数字，不带空格和分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-3285">eight digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-3286">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-3286">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="088e4-3287">八个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-3287">eight digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-3288">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-3288">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="088e4-3289">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-3289">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-3290">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-3290">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="088e4-3291">在 300 个字符的邻近度内，DLP 策略具有中等可信度，即检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-3291">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-3292">正则表达式查找  `Regex_denmark_eu_driver's_license_number` 与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-3292">The regular expression  `Regex_denmark_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-3293">找到或  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` 找到 `Keywords_denmark_eu_driver's_license_number` 的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-3293">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_denmark_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Denmark Driver's License Number -->
      <Entity id="98a95812-6203-451a-a220-d39870ebef0e" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_denmark_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_denmark_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

<span data-ttu-id="088e4-3421">九个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-3421">nine digits</span></span> 
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-3422">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-3422">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="088e4-3423">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-3423">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-3424">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-3424">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="088e4-3425">在 300 个字符的邻近度内，DLP 策略可高可信度地检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-3425">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-3426">正则表达式查找  `Regex_denmark_eu_passport_number` 与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-3426">The regular expression  `Regex_denmark_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-3427">找到或  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` 找到 `Keywords_denmark_eu_passport_number` 的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-3427">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_denmark_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-3428">正则表达式查找 `Regex_eu_passport_date2` DD MM YY 格式的日期或找到 `Keywords_eu_passport_date` 的关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-3428">The regular expression `Regex_eu_passport_date2` finds date in the format DD MM YY or a keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_date` is found</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="088e4-3429">在 300 个字符的邻近度内，DLP 策略具有中等可信度，即检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-3429">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-3430">正则表达式查找  `Regex_denmark_eu_passport_number` 与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-3430">The regular expression  `Regex_denmark_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-3431">找到或  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` 找到 `Keywords_denmark_eu_passport_number` 的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-3431">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_denmark_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Denmark Passport Number -->
      <Entity id="25e8c47e-e6fe-4884-a211-74898f8c0196" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_denmark_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_denmark_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Regex_eu_passport_date2" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_date" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_denmark_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_denmark_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>

```
