## <a name="denmark-personal-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-3451">丹麦个人标识号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-3451">Denmark personal identification number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-3452">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-3452">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="088e4-3453">10 个数字，包含连字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-3453">10 digits containing a hyphen</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-3454">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-3454">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="088e4-3455">10 个数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-3455">10 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-3456">六个数字，格式为 DDMMYY，即出生日期</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-3456">six digits in the format DDMMYY, which are the date of birth</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-3457">连字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-3457">a hyphen</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-3458">四个数字，其中最后一个数字是一个检查数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-3458">four digits where the final digit is a check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-3459">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-3459">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="088e4-3460">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-3460">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-3461">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-3461">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="088e4-3462">在 300 个字符的邻近度内，DLP 策略具有中等可信度，即检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-3462">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-3463">正则表达式Func_denmark_eu_tax_file_number查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-3463">The regular expression Func_denmark_eu_tax_file_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-3464">找到 Keyword_denmark_id 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-3464">A keyword from Keyword_denmark_id is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-3465">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-3465">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="088e4-3466">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，置信度较低：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-3466">A DLP policy has low confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-3467">正则表达式Func_denmark_eu_tax_file_number查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-3467">The regular expression Func_denmark_eu_tax_file_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-3468">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-3468">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Denmark Personal Identification Number -->
      <!-- Denmark Personal Identification Number -->
      <Entity id="6c4f2fef-56e1-4c00-8093-88d7a01cf460" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_denmark_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_denmark_id" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_denmark_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="denmark-social-security-number-or-equivalent-identification"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-3540">丹麦社会保险号或等效标识</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-3540">Denmark social security number or equivalent identification</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="088e4-3541">此敏感信息类型实体仅适用于欧盟社会保险号或等效 ID 敏感信息类型。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-3541">This sensitive information type entity is only available the EU Social Security Number or Equivalent ID sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-3542">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-3542">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="088e4-3543">指定模式中的 10 个数字和连字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-3543">10 digits and a hyphen in the specified pattern</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-3544">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-3544">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="088e4-3545">10 个数字和一个连字符：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-3545">10 digits and a hyphen:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-3546">对应于 DD.2016 (日期的六个数字) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-3546">six digits that correspond to the birth date (DDMMYY)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-3547">连字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-3547">a hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-3548">对应于序列号的四个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-3548">four digits that correspond to a sequence number</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-3549">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-3549">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="088e4-3550">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-3550">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-3551">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-3551">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="088e4-3552">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-3552">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-3553">该  `Func_denmark_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` 函数查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-3553">The function  `Func_denmark_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-3554">找到一个  `Keywords_denmark_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` 关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-3554">A keyword from  `Keywords_denmark_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="088e4-3555">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-3555">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-3556">该  `Func_denmark_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` 函数查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-3556">The function  `Func_denmark_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU SSN or Equivalent Number -->
<Entity id="d24e32a4-c0bb-4ba8-899d-6303b95742d9" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_denmark_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_denmark_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
        </Pattern> 
       <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_denmark_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
        </Pattern>      
</Entity>
```

## <a name="drug-enforcement-agency-dea-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-3570">犯罪管制局 (DEA) 号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-3570">Drug Enforcement Agency (DEA) number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-3571">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-3571">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="088e4-3572">两个字母后跟七个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-3572">two letters followed by seven digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-3573">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-3573">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="088e4-3574">模式必须包括以下各项：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-3574">Pattern must include all of the following:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-3575">一个字母 (可能字母集) 不区分大小写：abcdefghjklmnprstux，这是一个注册表代码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-3575">one letter (not case-sensitive) from this set of possible letters: abcdefghjklmnprstux, which is a registrant code</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-3576">一个字母 (不区分大小写) ，即注册人姓氏或数字"9"的第一个字母</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-3576">one letter (not case-sensitive), which is the first letter of the registrant's last name or digit '9'</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-3577">七个数字，最后一个数字是检查数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-3577">seven digits, the last of which is the check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-3578">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-3578">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="088e4-3579">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-3579">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-3580">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-3580">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="088e4-3581">在 300 个字符的邻近度内，DLP 策略可高可信度地检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-3581">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-3582">函数 Func_dea_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-3582">The function Func_dea_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-3583">找到一个 `Keyword_dea_number` 关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-3583">A keyword from `Keyword_dea_number` is found</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-3584">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-3584">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="088e4-3585">在 300 个字符的邻近度内，DLP 策略具有中等可信度，即检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-3585">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-3586">函数 Func_dea_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-3586">The function Func_dea_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-3587">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-3587">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
    <!-- DEA Number -->
    <Entity id="9a5445ad-406e-43eb-8bd7-cac17ab6d0e4" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_dea_number" />
      </Pattern>
      <Version minEngineVersion="15.20.1207.000" maxEngineVersion="15.20.3134.000">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_dea_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Version>
      <Version minEngineVersion="15.20.3135.000">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_dea_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_dea_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Version>
    </Entity>
```

#### <a name="keyword_dea_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-3589">Keyword_dea_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-3589">Keyword_dea_number</span></span>

## <a name="estonia-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-3594">爱沙尼亚驾驶证号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-3594">Estonia driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-3595">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-3595">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="088e4-3596">两个字母后跟六个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-3596">two letters followed by six digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-3597">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-3597">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="088e4-3598">两个字母和六个数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-3598">two letters and six digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-3599">字母"ET" (不区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-3599">the letters "ET" (not case-sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-3600">六个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-3600">six digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-3601">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-3601">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="088e4-3602">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-3602">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-3603">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-3603">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="088e4-3604">在 300 个字符的邻近度内，DLP 策略具有中等可信度，即检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-3604">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-3605">正则表达式查找  `Regex_estonia_eu_driver's_license_number` 与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-3605">The regular expression  `Regex_estonia_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-3606">找到或  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` 找到 `Keywords_estonia_eu_driver's_license_number` 的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-3606">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_estonia_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Estonia Driver's License Number -->
      <Entity id="51da8171-da70-4cc1-9d65-055a59ca4f83" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_estonia_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_estonia_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="estonia-personal-identification-code"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-3732">爱沙尼亚个人标识代码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-3732">Estonia Personal Identification Code</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="088e4-3733">此敏感信息类型仅适用于：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-3733">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-3734">数据丢失防护策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-3734">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-3735">通信合规性策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-3735">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-3736">信息治理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-3736">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-3737">记录管理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-3737">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-3738">Microsoft 云应用安全</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-3738">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-3739">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-3739">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="088e4-3740">11 个数字，不带空格和分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-3740">11 digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-3741">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-3741">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="088e4-3742">11 个数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-3742">11 digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-3743">一个数字，对应于性生活和百年 (奇数男性，偶数男性;1-2：19 世纪;3-4：20 世纪;5-6：21 世纪) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-3743">one digit that corresponds to sex and century of birth (odd number male, even number female; 1-2: 19th century; 3-4: 20th century; 5-6: 21st century)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-3744">六个数字，对应于 YYMMDD (出生日期) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-3744">six digits that correspond to date of birth (YYMMDD)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-3745">三个数字，对应于同一日期出生日期分隔的序列号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-3745">three digits that correspond to a serial number separating persons born on the same date</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-3746">一个检查数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-3746">one check digit</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-3747">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-3747">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="088e4-3748">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-3748">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-3749">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-3749">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="088e4-3750">在 300 个字符的邻近度内，DLP 策略可高可信度地检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-3750">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-3751">该  `Func_estonia_eu_national_id_card` 函数查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-3751">The function  `Func_estonia_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-3752">找到一个  `Keywords_estonia_eu_national_id_card` 关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-3752">A keyword from  `Keywords_estonia_eu_national_id_card` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="088e4-3753">在 300 个字符的邻近度内，DLP 策略具有中等可信度，即检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-3753">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-3754">该  `Func_estonia_eu_national_id_card` 函数查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-3754">The function  `Func_estonia_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Estonia Personal Identification Code -->
      <Entity id="bfb26de6-dad5-4d48-ab72-4789cdd0654c" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_estonia_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_estonia_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_estonia_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_estonia_eu_telephone_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_estonia_eu_mobile_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="estonia-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-3787">爱沙尼亚护照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-3787">Estonia passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-3788">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-3788">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="088e4-3789">一个字母后跟七个数字，无空格或分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-3789">one letter followed by seven digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-3790">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-3790">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="088e4-3791">一个字母后跟七个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-3791">one letter followed by seven digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-3792">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-3792">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="088e4-3793">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-3793">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-3794">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-3794">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="088e4-3795">在 300 个字符的邻近度内，DLP 策略可高可信度地检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-3795">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-3796">正则表达式查找  `Regex_estonia_eu_passport_number` 与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-3796">The regular expression  `Regex_estonia_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-3797">找到或  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` 找到 `Keywords_estonia_eu_passport_number` 的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-3797">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_estonia_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-3798">正则表达式查找 `Regex_eu_passport_date1` DD.MM.YYYY 格式的日期或找到 `Keywords_eu_passport_date` 的关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-3798">The regular expression `Regex_eu_passport_date1` finds date in the format DD.MM.YYYY or a keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_date` is found</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="088e4-3799">在 300 个字符的邻近度内，DLP 策略具有中等可信度，即检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-3799">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-3800">正则表达式查找  `Regex_estonia_eu_passport_number` 与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-3800">The regular expression  `Regex_estonia_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-3801">找到或  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` 找到 `Keywords_estonia_eu_passport_number` 的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-3801">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_estonia_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Estonia Passport Number -->
      <Entity id="61f7073a-509e-425b-a754-bc01bb5d5b8c" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_estonia_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_estonia_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Regex_eu_passport_date1" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_date" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_estonia_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_estonia_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="eu-debit-card-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-3819">欧盟借记卡号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-3819">EU debit card number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-3820">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-3820">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="088e4-3821">16 个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-3821">16 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-3822">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-3822">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="088e4-3823">复杂可靠的模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-3823">Complex and robust pattern</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-3824">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-3824">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="088e4-3825">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-3825">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-3826">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-3826">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="088e4-3827">在 300 个字符的邻近度内，DLP 策略可高可信度地检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-3827">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-3828">函数 Func_eu_debit_card 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-3828">The function Func_eu_debit_card finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-3829">下列至少其中一项为真：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-3829">At least one of the following is true:</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="088e4-3830">找到 Keyword_eu_debit_card 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-3830">A keyword from Keyword_eu_debit_card is found.</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="088e4-3831">找到 Keyword_card_terms_dict 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-3831">A keyword from Keyword_card_terms_dict is found.</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="088e4-3832">找到 Keyword_card_security_terms_dict 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-3832">A keyword from Keyword_card_security_terms_dict is found.</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="088e4-3833">找到 Keyword_card_expiration_terms_dict 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-3833">A keyword from Keyword_card_expiration_terms_dict is found.</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="088e4-3834">函数 Func_expiration_date 找到正确日期格式的日期。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-3834">The function Func_expiration_date finds a date in the right date format.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-3835">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-3835">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
    <!-- EU Debit Card Number -->
    <Entity id="0e9b3178-9678-47dd-a509-37222ca96b42" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_eu_debit_card" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_eu_debit_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_card_terms_dict" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_card_security_terms_dict" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_card_expiration_terms_dict" />
          <Match idRef="Func_expiration_date" />
        </Any>
      </Pattern>
    </Entity>
```

## <a name="finland-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-4282">芬兰驾驶证号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-4282">Finland driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-4283">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-4283">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="088e4-4284">10 个数字，包含连字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-4284">10 digits containing a hyphen</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-4285">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-4285">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="088e4-4286">包含连字符的 10 个数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-4286">10 digits containing a hyphen:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-4287">六个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-4287">six digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-4288">连字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-4288">a hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-4289">三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-4289">three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-4290">数字或字母</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-4290">a digit or letter</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-4291">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-4291">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="088e4-4292">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-4292">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-4293">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-4293">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="088e4-4294">在 300 个字符的邻近度内，DLP 策略具有中等可信度，即检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-4294">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-4295">正则表达式查找  `Regex_finland_eu_driver's_license_number` 与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-4295">The regular expression  `Regex_finland_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-4296">找到或  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` 找到 `Keywords_finland_eu_driver's_license_number` 的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-4296">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_finland_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Finland Driver's License Number -->
      <Entity id="bb3b27a3-79bd-4ac4-81a7-f9fca3c7d1a7" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_finland_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_finland_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="finland-european-health-insurance-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-4427">芬兰欧洲健康保险号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-4427">Finland european health insurance number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="088e4-4428">此敏感信息类型仅适用于：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-4428">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-4429">数据丢失防护策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-4429">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-4430">通信合规性策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-4430">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-4431">信息治理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-4431">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-4432">记录管理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-4432">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-4433">Microsoft 云应用安全</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-4433">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-4434">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-4434">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="088e4-4435">20 位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-4435">20-digit number</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-4436">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-4436">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="088e4-4437">20 位数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-4437">20-digit number:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-4438">10 个数字 - 8024680246</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-4438">10 digits - 8024680246</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-4439">可选空格或连字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-4439">an optional space or hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-4440">10 个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-4440">10 digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-4441">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-4441">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="088e4-4442">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-4442">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-4443">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-4443">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="088e4-4444">在 300 个字符的邻近度内，DLP 策略具有中等可信度，即检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-4444">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-4445">正则表达式Regex_Finland_European_Health_Insurance_Number查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-4445">The regex Regex_Finland_European_Health_Insurance_Number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-4446">找到搜索Keyword_Finland_European_Health_Insurance_Number关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-4446">A keyword from Keyword_Finland_European_Health_Insurance_Number is found.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Finland European Health Insurance Number -->
      <Entity id="60f75aed-81bf-4625-89b0-0846b9248ee7" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_Finland_European_Health_Insurance_Number"/>
          <Match idRef="Keyword_Finland_European_Health_Insurance_Number"/>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="finland-national-id"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-4464">芬兰国家/区 ID</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-4464">Finland national ID</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-4465">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-4465">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="088e4-4466">六个数字加上一个字符，指示一个世纪加三个数字加上一个检查数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-4466">six digits plus a character indicating a century plus three digits plus a check digit</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-4467">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-4467">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="088e4-4468">模式必须包括以下各项：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-4468">Pattern must include all of the following:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-4469">六个数字，格式为 DDMMYY，即出生日期</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-4469">six digits in the format DDMMYY, which are a date of birth</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-4470">century marker (either '-'， '+' or 'a') </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-4470">century marker (either '-', '+' or 'a')</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-4471">三位数的个人标识号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-4471">three-digit personal identification number</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-4472">一个数字或字母 (不区分大小写) 是一个检查数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-4472">a digit or letter (case insensitive) which is a check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-4473">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-4473">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="088e4-4474">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-4474">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-4475">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-4475">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="088e4-4476">在 300 个字符的邻近度内，DLP 策略可高可信度地检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-4476">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-4477">函数Func_finnish_national_id查找与模式匹配的内容</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-4477">the function Func_finnish_national_id finds content that matches the pattern</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-4478">找到来自Keyword_finnish_national_id的关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-4478">a keyword from Keyword_finnish_national_id is found</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-4479">校验和传递</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-4479">the checksum passes</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="088e4-4480">在 300 个字符的邻近度内，DLP 策略具有中等可信度，即检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-4480">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-4481">函数Func_finnish_national_id查找与模式匹配的内容</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-4481">the function Func_finnish_national_id finds content that matches the pattern</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-4482">校验和传递</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-4482">the checksum passes</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Finnish National ID-->
      <Entity id="338FD995-4CB5-4F87-AD35-79BD1DD926C1" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_finnish_national_id" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_finnish_national_id" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_finnish_national_id" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="finland-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-4531">芬兰护照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-4531">Finland passport number</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="088e4-4532">此敏感信息类型实体在欧盟护照号码敏感信息类型中可用，并作为独立的敏感信息类型实体提供。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-4532">This sensitive information type entity is available in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type and is available as a stand-alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-4533">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-4533">Format</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="088e4-4534">九个字母和数字的组合</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-4534">combination of nine letters and digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-4535">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-4535">Pattern</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="088e4-4536">九个字母和数字的组合：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-4536">combination of nine letters and digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-4537">两个字母 (不区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-4537">two letters (not case-sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-4538">七个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-4538">seven digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-4539">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-4539">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="088e4-4540">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-4540">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-4541">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-4541">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="088e4-4542">在 300 个字符的邻近度内，DLP 策略具有中等可信度，即检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-4542">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-4543">正则表达式 Regex_finland_passport_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-4543">The regular expression Regex_finland_passport_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-4544">找到来自Keywords_eu_passport_number_common或Keyword_finland_passport_number关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-4544">A keyword from Keywords_eu_passport_number_common or Keyword_finland_passport_number is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Finland Passport Number -->
<Entity id="d1685ac3-1d3a-40f8-8198-32ef5669c7a5" recommendedConfidence="75" patternsProximity="300">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_finland_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number_common" />
            <Match idRef="Keyword_finland_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="france-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-4565">法国驾驶证号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-4565">France driver's license number</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="088e4-4566">此敏感信息类型实体在欧盟驾驶证号码敏感信息类型中可用，并作为独立的敏感信息类型实体提供。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-4566">This sensitive information type entity is available in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type and is available as a stand-alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-4567">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-4567">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="088e4-4568">12 个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-4568">12 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-4569">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-4569">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="088e4-4570">12 个数字，会对类似模式（如法国电话号码）进行验证</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-4570">12 digits with validation to discount similar patterns such as French telephone numbers</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-4571">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-4571">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="088e4-4572">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-4572">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-4573">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-4573">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="088e4-4574">在 300 个字符的邻近度内，DLP 策略具有中等可信度，即检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-4574">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-4575">函数Func_french_drivers_license查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-4575">the function Func_french_drivers_license finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-4576">找到Keyword_french_drivers_license关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-4576">a keyword from Keyword_french_drivers_license is found.</span></span>

```xml
    <!-- France Driver's License Number -->
    <Entity id="18e55a36-a01b-4b0f-943d-dc10282a1824" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_french_drivers_license" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_french_drivers_license" />
      </Pattern>
    </Entity>
```

## <a name="france-health-insurance-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-4703">法国健康保险号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-4703">France health insurance number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="088e4-4704">此敏感信息类型仅适用于：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-4704">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-4705">数据丢失防护策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-4705">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-4706">通信合规性策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-4706">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-4707">信息治理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-4707">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-4708">记录管理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-4708">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-4709">Microsoft 云应用安全</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-4709">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-4710">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-4710">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="088e4-4711">21 位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-4711">21-digit number</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-4712">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-4712">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="088e4-4713">21 位数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-4713">21-digit number:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-4714">10 个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-4714">10 digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-4715">可选空格</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-4715">an optional space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-4716">10 个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-4716">10 digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-4717">可选空格</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-4717">an optional space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-4718">一个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-4718">a digit</span></span>


### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-4719">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-4719">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="088e4-4720">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-4720">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-4721">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-4721">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="088e4-4722">在 300 个字符的邻近度内，DLP 策略具有中等可信度，即检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-4722">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-4723">正则表达式Regex_France_Health_Insurance_Number查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-4723">the regex Regex_France_Health_Insurance_Number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-4724">找到Keyword_France_Health_Insurance_Number关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-4724">a keyword from Keyword_France_Health_Insurance_Number is found.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- France Health Insurance Number -->
      <Entity id="9bc2069e-76df-4ff9-ac02-2f519469e236" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_France_Health_Insurance_Number"/>
          <Match idRef="Keyword_France_Health_Insurance_Number"/>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```
### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-4725">关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-4725">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_france_health_insurance_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-4726">Keyword_France_health_insurance_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-4726">Keyword_France_health_insurance_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-4727">insurance card</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-4727">insurance card</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-4728">carte vitale</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-4728">carte vitale</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-4729">carte d'assuré social</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-4729">carte d'assuré social</span></span>


## <a name="france-national-id-card-cni"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-4730">法国国家/ (CNI) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-4730">France national id card (CNI)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-4731">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-4731">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="088e4-4732">12 个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-4732">12 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-4733">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-4733">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="088e4-4734">12 个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-4734">12 digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-4735">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-4735">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="088e4-4736">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-4736">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-4737">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-4737">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="088e4-4738">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，置信度较低：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-4738">A DLP policy has low confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-4739">正则表达式 Regex_france_cni 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-4739">The regular expression Regex_france_cni finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-4740">找到搜索Keywords_france_eu_national_id_card关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-4740">A keyword from Keywords_france_eu_national_id_card is found.</span></span>

```xml
    <!-- France CNI -->
    <Entity id="f741ac74-1bc0-4665-b69b-f0c7f927c0c4" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="65">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_france_cni" />
        <Match idRef="Keywords_france_eu_national_id_card" />
      </Pattern>
    </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-4741">关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-4741">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keywords_france_eu_national_id_card"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-4742">Keywords_france_eu_national_id_card</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-4742">Keywords_france_eu_national_id_card</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-4743">card number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-4743">card number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-4744">carte nationale d'identité</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-4744">carte nationale d’identité</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-4745">carte nationale d'idenite no</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-4745">carte nationale d'idenite no</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-4746">cni#</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-4746">cni#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-4747">cni</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-4747">cni</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-4748">compte bancaire</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-4748">compte bancaire</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-4749">national identification number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-4749">national identification number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-4750">national identity</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-4750">national identity</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-4751">nationalidno#</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-4751">nationalidno#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-4752">numéro d'assurance mal访问</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-4752">numéro d'assurance maladie</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-4753">numéro de carte vitale</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-4753">numéro de carte vitale</span></span>

   
## <a name="france-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-4754">法国护照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-4754">France passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="088e4-4755">此敏感信息类型实体在欧盟护照号码敏感信息类型中可用。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-4755">This sensitive information type entity is available in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="088e4-4756">它作为独立的敏感信息类型实体提供。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-4756">It's available as a stand-alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-4757">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-4757">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="088e4-4758">九个数字和字母</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-4758">nine digits and letters</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-4759">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-4759">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="088e4-4760">九个数字和字母：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-4760">nine digits and letters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-4761">两个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-4761">two digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-4762">两个字母 (不区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-4762">two letters (not case-sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-4763">五个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-4763">five digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-4764">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-4764">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="088e4-4765">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-4765">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-4766">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-4766">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="088e4-4767">在 300 个字符的邻近度内，DLP 策略具有中等可信度，即检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-4767">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-4768">函数 Func_fr_passport 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-4768">The function Func_fr_passport finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-4769">找到 Keyword_passport 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-4769">A keyword from Keyword_passport is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- France Passport Number -->
<Entity id="3008b884-8c8c-4cd8-a289-99f34fc7ff5d" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_fr_passport" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_passport" />
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="france-social-security-number-insee-or-equivalent-identification"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-4790">法国社会保险号 (INSEE) 或等效标识</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-4790">France social security number (INSEE) or equivalent identification</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="088e4-4791">此敏感信息类型实体包含在欧盟社会保险号和等效 ID 敏感信息类型中。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-4791">This sensitive information type entity is included in the EU Social Security Number and Equivalent ID sensitive information type.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="088e4-4792">它作为独立的敏感信息类型实体提供。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-4792">It's available as a stand-alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-4793">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-4793">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="088e4-4794">15 个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-4794">15 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-4795">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-4795">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="088e4-4796">必须匹配两种模式之一：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-4796">Must match one of two patterns:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-4797">13 个数字后跟一个空格，后跟两个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-4797">13 digits followed by a space followed by two digits</span></span><br/>
<span data-ttu-id="088e4-4798">或</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-4798">or</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-4799">15 个连续的数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-4799">15 consecutive digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-4800">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-4800">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="088e4-4801">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-4801">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-4802">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-4802">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="088e4-4803">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 95% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-4803">A DLP policy is 95% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-4804">该函数Func_french_insee或Func_fr_insee找到与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-4804">The function Func_french_insee or Func_fr_insee finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-4805">找到 Keyword_fr_insee 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-4805">A keyword from Keyword_fr_insee is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-4806">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-4806">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="088e4-4807">在 300 个字符的邻近度内，DLP 策略可高可信度地检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-4807">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-4808">该函数Func_french_insee或Func_fr_insee找到与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-4808">The function Func_french_insee or Func_fr_insee finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-4809">未找到 Keyword_fr_insee 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-4809">No keyword from Keyword_fr_insee is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-4810">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-4810">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- France INSEE -->
<Entity id="71f62b97-efe0-4aa1-aa49-e14de253619d" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="95">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_french_insee" />
        <Match idRef="Func_fr_insee" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_fr_insee" />
        </Any>
  </Pattern>
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_french_insee" />
        <Match idRef="Func_fr_insee" />
        <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_fr_insee" />
        </Any>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="france-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-4836">法国税务标识号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-4836">France tax identification number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-4837">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-4837">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="088e4-4838">13 位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-4838">13 digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-4839">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-4839">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="088e4-4840">13 位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-4840">13 digits</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-4841">一个数字，必须为 0、1、2 或 3</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-4841">One digit that must be 0, 1, 2, or 3</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-4842">一位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-4842">One digit</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-4843">一个空格（可选） </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-4843">A space (optional)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-4844">两位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-4844">Two digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-4845">一个空格（可选） </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-4845">A space (optional)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-4846">三个数字 </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-4846">Three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-4847">一个空格（可选） </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-4847">A space (optional)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-4848">三个数字 </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-4848">Three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-4849">一个空格（可选） </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-4849">A space (optional)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-4850">三个检查数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-4850">Three check digits</span></span> 

  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-4851">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-4851">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="088e4-4852">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-4852">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-4853">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-4853">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="088e4-4854">在 300 个字符的邻近度内，DLP 策略可高可信度地检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-4854">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-4855">该  `Func_france_eu_tax_file_number` 函数查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-4855">The function  `Func_france_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-4856">找到一个  `Keywords_france_eu_tax_file_number` 关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-4856">A keyword from  `Keywords_france_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="088e4-4857">在 300 个字符的邻近度内，DLP 策略具有中等可信度，即检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-4857">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-4858">该  `Func_france_eu_tax_file_number` 函数查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-4858">The function  `Func_france_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- France Tax Identification Number (numéro SPI.) -->
      <Entity id="ed59e77e-171d-442c-9ec1-88e2ebcb5b0a" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_france_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_france_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_france_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_france_eu_telephone_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_france_eu_mobile_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>

```

## <a name="france-value-added-tax-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-4878">法国增值税编号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-4878">France value added tax number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="088e4-4879">此敏感信息类型仅适用于：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-4879">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-4880">数据丢失防护策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-4880">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-4881">通信合规性策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-4881">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-4882">信息治理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-4882">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-4883">记录管理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-4883">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-4884">Microsoft 云应用安全</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-4884">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-4885">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-4885">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="088e4-4886">13 个字符字母数字模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-4886">13 character alphanumeric pattern</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-4887">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-4887">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="088e4-4888">13 个字符字母数字模式：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-4888">13 character alphanumeric pattern:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-4889">两个字母 - FR (不区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-4889">two letters  - FR (case insensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-4890">可选空格或连字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-4890">an optional space or hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-4891">两个字母或数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-4891">two letters or digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-4892">可选空格、点、连字符或逗号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-4892">an optional space, dot, hyphen, or comma</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-4893">三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-4893">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-4894">可选空格、点、连字符或逗号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-4894">an optional space, dot, hyphen, or comma</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-4895">三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-4895">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-4896">可选空格、点、连字符或逗号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-4896">an optional space, dot, hyphen, or comma</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-4897">三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-4897">three digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-4898">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-4898">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="088e4-4899">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-4899">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-4900">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-4900">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="088e4-4901">在 300 个字符的邻近度内，DLP 策略可高可信度地检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-4901">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-4902">此函数Func_france_value_added_tax_number查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-4902">The function Func_france_value_added_tax_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-4903">找到搜索Keywords_france_value_added_tax_number关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-4903">A keyword from Keywords_france_value_added_tax_number is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="088e4-4904">在 300 个字符的邻近度内，DLP 策略具有中等可信度，即检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-4904">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-4905">此函数Func_france_value_added_tax_number查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-4905">The function Func_france_value_added_tax_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- France Value Added Tax Number -->
      <Entity id="949121e6-ad9f-4379-8731-710342baea78" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_france_value_added_tax_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_france_value_added_tax_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_france_value_added_tax_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```
### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-4906">关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-4906">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_france_value_added_tax_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-4907">Keyword_France_value_added_tax_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-4907">Keyword_France_value_added_tax_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-4908">vat number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-4908">vat number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-4910">vat#</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-4910">vat#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-4911">增值税</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-4911">value added tax</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-4912">siren identification no numéro d'identification taxe sur sur surur ajoutée</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-4912">siren identification no numéro d'identification taxe sur valeur ajoutée</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-4913">taxeur ajoutée</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-4913">taxe valeur ajoutée</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-4914">taxe sur laur ajoutée</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-4914">taxe sur la valeur ajoutée</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-4915">n° tva</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-4915">n° tva</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-4916">numéro de tva</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-4916">numéro de tva</span></span>

## <a name="germany-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-4918">德国驾驶证号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-4918">Germany driver's license number</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="088e4-4919">此敏感信息类型实体包含在欧盟驾驶证号码敏感信息类型中。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-4919">This sensitive information type entity is included in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="088e4-4920">它作为独立的敏感信息类型实体提供。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-4920">It's available as a stand-alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-4921">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-4921">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="088e4-4922">11 个数字和字母的组合</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-4922">combination of 11 digits and letters</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-4923">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-4923">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="088e4-4924">11 个数字和字母 (不) 区分大小写：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-4924">11 digits and letters (not case-sensitive):</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-4925">数字或字母</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-4925">a digit or letter</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-4926">两个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-4926">two digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-4927">六个数字或字母</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-4927">six digits or letters</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-4928">一个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-4928">a digit</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-4929">数字或字母</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-4929">a digit or letter</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-4930">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-4930">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="088e4-4931">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-4931">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-4932">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-4932">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="088e4-4933">在 300 个字符的邻近度内，DLP 策略具有中等可信度，即检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-4933">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-4934">函数 Func_german_drivers_license 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-4934">The function Func_german_drivers_license finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-4935">找到 Keyword_german_drivers_license_number 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-4935">A keyword from Keyword_german_drivers_license_number is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-4936">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-4936">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
    <!-- German Driver's License Number -->
    <Entity id="91da9335-1edb-45b7-a95f-5fe41a16c63c" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_german_drivers_license" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_german_drivers_license" />
      </Pattern>
    </Entity>
```

## <a name="germany-identity-card-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-5085">德国身份证号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-5085">Germany identity card number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-5086">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-5086">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="088e4-5087">自 2010 年 11 月 1 日起：九个字母和数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-5087">since 1 November 2010: Nine letters and digits</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="088e4-5088">从 1987 年 4 月 1 日到 2010 年 10 月 31 日：10 个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-5088">from 1 April 1987 until 31 October 2010: 10 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-5089">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-5089">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="088e4-5090">自 2010 年 11 月 1 日起：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-5090">since 1 November 2010:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-5091">一个字母 (不区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-5091">one letter (not case-sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-5092">八个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-5092">eight digits</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="088e4-5093">从 1987 年 4 月 1 日到 2010 年 10 月 31 日：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-5093">from 1 April 1987 until 31 October 2010:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-5094">10 个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-5094">10 digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-5095">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-5095">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="088e4-5096">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-5096">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-5097">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-5097">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="088e4-5098">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，置信度较低：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-5098">A DLP policy has low confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-5099">正则表达式 Regex_germany_id_card 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-5099">The regular expression Regex_germany_id_card finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-5100">找到 Keyword_germany_id_card 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-5100">A keyword from Keyword_germany_id_card is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Germany Identity Card Number -->
<Entity id="e577372f-c42e-47a0-9d85-bebed1c237d4" recommendedConfidence="65" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
     <IdMatch idRef="Regex_germany_id_card"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_germany_id_card"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-5101">关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-5101">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_germany_id_card"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-5102">Keyword_germany_id_card</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-5102">Keyword_germany_id_card</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-5103">aus一s</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-5103">ausweis</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-5104">gpid</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-5104">gpid</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-5105">identification</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-5105">identification</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-5106">identifikation</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-5106">identifikation</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-5107">identifizierungsnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-5107">identifizierungsnummer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-5108">identity card</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-5108">identity card</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-5109">标识号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-5109">identity number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-5110">id-nummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-5110">id-nummer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-5111">个人 ID</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-5111">personal id</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-5112">personalaus一s</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-5112">personalausweis</span></span>
