## <a name="germany-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-5116">德国护照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-5116">Germany passport number</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="088e4-5117">此敏感信息类型实体包含在欧盟护照号码敏感信息类型中，并作为独立的敏感信息类型实体提供。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-5117">This sensitive information type entity is included in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type and is available as a stand-alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-5118">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-5118">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="088e4-5119">10 个数字或字母</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-5119">10 digits or letters</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-5120">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-5120">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="088e4-5121">模式必须包括以下各项：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-5121">Pattern must include all of the following:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-5122">第一个字符是此集合中的数字或字母 (C、F、G、H、J、K) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-5122">first character is a digit or a letter from this set (C, F, G, H, J, K)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-5123">三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-5123">three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-5124">此集合中的五个数字或字母 (C、-H、J-N、P、R、T、V-Z) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-5124">five digits or letters from this set (C, -H, J-N, P, R, T, V-Z)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-5125">一个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-5125">a digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-5126">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-5126">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="088e4-5127">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-5127">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-5128">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-5128">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="088e4-5129">在 300 个字符的邻近度内，DLP 策略可高可信度地检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-5129">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-5130">函数 Func_german_passport 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-5130">The function Func_german_passport finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-5131">找到或 `Keyword_german_passport` 找到 `Keywords_eu_passport_number_common` 的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-5131">A keyword from `Keyword_german_passport` or `Keywords_eu_passport_number_common` is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-5132">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-5132">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="088e4-5133">在 300 个字符的邻近度内，DLP 策略具有中等可信度，即检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-5133">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-5134">函数 Func_german_passport_data 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-5134">The function Func_german_passport_data finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-5135">找到或 `Keyword_german_passport` 找到 `Keywords_eu_passport_number_common` 的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-5135">A keyword from `Keyword_german_passport` or `Keywords_eu_passport_number_common` is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-5136">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-5136">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
    <!-- German Passport Number -->
    <Entity id="2e3da144-d42b-47ed-b123-fbf78604e52c" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_german_passport" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_german_passport" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number_common" />
        </Any>
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_german_passport_data" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_german_passport" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number_common" />
        </Any>
      </Pattern>
    </Entity>
```

## <a name="germany-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-5159">德国税务标识号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-5159">Germany tax identification number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-5160">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-5160">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="088e4-5161">11 个数字，不带空格和分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-5161">11 digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-5162">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-5162">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="088e4-5163">11 个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-5163">11 digits</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-5164">两位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-5164">Two digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-5165">可选空格</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-5165">An optional space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-5166">三位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-5166">Three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-5167">可选空格</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-5167">An optional space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-5168">三位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-5168">Three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-5169">可选空格</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-5169">An optional space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-5170">两位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-5170">Two digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-5171">一个检查数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-5171">one check digit</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-5172">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-5172">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="088e4-5173">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-5173">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-5174">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-5174">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="088e4-5175">在 300 个字符的邻近度内，DLP 策略可高可信度地检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-5175">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-5176">该  `Func_germany_eu_tax_file_number` 函数查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-5176">The function  `Func_germany_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-5177">找到一个  `Keywords_germany_eu_tax_file_number` 关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-5177">A keyword from  `Keywords_germany_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="088e4-5178">在 300 个字符的邻近度内，DLP 策略具有中等可信度，即检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-5178">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-5179">该  `Func_germany_eu_tax_file_number` 函数查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-5179">The function  `Func_germany_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Germany Tax Identification Number -->
      <Entity id="43316a89-9880-40cf-b980-04bc7eefcec5" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_germany_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_germany_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_germany_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="germany-value-added-tax-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-5205">德国增值税编号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-5205">Germany value added tax number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="088e4-5206">此敏感信息类型仅适用于：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-5206">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-5207">数据丢失防护策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-5207">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-5208">通信合规性策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-5208">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-5209">信息治理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-5209">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-5210">记录管理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-5210">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-5211">Microsoft 云应用安全</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-5211">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-5212">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-5212">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="088e4-5213">11 个字符字母数字模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-5213">11 character alphanumeric pattern</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-5214">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-5214">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="088e4-5215">11 个字符字母数字模式：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-5215">11-character alphanumeric pattern:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-5216">字母 D 或 d</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-5216">a letter D or d</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-5217">字母 E 或 e</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-5217">a letter E or e</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-5218">可选空格</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-5218">an optional space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-5219">三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-5219">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-5220">可选空格或逗号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-5220">an optional space or comma</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-5221">三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-5221">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-5222">可选空格或逗号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-5222">an optional space or comma</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-5223">三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-5223">three digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-5224">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-5224">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="088e4-5225">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-5225">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-5226">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-5226">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="088e4-5227">在 300 个字符的邻近度内，DLP 策略可高可信度地检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-5227">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-5228">函数Func_germany_value_added_tax_number查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-5228">The function Func_germany_value_added_tax_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-5229">找到搜索Keywords_germany_value_added_tax_number关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-5229">A keyword from Keywords_germany_value_added_tax_number is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="088e4-5230">在 300 个字符的邻近度内，DLP 策略具有中等可信度，即检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-5230">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-5231">函数Func_germany_value_added_tax_number查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-5231">The function Func_germany_value_added_tax_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Germany Value Added Tax Number -->
      <Entity id="db177eb2-8811-4842-bffc-128c14aa219f" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_germany_value_added_tax_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_germany_value_added_tax_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_germany_value_added_tax_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```
### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-5232">关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-5232">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_germany_value_added_tax_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-5233">Keyword_germany_value_added_tax_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-5233">Keyword_germany_value_added_tax_number</span></span>

## <a name="greece-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-5241">希腊驾驶证号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-5241">Greece driver's license number</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="088e4-5242">此敏感信息类型实体包含在欧盟驾驶证号码敏感信息类型中，并作为独立的敏感信息类型实体提供。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-5242">This sensitive information type entity is included in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type and is available as a stand-alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-5243">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-5243">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="088e4-5244">不带空格和分隔符的九个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-5244">nine digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-5245">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-5245">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="088e4-5246">九个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-5246">nine digits</span></span> 
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-5247">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-5247">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="088e4-5248">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-5248">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-5249">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-5249">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="088e4-5250">在 300 个字符的邻近度内，DLP 策略具有中等可信度，即检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-5250">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-5251">正则表达式查找  `Regex_greece_eu_driver's_license_number` 与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-5251">The regular expression  `Regex_greece_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-5252">找到或  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` 找到 `Keywords_greece_eu_driver's_license_number` 的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-5252">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_greece_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Greece Driver's License Number -->
      <Entity id="7a2200b5-aacf-4e3c-ab36-136d3e68b7da" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_greece_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_greece_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="greece-national-id-card"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-5378">希腊国家身份证</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-5378">Greece national ID card</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-5379">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-5379">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="088e4-5380">7-8 个字母和数字组合加一个短划线</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-5380">Combination of 7-8 letters and numbers plus a dash</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-5381">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-5381">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="088e4-5382">七个字母和数字（旧格式）：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-5382">Seven letters and numbers (old format):</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-5383">一个字母（希腊字母表中的任一字母） </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-5383">One letter (any letter of the Greek alphabet)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-5384">一个短划线 </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-5384">A dash</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-5385">六个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-5385">Six digits</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="088e4-5386">八个字母和数字（新格式）：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-5386">Eight letters and numbers (new format):</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-5387">大写字符同时出现在希腊和拉丁字母表中的两个字母 (ABEZHIKMNOPTYX) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-5387">Two letters whose uppercase character occurs in both the Greek and Latin alphabets (ABEZHIKMNOPTYX)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-5388">一个短划线 </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-5388">A dash</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-5389">六个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-5389">Six digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-5390">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-5390">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="088e4-5391">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-5391">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-5392">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-5392">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="088e4-5393">在 300 个字符的邻近度内，DLP 策略可高可信度地检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-5393">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-5394">正则表达式 Regex_greece_id_card 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-5394">The regular expression Regex_greece_id_card finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-5395">找到 Keyword_greece_id_card 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-5395">A keyword from Keyword_greece_id_card is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="088e4-5396">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，置信度较低：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-5396">A DLP policy has low confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-5397">正则表达式 Regex_greece_id_card 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-5397">The regular expression Regex_greece_id_card finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Greece National ID Card -->
      <Entity id="82568215-1da1-46d3-874a-d2294d81b5ac" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_greece_id_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_greece_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_greece_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-5398">关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-5398">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_greece_id_card"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-5399">Keyword_greece_id_card</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-5399">Keyword_greece_id_card</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-5400">希腊语 id</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-5400">greek id</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-5401">希腊语国家/区 ID</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-5401">greek national id</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-5402">希腊语个人 ID 卡</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-5402">greek personal id card</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-5403">希腊语的警察局 ID</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-5403">greek police id</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-5404">identity card</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-5404">identity card</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-5405">tautotita</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-5405">tautotita</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-5406">ταυτότητα</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-5406">ταυτότητα</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-5407">ταυτότητας</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-5407">ταυτότητας</span></span>


## <a name="greece-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-5408">希腊护照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-5408">Greece passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-5409">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-5409">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="088e4-5410">两个字母后跟七个数字，无空格或分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-5410">Two letters followed by seven digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-5411">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-5411">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="088e4-5412">两个字母后跟七个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-5412">Two letters followed by seven digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-5413">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-5413">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="088e4-5414">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-5414">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-5415">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-5415">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="088e4-5416">在 300 个字符的邻近度内，DLP 策略可高可信度地检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-5416">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-5417">正则表达式查找  `Regex_greece_eu_passport_number` 与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-5417">The regular expression  `Regex_greece_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-5418">找到或  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` 找到 `Keywords_greece_eu_passport_number` 的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-5418">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_greece_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-5419">正则表达式查找 `Regex_greece_eu_passport_date` DD MMM YY 格式的日期 (示例 - 8 月 19) 或找到 `Keywords_greece_eu_passport_date` 关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-5419">The regular expression `Regex_greece_eu_passport_date` finds date in the format DD MMM YY (Example - 28 Aug 19) or a keyword from `Keywords_greece_eu_passport_date` is found</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="088e4-5420">在 300 个字符的邻近度内，DLP 策略具有中等可信度，即检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-5420">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-5421">正则表达式查找  `Regex_greece_eu_passport_number` 与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-5421">The regular expression  `Regex_greece_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-5422">找到或  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` 找到 `Keywords_greece_eu_passport_number` 的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-5422">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_greece_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Greece Passport Number -->
      <Entity id="7e65eb47-cdf9-4f52-8f90-2a27d5ee67e3" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_greece_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_greece_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Regex_greece_eu_passport_date" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_greece_eu_passport_date" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_greece_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_greece_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

#### <a name="keywords_eu_passport_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-5424">Keywords_eu_passport_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-5424">Keywords_eu_passport_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-5425">passport#</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-5425">passport#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-5426">passport#</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-5426">passport #</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-5427">passportid</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-5427">passportid</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-5428">passports</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-5428">passports</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-5429">passportno</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-5429">passportno</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-5430">passport no</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-5430">passport no</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-5431">passportnumber</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-5431">passportnumber</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-5432">passport number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-5432">passport number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-5433">passportnumbers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-5433">passportnumbers</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-5434">passport numbers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-5434">passport numbers</span></span>

#### <a name="keywords_greece_eu_passport_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-5435">Keywords_greece_eu_passport_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-5435">Keywords_greece_eu_passport_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-5436">αριθμός διαβατηρίου</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-5436">αριθμός διαβατηρίου</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-5437">αριθμούς διαβατηρίου</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-5437">αριθμούς διαβατηρίου</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-5438">αριθμός διαβατηριο</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-5438">αριθμός διαβατηριο</span></span>


## <a name="greece-social-security-number-amka"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-5439">希腊社会保险号码 (AMKA) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-5439">Greece Social Security Number (AMKA)</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="088e4-5440">此敏感信息类型仅适用于：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-5440">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-5441">数据丢失防护策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-5441">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-5442">通信合规性策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-5442">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-5443">信息治理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-5443">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-5444">记录管理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-5444">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-5445">Microsoft 云应用安全</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-5445">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-5446">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-5446">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="088e4-5447">无空格和分隔符的十一个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-5447">Eleven digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-5448">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-5448">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-5449">6 个数字作为出生日期 YYMMDD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-5449">6 digits as date of birth YYMMDD</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-5450">4 个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-5450">4 digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-5451">一个检查数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-5451">a check digit</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-5452">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-5452">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="088e4-5453">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-5453">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-5454">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-5454">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="088e4-5455">在 300 个字符的邻近度内，DLP 策略可高可信度地检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-5455">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-5456">该  `Func_greece_eu_ssn` 函数查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-5456">The function  `Func_greece_eu_ssn` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-5457">找到一个  `Keywords_greece_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` 关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-5457">A keyword from  `Keywords_greece_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="088e4-5458">在 300 个字符的邻近度内，DLP 策略具有中等可信度，即检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-5458">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-5459">该  `Func_greece_eu_ssn` 函数查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-5459">The function  `Func_greece_eu_ssn` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 

```xml
      <!-- Greece Social Security Number (AMKA) -->
      <Entity id="e39b03f4-50ea-41ae-af7a-a4b9539596ad" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_greece_eu_ssn" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_greece_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_greece_eu_ssn" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-5460">关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-5460">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keywords_greece_eu_ssn_or_equivalent"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-5461">Keywords_greece_eu_ssn_or_equivalent</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-5461">Keywords_greece_eu_ssn_or_equivalent</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-5462">ssn</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-5462">ssn</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-5463">ssn#</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-5463">ssn#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-5464">social security no</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-5464">social security no</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-5465">socialsecurityno#</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-5465">socialsecurityno#</span></span>

## <a name="greece-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-5470">希腊税务标识号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-5470">Greece tax identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="088e4-5471">此敏感信息类型仅适用于：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-5471">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-5472">数据丢失防护策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-5472">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-5473">通信合规性策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-5473">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-5474">信息治理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-5474">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-5475">记录管理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-5475">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-5476">Microsoft 云应用安全</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-5476">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-5477">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-5477">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="088e4-5478">九个数字，不带空格和分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-5478">Nine digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-5479">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-5479">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="088e4-5480">九个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-5480">Nine digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-5481">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-5481">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="088e4-5482">不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-5482">Not applicable</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-5483">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-5483">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="088e4-5484">在 300 个字符的邻近度内，DLP 策略具有中等可信度，即检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-5484">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-5485">正则表达式查找  `Regex_greece_eu_tax_file_number` 与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-5485">The regular expression  `Regex_greece_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-5486">找到一个  `Keywords_greece_eu_tax_file_number` 关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-5486">A keyword from  `Keywords_greece_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Greek Tax Identification Number -->
      <Entity id="15a54a5a-53d4-4080-ad43-a2a4fe1d3bf7" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_greece_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_greece_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="hong-kong-identity-card-hkid-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-5515">香港身份证号码 (HKID) 号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-5515">Hong Kong identity card (HKID) number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-5516">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-5516">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="088e4-5517">8-9 个字母和数字组合，最后一个字符两边可选择加括号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-5517">Combination of 8-9 letters and numbers plus optional parentheses around the final character</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-5518">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-5518">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="088e4-5519">8-9 个字母组合：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-5519">Combination of 8-9 letters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-5520">1-2 个字母 (不区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-5520">1-2 letters (not case-sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-5521">六个数字 </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-5521">Six digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-5522">最后一个字符（任意数字或字母 A）是校验位，两边可以选择加括号。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-5522">The final character (any digit or the letter A), which is the check digit and is optionally enclosed in parentheses.</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-5523">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-5523">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="088e4-5524">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-5524">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-5525">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-5525">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="088e4-5526">在 300 个字符的邻近度内，DLP 策略具有中等可信度，即检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-5526">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-5527">函数 Func_hong_kong_id_card 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-5527">The function Func_hong_kong_id_card finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-5528">找到 Keyword_hong_kong_id_card 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-5528">A keyword from Keyword_hong_kong_id_card is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-5529">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-5529">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="088e4-5530">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，置信度较低：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-5530">A DLP policy has low confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-5531">函数 Func_hong_kong_id_card 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-5531">The function Func_hong_kong_id_card finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-5532">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-5532">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Hong Kong Identity Card (HKID) number -->
<Entity id="e63c28a7-ad29-4c17-a41a-3d2a0b70fd9c" recommendedConfidence="75" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_hong_kong_id_card"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_hong_kong_id_card"/>
  </Pattern>
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_hong_kong_id_card"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="hungary-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-5572">匈牙利驾驶证号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-5572">Hungary driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-5573">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-5573">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="088e4-5574">两个字母后跟六个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-5574">Two letters followed by six digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-5575">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-5575">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="088e4-5576">两个字母和六个数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-5576">Two letters and six digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-5577">两个字母 (不区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-5577">Two letters (not case-sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-5578">六个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-5578">Six digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-5579">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-5579">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="088e4-5580">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-5580">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-5581">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-5581">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="088e4-5582">在 300 个字符的邻近度内，DLP 策略具有中等可信度，即检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-5582">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-5583">正则表达式查找  `Regex_hungary_eu_driver's_license_number` 与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-5583">The regular expression  `Regex_hungary_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-5584">找到或  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` 找到 `Keywords_hungary_eu_driver's_license_number` 的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-5584">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_hungary_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <Entity id="9d31c46b-6e6b-444c-aeb1-6dd7e604bb24" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_hungary_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_hungary_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="hungary-personal-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-5709">匈牙利个人标识号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-5709">Hungary personal identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="088e4-5710">此敏感信息类型仅适用于：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-5710">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-5711">数据丢失防护策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-5711">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-5712">通信合规性策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-5712">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-5713">信息治理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-5713">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-5714">记录管理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-5714">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-5715">Microsoft 云应用安全</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-5715">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-5716">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-5716">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="088e4-5717">11 个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-5717">11 digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-5718">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-5718">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="088e4-5719">11 个数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-5719">11 digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-5720">对于在 1900 之前 (或具有双重公民身份的公民，也可以对应性别（1-男性、2-) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-5720">One digit that corresponds to gender (1-male, 2-female, other numbers are also possible for citizens born before 1900 or citizens with double citizenship)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-5721">与 YYMMDD (日期对应的六个数字) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-5721">Six digits that correspond to birth date (YYMMDD)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-5722">对应于序列号的三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-5722">Three digits that correspond to a serial number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-5723">一个检查数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-5723">One check digit</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-5724">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-5724">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="088e4-5725">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-5725">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-5726">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-5726">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="088e4-5727">在 300 个字符的邻近度内，DLP 策略可高可信度地检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-5727">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-5728">该  `Func_hungary_eu_national_id_card` 函数查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-5728">The function  `Func_hungary_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-5729">找到一个  `Keywords_hungary_eu_national_id_card` 关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-5729">A keyword from  `Keywords_hungary_eu_national_id_card` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="088e4-5730">在 300 个字符的邻近度内，DLP 策略具有中等可信度，即检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-5730">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-5731">该  `Func_hungary_eu_national_id_card` 函数查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-5731">The function  `Func_hungary_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Hungary Personal Identification Number -->
      <Entity id="7b5cc218-7046-47d9-80c9-f325b50896ca" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_hungary_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_hungary_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_hungary_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_hungary_eu_telephone_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_hungary_eu_mobile_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-5732">关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-5732">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keywords_hungary_eu_national_id_card"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-5733">Keywords_hungary_eu_national_id_card</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-5733">Keywords_hungary_eu_national_id_card</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-5734">id number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-5734">id number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-5735">identification number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-5735">identification number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-5736">sz ig</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-5736">sz ig</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-5737">sz.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-5737">sz.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="088e4-5738">ig.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-5738">ig.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-5739">sz.ig.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-5739">sz.ig.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-5740">személyazonosító igazolvcioy</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-5740">személyazonosító igazolvány</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-5741">személyi igazolvméy</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-5741">személyi igazolvány</span></span>


## <a name="hungary-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-5742">匈牙利护照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-5742">Hungary passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-5743">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-5743">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="088e4-5744">两个字母后跟六个或七个数字，没有空格或分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-5744">Two letters followed by six or seven digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-5745">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-5745">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="088e4-5746">两个字母后跟六个或七个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-5746">Two letters followed by six or seven digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-5747">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-5747">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="088e4-5748">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-5748">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-5749">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-5749">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="088e4-5750">在 300 个字符的邻近度内，DLP 策略可高可信度地检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-5750">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-5751">正则表达式查找  `Regex_hungary_eu_passport_number` 与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-5751">The regular expression  `Regex_hungary_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-5752">找到或  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` 找到 `Keywords_hungary_eu_passport_number` 的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-5752">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_hungary_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-5753">正则表达式查找 `Regex_hungary_eu_passport_date` DD MMM/MMM YY (格式的日期 示例 - 01 MÁR/MAR 12) 或找到 `Keywords_eu_passport_date` 关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-5753">The regular expression `Regex_hungary_eu_passport_date` finds date in the format  DD MMM/MMM YY (Example - 01 MÁR/MAR 12) or a keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_date` is found</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="088e4-5754">在 300 个字符的邻近度内，DLP 策略具有中等可信度，即检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-5754">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-5755">正则表达式查找  `Regex_hungary_eu_passport_number` 与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-5755">The regular expression  `Regex_hungary_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-5756">找到或  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` 找到 `Keywords_hungary_eu_passport_number` 的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-5756">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_hungary_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Hungary Passport Number -->
      <Entity id="5b483910-9aa7-4c99-9917-f4001464bda7" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_hungary_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_hungary_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Regex_hungary_eu_passport_date" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_date" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_hungary_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_hungary_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="hungary-social-security-number-taj"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-5773">匈牙利社会保险号码 (TAJ) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-5773">Hungary social security number (TAJ)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-5774">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-5774">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="088e4-5775">九个数字，不带空格和分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-5775">Nine digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-5776">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-5776">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="088e4-5777">九个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-5777">Nine digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-5778">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-5778">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="088e4-5779">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-5779">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-5780">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-5780">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="088e4-5781">在 300 个字符的邻近度内，DLP 策略可高可信度地检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-5781">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-5782">该  `Func_hungary_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` 函数查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-5782">The function  `Func_hungary_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-5783">找到一个  `Keywords_hungary_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` 关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-5783">A keyword from  `Keywords_hungary_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="088e4-5784">在 300 个字符的邻近度内，DLP 策略具有中等可信度，即检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-5784">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-5785">该  `Func_hungary_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` 函数查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-5785">The function  `Func_hungary_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Hungarian Social Security Number (TAJ) -->
      <Entity id="0de78315-9537-47f5-95ab-b3e77eba3993" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_hungary_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_hungary_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_hungary_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-5789">social security number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-5789">social security number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-5802">hozzáadottottottték adó</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-5802">hozzáadottérték adó</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-5803">áfa szám</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-5803">áfa szám</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-5804">magyar áfa szám</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-5804">magyar áfa szám</span></span>


## <a name="hungary-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-5805">匈牙利税务标识号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-5805">Hungary tax identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="088e4-5806">此敏感信息类型仅适用于：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-5806">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-5807">数据丢失防护策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-5807">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-5808">通信合规性策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-5808">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-5809">信息治理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-5809">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-5810">记录管理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-5810">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-5811">Microsoft 云应用安全</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-5811">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-5812">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-5812">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="088e4-5813">10 个数字，无空格或分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-5813">10 digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-5814">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-5814">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="088e4-5815">10 个数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-5815">10 digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-5816">一个数字，必须为"8"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-5816">One digit that must be "8"</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-5817">八个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-5817">Eight digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-5818">一个检查数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-5818">One check digit</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-5819">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-5819">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="088e4-5820">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-5820">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-5821">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-5821">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="088e4-5822">在 300 个字符的邻近度内，DLP 策略可高可信度地检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-5822">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-5823">该  `Func_hungary_eu_tax_file_number` 函数查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-5823">The function  `Func_hungary_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-5824">找到一个  `Keywords_hungary_eu_tax_file_number` 关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-5824">A keyword from  `Keywords_hungary_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="088e4-5825">在 300 个字符的邻近度内，DLP 策略具有中等可信度，即检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-5825">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-5826">该  `Func_hungary_eu_tax_file_number` 函数查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-5826">The function  `Func_hungary_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Hungary Tax Identification Number -->
      <Entity id="ede42eb4-59d9-49eb-9603-d7853fbda91d" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_hungary_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_hungary_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_hungary_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_hungary_eu_telephone_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_hungary_eu_mobile_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="hungary-value-added-tax-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-5852">匈牙利增值税编号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-5852">Hungary value added tax number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="088e4-5853">此敏感信息类型仅适用于：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-5853">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-5854">数据丢失防护策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-5854">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-5855">通信合规性策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-5855">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-5856">信息治理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-5856">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-5857">记录管理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-5857">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-5858">Microsoft 云应用安全</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-5858">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-5859">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-5859">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="088e4-5860">10 个字符字母数字模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-5860">10 character alphanumeric pattern</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-5861">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-5861">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="088e4-5862">10 个字符字母数字模式：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-5862">10 character alphanumeric pattern:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-5863">两个字母 - HU 或 hu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-5863">two letters - HU or hu</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-5864">可选空间</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-5864">optional space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-5865">八个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-5865">eight digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-5866">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-5866">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="088e4-5867">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-5867">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-5868">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-5868">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="088e4-5869">在 300 个字符的邻近度内，DLP 策略可高可信度地检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-5869">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-5870">该函数Func_hungarian_value_added_tax_number查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-5870">The function Func_hungarian_value_added_tax_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-5871">找到来自Keywords_hungarian_value_added_tax_number关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-5871">A keyword from Keywords_hungarian_value_added_tax_number is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="088e4-5872">在 300 个字符的邻近度内，DLP 策略具有中等可信度，即检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-5872">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-5873">该函数Func_hungarian_value_added_tax_number查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-5873">The function Func_hungarian_value_added_tax_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Hungarian Value Added Tax Number -->
      <Entity id="976349a0-683b-477a-90f8-ff0a220d5592" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_hungarian_value_added_tax_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_hungarian_value_added_tax_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_hungarian_value_added_tax_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

#### <a name="keyword_hungary_value_added_tax_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-5875">Keyword_Hungary_value_added_tax_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-5875">Keyword_Hungary_value_added_tax_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-5876">vat</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-5876">vat</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-5879">vatno#</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-5879">vatno#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-5880">hungarianvatno#</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-5880">hungarianvatno#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-5881">tax no.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-5881">tax no.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-5882">增值税 áfa</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-5882">value added tax áfa</span></span>
