- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-5884">általcioos forgalmi adó szám</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-5884">általános forgalmi adó szám</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-5885">hozzáadottottottték adó</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-5885">hozzáadottérték adó</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-5886">áfa szám</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-5886">áfa szám</span></span>


## <a name="india-permanent-account-number-pan"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-5887">PAN (印度永久) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-5887">India permanent account number (PAN)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-5888">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-5888">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="088e4-5889">10 个字母或数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-5889">10 letters or digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-5890">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-5890">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="088e4-5891">10 个字母或数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-5891">10 letters or digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-5892">三个字母 (不区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-5892">Three letters (not case-sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-5893">C、P、H、F、A、T、B、L、J、G (不区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-5893">A letter in C, P, H, F, A, T, B, L, J, G (not case-sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-5894">一个字母</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-5894">A letter</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-5895">四位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-5895">Four digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-5896">字母是字母检查数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-5896">A letter that is an alphabetic check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-5897">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-5897">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="088e4-5898">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-5898">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-5899">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-5899">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="088e4-5900">在 300 个字符的邻近度内，DLP 策略可高可信度地检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-5900">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-5901">正则表达式 Regex_india_permanent_account_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-5901">The regular expression Regex_india_permanent_account_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-5902">找到 Keyword_india_permanent_account_number 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-5902">A keyword from Keyword_india_permanent_account_number is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="088e4-5903">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，置信度较低：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-5903">A DLP policy has low confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-5904">正则表达式 Regex_india_permanent_account_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-5904">The regular expression Regex_india_permanent_account_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>


```xml
      <!-- India Permanent Account Number -->
      <Entity id="2602bfee-9bb0-47a5-a7a6-2bf3053e2804" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_india_permanent_account_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_india_permanent_account_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Version minEngineVersion="15.20.3520.000">
          <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
            <IdMatch idRef="Regex_india_permanent_account_number" />
          </Pattern>
        </Version>
      </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-5905">关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-5905">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_india_permanent_account_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-5906">Keyword_india_permanent_account_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-5906">Keyword_india_permanent_account_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-5907">Permanent Account Number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-5907">Permanent Account Number</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-5908">PAN</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-5908">PAN</span></span> 
   
## <a name="india-unique-identification-aadhaar-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-5909">印度唯一 (Aadhaar) 编号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-5909">India unique identification (Aadhaar) number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-5910">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-5910">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="088e4-5911">12 个数字（包含可选空格或短划线）</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-5911">12 digits containing optional spaces or dashes</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-5912">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-5912">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="088e4-5913">12 个数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-5913">12 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-5914">不为 0 或 1 的数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-5914">A digit which is not 0 or 1</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-5915">三位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-5915">Three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-5916">一个可选空格或短划线 </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-5916">An optional space or dash</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-5917">四个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-5917">Four digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-5918">一个可选空格或短划线 </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-5918">An optional space or dash</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-5919">最后一个数字，即检查数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-5919">The final digit, which is the check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-5920">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-5920">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="088e4-5921">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-5921">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-5922">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-5922">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="088e4-5923">在 300 个字符的邻近度内，DLP 策略可高可信度地检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-5923">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-5924">函数 Func_india_aadhaar 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-5924">The function Func_india_aadhaar finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-5925">找到 Keyword_india_aadhar 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-5925">A keyword from Keyword_india_aadhar is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-5926">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-5926">The checksum passes.</span></span>
- 
<span data-ttu-id="088e4-5927">在 300 个字符的邻近度内，DLP 策略具有中等可信度，即检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-5927">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-5928">函数 Func_india_aadhaar 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-5928">The function Func_india_aadhaar finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-5929">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-5929">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- India Unique Identification (Aadhaar) number -->
<Entity id="1ca46b29-76f5-4f46-9383-cfa15e91048f" recommendedConfidence="85" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_india_aadhaar"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_india_aadhar"/>
  </Pattern>
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_india_aadhaar"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```
### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-5930">关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-5930">Keywords</span></span>
   
#### <a name="keyword_india_aadhar"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-5931">Keyword_india_aadhar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-5931">Keyword_india_aadhar</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-5932">aadhaar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-5932">aadhaar</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-5933">aadhar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-5933">aadhar</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-5934">aadhar#</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-5934">aadhar#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-5935">uid</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-5935">uid</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-5936">आधार</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-5936">आधार</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-5937">uidai</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-5937">uidai</span></span>
   
## <a name="indonesia-identity-card-ktp-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-5938">印度尼西亚身份证号码 (KTP) 号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-5938">Indonesia identity card (KTP) number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-5939">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-5939">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="088e4-5940">16 个数字（包含可选点）</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-5940">16 digits containing optional periods</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-5941">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-5941">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="088e4-5942">16 个数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-5942">16 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-5943">两位省代码 </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-5943">Two-digit province code</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-5944">一个点（可选） </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-5944">A period (optional)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-5945">两位摄政统治区或城市代码 </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-5945">Two-digit regency or city code</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-5946">两位住宅小区代码 </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-5946">Two-digit subdistrict code</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-5947">一个点（可选） </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-5947">A period (optional)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-5948">六个数字，格式为 DDMMYY，表示出生日期</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-5948">Six digits in the format DDMMYY, which are the date of birth</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-5949">一个点（可选） </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-5949">A period (optional)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-5950">四个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-5950">Four digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-5951">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-5951">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="088e4-5952">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-5952">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-5953">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-5953">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="088e4-5954">在 300 个字符的邻近度内，DLP 策略可高可信度地检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-5954">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-5955">正则表达式 Regex_indonesia_id_card 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-5955">The regular expression Regex_indonesia_id_card finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-5956">找到 Keyword_indonesia_id_card 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-5956">A keyword from Keyword_indonesia_id_card is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Indonesia Identity Card (KTP) Number -->
<Entity id="da68fdb0-f383-4981-8c86-82689d3b7d55" recommendedConfidence="85" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
     <IdMatch idRef="Regex_indonesia_id_card"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_indonesia_id_card"/>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-5957">关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-5957">Keywords</span></span>
   
#### <a name="keyword_indonesia_id_card"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-5958">Keyword_indonesia_id_card</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-5958">Keyword_indonesia_id_card</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-5959">KTP</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-5959">KTP</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-5960">Kartu Tanda Penduduk</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-5960">Kartu Tanda Penduduk</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-5961">Nomor Induk Kependudukan</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-5961">Nomor Induk Kependudukan</span></span> 
   
## <a name="international-banking-account-number-iban"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-5962">IBAN 服务 (国际) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-5962">International banking account number (IBAN)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-5963">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-5963">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="088e4-5964">国家/地区代码（两个字母）加校验位（两个数字）以及 bban 号码（最多 30 个字符）</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-5964">Country code (two letters) plus check digits (two digits) plus bban number (up to 30 characters)</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-5965">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-5965">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="088e4-5966">模式必须包括以下各项：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-5966">Pattern must include all of the following:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-5967">两个字母的国家/地区代码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-5967">Two-letter country code</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-5968">两个校验位（后跟一个可选空间） </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-5968">Two check digits (followed by an optional space)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-5969">1-7 个包含 4 个字母或数字的组（可以使用空格进行分隔）</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-5969">1-7 groups of four letters or digits (can be separated by spaces)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-5970">1-3 个字母或数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-5970">1-3 letters or digits</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="088e4-p138">每个国家/地区的格式稍有不同。IBAN 敏感信息类型涵盖这 60 个国家/地区：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-p138">The format for each country is slightly different. The IBAN sensitive information type covers these 60 countries:</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="088e4-5973">ad, ae, al, at, az, ba, be, bg, bh, ch, cr, cy, cz, de, dk, do, ee, es, fi, fo, fr, gb, ge, gi, gl, gr, hr, hu, ie, il, is, it, kw, kz, lb, li, lt, lu, lv, mc, md, me, mk, mr, mt, mu, nl, no, pl, pt, ro, rs, sa, se, si, sk, sm, tn, tr, vg</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-5973">ad, ae, al, at, az, ba, be, bg, bh, ch, cr, cy, cz, de, dk, do, ee, es, fi, fo, fr, gb, ge, gi, gl, gr, hr, hu, ie, il, is, it, kw, kz, lb, li, lt, lu, lv, mc, md, me, mk, mr, mt, mu, nl, no, pl, pt, ro, rs, sa, se, si, sk, sm, tn, tr, vg</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-5974">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-5974">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="088e4-5975">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-5975">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-5976">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-5976">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="088e4-5977">在 300 个字符的邻近度内，DLP 策略可高可信度地检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-5977">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-5978">函数 Func_iban 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-5978">The function Func_iban finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-5979">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-5979">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<Entity id="e7dc4711-11b7-4cb0-b88b-2c394a771f0e" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_iban" />
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-5980">关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-5980">Keywords</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="088e4-5981">无</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-5981">None</span></span>

   
## <a name="international-classification-of-diseases-icd-10-cm"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-5982">ICD-10-CM (国际) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-5982">International classification of diseases (ICD-10-CM)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-5983">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-5983">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="088e4-5984">Dictionary</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-5984">Dictionary</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-5985">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-5985">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="088e4-5986">关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-5986">Keyword</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-5987">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-5987">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="088e4-5988">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-5988">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-5989">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-5989">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="088e4-5990">在 300 个字符的邻近度内，DLP 策略可高可信度地检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-5990">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-5991">找到来自Dictionary_icd_10_updated的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-5991">A keyword from Dictionary_icd_10_updated is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-5992">找到搜索Dictionary_icd_10_codes关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-5992">A keyword from Dictionary_icd_10_codes is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="088e4-5993">在 300 个字符的邻近度内，DLP 策略具有中等可信度，即检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-5993">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-5994">找到更新Dictionary_icd_10_关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-5994">A keyword from Dictionary_icd_10_ updated is found.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- ICD-10 CM -->
      <Entity id="3356946c-6bb7-449b-b253-6ffa419c0ce7" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Dictionary_icd_10_updated" />
          <Match idRef="Dictionary_icd_10_codes" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Dictionary_icd_10_updated" />
        </Pattern>

```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-5995">关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-5995">Keywords</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="088e4-5996">来自 Dictionary_icd_10_updated 关键字词典的任何术语，该词典基于国际动物分类、第十次修订、修改 ([ICD-10-CM) 。 ](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=852604)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-5996">Any term from the Dictionary_icd_10_updated keyword dictionary, which is based on the [International Classification of Diseases, Tenth Revision, Clinical Modification (ICD-10-CM)](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=852604).</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="088e4-5997">此类型仅查找该术语，而不是保险代码。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-5997">This type looks only for the term, not the insurance codes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="088e4-5998">来自 Dictionary_icd_10_codes 关键字词典的任何术语，该词典基于国际动物分类、第十次修订、修改 ([ICD-10-CM) 。 ](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=852604)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-5998">Any term from the Dictionary_icd_10_codes keyword dictionary, which is based on the [International Classification of Diseases, Tenth Revision, Clinical Modification (ICD-10-CM)](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=852604).</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="088e4-5999">此类型仅查找保险代码，而不是说明。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-5999">This type looks only for insurance codes, not the description.</span></span>

## <a name="international-classification-of-diseases-icd-9-cm"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-6000">ICD-9-CM (国际) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-6000">International classification of diseases (ICD-9-CM)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-6001">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-6001">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="088e4-6002">Dictionary</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-6002">Dictionary</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-6003">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-6003">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="088e4-6004">关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-6004">Keyword</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-6005">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-6005">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="088e4-6006">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-6006">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-6007">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-6007">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="088e4-6008">在 300 个字符的邻近度内，DLP 策略可高可信度地检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-6008">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-6009">找到搜索Dictionary_icd_9_updated关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-6009">A keyword from Dictionary_icd_9_updated is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-6010">找到搜索Dictionary_icd_9_codes关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-6010">A keyword from Dictionary_icd_9_codes is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="088e4-6011">在 300 个字符的邻近度内，DLP 策略具有中等可信度，即检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-6011">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-6012">找到搜索Dictionary_icd_9_updated关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-6012">A keyword from Dictionary_icd_9_updated is found.</span></span>

```xml
    <Entity id="fa3f9c74-ee07-4c52-b5f2-085d6b2c0ec4" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Dictionary_icd_9_updated" />
          <Match idRef="Dictionary_icd_9_codes" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Dictionary_icd_9_updated" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-6013">关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-6013">Keywords</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="088e4-6014">来自 Dictionary_icd_9_updated 关键字词典的任何术语，该词典基于国际动物分类、第九次修订、修改 ([ICD-9-CM) 。 ](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=852605)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-6014">Any term from the Dictionary_icd_9_updated keyword dictionary, which is based on the [International Classification of Diseases,Ninth Revision, Clinical Modification (ICD-9-CM)](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=852605).</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="088e4-6015">此类型仅查找该术语，而不是保险代码。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-6015">This type looks only for the term, not the insurance codes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="088e4-6016">来自 Dictionary_icd_9_codes 关键字词典的任何术语，该词典基于国际分类（第九次修订、修改 ([ICD-9-CM ](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=852605)) ）。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-6016">Any term from the Dictionary_icd_9_codes keyword dictionary, which is based on the [International Classification of Diseases,Ninth Revision, Clinical Modification (ICD-9-CM)](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=852605).</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="088e4-6017">此类型仅查找保险代码，而不是说明。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-6017">This type looks only for insurance codes, not the description.</span></span>

## <a name="ip-address"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-6018">IP 地址</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-6018">IP address</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-6019">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-6019">Format</span></span>

#### <a name="ipv4"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-6020">IPv4：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-6020">IPv4:</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="088e4-6021">对于 IPv4 地址 () 、无格式 (和无格式) 模式的复杂模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-6021">Complex pattern that accounts for formatted (periods) and unformatted (no periods) versions of the IPv4 addresses</span></span>

#### <a name="ipv6"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-6022">IPv6：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-6022">IPv6:</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="088e4-6023">包含带格式的 IPv6 号码的复杂 (包括冒号) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-6023">Complex pattern that accounts for formatted IPv6 numbers (which include colons)</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-6024">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-6024">Pattern</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-6025">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-6025">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="088e4-6026">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-6026">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-6027">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-6027">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="088e4-6028">对于 IPv6，DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内，可高可信度地检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-6028">For IPv6, a DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-6029">正则表达式 Regex_ipv6_address 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-6029">The regular expression Regex_ipv6_address finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-6030">未找到 Keyword_ipaddress 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-6030">No keyword from Keyword_ipaddress is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="088e4-6031">对于 IPv4，在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 95% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-6031">For IPv4, a DLP policy is 95% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-6032">正则表达式 Regex_ipv4_address 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-6032">The regular expression Regex_ipv4_address finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-6033">找到 Keyword_ipaddress 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-6033">A keyword from Keyword_ipaddress is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="088e4-6034">对于 IPv6，在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 95% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-6034">For IPv6, a DLP policy is 95% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-6035">正则表达式 Regex_ipv6_address 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-6035">The regular expression Regex_ipv6_address finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-6036">未找到 Keyword_ipaddress 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-6036">No keyword from Keyword_ipaddress is found.</span></span>

```xml
    <!-- IP Address -->
    <Entity id="1daa4ad5-e2dd-4ca4-a788-54722c09efb2" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_ipv6_address" />
        <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_ipaddress" />
        </Any>
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="95">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_ipv4_address" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_ipaddress" />
        </Any>
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="95">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_ipv6_address" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_ipaddress" />
        </Any>
      </Pattern>
    </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-6037">关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-6037">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_ipaddress"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-6038">Keyword_ipaddress</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-6038">Keyword_ipaddress</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-6039">IP (关键字区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-6039">IP (this keyword is case-sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-6040">ip address</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-6040">ip address</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-6041">ip addresses</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-6041">ip addresses</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-6042">internet protocol</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-6042">internet protocol</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-6043">IP-כתובת ה</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-6043">IP-כתובת ה</span></span> 

## <a name="ireland-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-6044">爱尔兰驾驶证号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-6044">Ireland driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-6045">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-6045">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="088e4-6046">六个数字后跟四个字母</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-6046">Six digits followed by four letters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-6047">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-6047">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="088e4-6048">六个数字和四个字母：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-6048">Six digits and four letters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-6049">六位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-6049">Six digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-6050">四个字母 (不区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-6050">Four letters (not case-sensitive)</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-6051">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-6051">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="088e4-6052">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-6052">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-6053">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-6053">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="088e4-6054">在 300 个字符的邻近度内，DLP 策略具有中等可信度，即检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-6054">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-6055">正则表达式查找  `Regex_ireland_eu_driver's_license_number` 与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-6055">The regular expression  `Regex_ireland_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-6056">找到或  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` 找到 `Keywords_ireland_eu_driver's_license_number` 的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-6056">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_ireland_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Ireland Driver's License Number -->
      <Entity id="e01bccd9-eb4d-414f-ace1-e9b6a4c4a2ca" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_ireland_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_ireland_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="ireland-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-6180">爱尔兰护照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-6180">Ireland passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-6181">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-6181">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="088e4-6182">两个字母或数字后跟七个数字，无空格或分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-6182">Two letters or digits followed by seven digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-6183">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-6183">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="088e4-6184">两个字母或数字后跟七个数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-6184">Two letters or digits followed by seven digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-6185">两个数字或字母 (不区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-6185">Two digits or letters (not case-sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-6186">七个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-6186">Seven digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-6187">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-6187">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="088e4-6188">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-6188">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-6189">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-6189">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="088e4-6190">在 300 个字符的邻近度内，DLP 策略可高可信度地检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-6190">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-6191">正则表达式查找  `Regex_ireland_eu_passport_number` 与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-6191">The regular expression  `Regex_ireland_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-6192">找到或  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` 找到 `Keywords_ireland_eu_passport_number` 的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-6192">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_ireland_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-6193">正则表达式查找格式 `Regex_ireland_eu_passport_date` 为 DD MMM/MMM YYYY (示例 - 01 BEA/MAY 1988) 或找到的 `Keywords_eu_passport_date` 关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-6193">The regular expression `Regex_ireland_eu_passport_date` finds date in the format DD MMM/MMM YYYY (Example - 01 BEA/MAY 1988) or a keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_date` is found</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="088e4-6194">在 300 个字符的邻近度内，DLP 策略具有中等可信度，即检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-6194">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-6195">正则表达式查找  `Regex_ireland_eu_passport_number` 与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-6195">The regular expression  `Regex_ireland_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-6196">找到或  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` 找到 `Keywords_ireland_eu_passport_number` 的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-6196">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_ireland_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span>
    
```xml
      <!-- Ireland Passport Number -->
      <Entity id="a2130f27-9ee2-4103-84f9-a6b1ee7d0cbf" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_ireland_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_ireland_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Regex_ireland_eu_passport_date" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_date" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_ireland_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_ireland_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="ireland-personal-public-service-pps-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-6220">爱尔兰个人公共服务 (PPS) 号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-6220">Ireland personal public service (PPS) number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-6221">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-6221">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="088e4-6222">2012 (2012 年 12 月 31) ：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-6222">Old format (until 31 December 2012):</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-6223">七个数字后跟 1-2 个字母</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-6223">seven digits followed by 1-2 letters</span></span> 

<span data-ttu-id="088e4-6224">2013 (2013 年 1 月 1 日及之后的新) ：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-6224">New format (1 January 2013 and after):</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-6225">七个数字后跟两个字母</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-6225">seven digits followed by two letters</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-6226">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-6226">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="088e4-6227">2012 (2012 年 12 月 31) ：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-6227">Old format (until 31 December 2012):</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-6228">七个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-6228">seven digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-6229">一到两个字母 (不区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-6229">one to two letters (not case-sensitive)</span></span> 

<span data-ttu-id="088e4-6230">2013 (2013 年 1 月 1 日及之后的新) ：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-6230">New format (1 January 2013 and after):</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-6231">七个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-6231">seven digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-6232">字母 (不区分大小写) 字母检查数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-6232">a letter (not case-sensitive) which is an alphabetic check digit</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-6233">A-I 或"W"范围中的可选字母</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-6233">An optional letter in the range A-I, or “W”</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-6234">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-6234">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="088e4-6235">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-6235">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-6236">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-6236">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="088e4-6237">在 300 个字符的邻近度内，DLP 策略可高可信度地检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-6237">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-6238">函数 Func_ireland_pps 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-6238">The function Func_ireland_pps finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-6239">找到搜索Keywords_ireland_eu_national_id_card关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-6239">A keyword from Keywords_ireland_eu_national_id_card is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-6240">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-6240">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="088e4-6241">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，置信度较低：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-6241">A DLP policy has low confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-6242">函数 Func_ireland_pps 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-6242">The function Func_ireland_pps finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-6243">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-6243">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Ireland Personal Public Service (PPS) Number -->
      <Entity id="1cdb674d-c19a-4fcf-9f4b-7f56cc87345a" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85" relaxProximity="true">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_ireland_pps" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_ireland_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_ireland_pps" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="israel-bank-account-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-6288">以色列银行帐号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-6288">Israel bank account number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-6289">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-6289">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="088e4-6290">13 位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-6290">13 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-6291">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-6291">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="088e4-6292">格式化：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-6292">Formatted:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-6293">两个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-6293">two digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-6294">短划线</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-6294">a dash</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-6295">三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-6295">three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-6296">短划线</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-6296">a dash</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-6297">八个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-6297">eight digits</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="088e4-6298">无格式：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-6298">Unformatted:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-6299">	13 个连续的数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-6299">13 consecutive digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-6300">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-6300">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="088e4-6301">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-6301">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-6302">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-6302">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="088e4-6303">在 300 个字符的邻近度内，DLP 策略具有中等可信度，即检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-6303">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-6304">正则表达式 Regex_israel_bank_account_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-6304">The regular expression Regex_israel_bank_account_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-6305">找到 Keyword_israel_bank_account_number 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-6305">A keyword from Keyword_israel_bank_account_number is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Israel Bank Account Number -->
<Entity id="7d08b2ff-a0b9-437f-957c-aeddbf9b2b25" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_israel_bank_account_number" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_israel_bank_account_number" />
        </Any>
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-6306">关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-6306">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_israel_bank_account_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-6307">Keyword_israel_bank_account_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-6307">Keyword_israel_bank_account_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-6308">Bank Account Number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-6308">Bank Account Number</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-6309">Bank Account</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-6309">Bank Account</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-6310">Account Number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-6310">Account Number</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-6311">מספר חשבון בנק</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-6311">מספר חשבון בנק</span></span> 
   
## <a name="israel-national-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-6312">以色列国家标识号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-6312">Israel national identification number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-6313">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-6313">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="088e4-6314">九个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-6314">nine digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-6315">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-6315">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="088e4-6316">九个连续的数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-6316">nine consecutive digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-6317">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-6317">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="088e4-6318">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-6318">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-6319">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-6319">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="088e4-6320">在 300 个字符的邻近度内，DLP 策略具有中等可信度，即检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-6320">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-6321">函数 Func_israeli_national_id_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-6321">The function Func_israeli_national_id_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-6322">找到 Keyword_Israel_National_ID 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-6322">A keyword from Keyword_Israel_National_ID is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-6323">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-6323">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Israel National ID Number -->
<Entity id="e05881f5-1db1-418c-89aa-a3ac5c5277ee" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_israeli_national_id_number" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_Israel_National_ID" />
        </Any>
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

-   <span data-ttu-id="088e4-6327">מספר זיה וי</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-6327">מספר זיה וי</span></span>
-   <span data-ttu-id="088e4-6328">מספר זיהוי ישר אלי</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-6328">מספר זיהוי ישר אלי</span></span>      
-   <span data-ttu-id="088e4-6329">זהותישר אלית</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-6329">זהותישר אלית</span></span>
-   <span data-ttu-id="088e4-6330">هو ية اسرائيل ية عدد</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-6330">هو ية اسرائيل ية عدد</span></span>
-   <span data-ttu-id="088e4-6331">هوية إسرائ يلية</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-6331">هوية إسرائ يلية</span></span>
-   <span data-ttu-id="088e4-6332">رقم الهوية</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-6332">رقم الهوية</span></span>
-   <span data-ttu-id="088e4-6333">عدد هوية فريدة من نوعها</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-6333">عدد هوية فريدة من نوعها</span></span>

-   <span data-ttu-id="088e4-6335">id number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-6335">id number</span></span>
-   <span data-ttu-id="088e4-6336">identity no</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-6336">identity no</span></span>        
-   <span data-ttu-id="088e4-6337">identitynumber#</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-6337">identitynumber#</span></span>
-   <span data-ttu-id="088e4-6338">标识号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-6338">identity number</span></span>
-   <span data-ttu-id="088e4-6339">identitynumber</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-6339">israeliidentitynumber</span></span>       
-   <span data-ttu-id="088e4-6340">个人 ID</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-6340">personal id</span></span>
-   <span data-ttu-id="088e4-6341">unique id</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-6341">unique id</span></span>  

   
## <a name="italy-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-6342">意大利驾驶证号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-6342">Italy driver's license number</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="088e4-6343">此敏感信息类型实体包含在欧盟驾驶证号码敏感信息类型中，并作为独立的敏感信息类型实体提供。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-6343">This sensitive information type entity is included in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type and is available as a stand-alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-6344">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-6344">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="088e4-6345">10 个字母和数字的组合</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-6345">a combination of 10 letters and digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-6346">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-6346">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="088e4-6347">10 个字母和数字的组合：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-6347">a combination of 10 letters and digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-6348">一个字母 (不区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-6348">one letter (not case-sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-6349">字母"A"或"V" (不区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-6349">the letter "A" or "V" (not case-sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-6350">七个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-6350">seven digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-6351">一个字母 (不区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-6351">one letter (not case-sensitive)</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-6352">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-6352">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="088e4-6353">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-6353">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-6354">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-6354">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="088e4-6355">在 300 个字符的邻近度内，DLP 策略具有中等可信度，即检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-6355">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-6356">正则表达式 Regex_italy_drivers_license_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-6356">The regular expression Regex_italy_drivers_license_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-6357">找到 Keyword_italy_drivers_license_number 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-6357">A keyword from Keyword_italy_drivers_license_number is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Italy Driver's license Number -->
<Entity id="97d6244f-9157-41bd-8e0c-9d669a5c4d71" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_italy_drivers_license_number" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_italy_drivers_license_number" />
        </Any>
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-6358">关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-6358">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_italy_drivers_license_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-6359">Keyword_italy_drivers_license_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-6359">Keyword_italy_drivers_license_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-6360">numero di patente</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-6360">numero di patente</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-6361">patente di guida</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-6361">patente di guida</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-6362">patente guida</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-6362">patente guida</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-6363">patenti di guida</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-6363">patenti di guida</span></span>

## <a name="italy-fiscal-code"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-6365">意大利财政代码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-6365">Italy fiscal code</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="088e4-6366">此敏感信息类型仅适用于：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-6366">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-6367">数据丢失防护策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-6367">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-6368">通信合规性策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-6368">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-6369">信息治理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-6369">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-6370">记录管理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-6370">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-6371">Microsoft 云应用安全</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-6371">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-6372">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-6372">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="088e4-6373">指定模式中字母和数字的 16 个字符组合</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-6373">a 16-character combination of letters and digits in the specified pattern</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-6374">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-6374">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="088e4-6375">字母和数字的 16 个字符组合：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-6375">A 16-character combination of letters and digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-6376">三个字母，对应于系列名称中的前三个辅音</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-6376">three letters that correspond to the first three consonants in the family name</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-6377">三个字母，分别对应于名字中的第一个、第三个和第四个辅音</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-6377">three letters that correspond to the first, third, and fourth consonants in the first name</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-6378">两个数字，对应于出生日期的最后一个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-6378">two digits that correspond to the last digits of the birth year</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-6379">一个对应于出生日期月份字母的字母 - 字母按字母顺序使用，但只有字母 A 到 E、H、L、M、P、R 到 T (因此，January 是 A，十月是 R) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-6379">one letter that corresponds to the letter for the month of birth—letters are used in alphabetical order, but only the letters A to E, H, L, M, P, R to T are used (so, January is A and October is R)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-6380">与出生日期对应的两位数 -为了区分性别，将 40 添加到性别的出生日期</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-6380">two digits that correspond to the day of the month of birth—in order to differentiate between genders, 40 is added to the day of birth for women</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-6381">四个数字，对应于此人所 (的国家/地区代码所特有的地区代码，用于) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-6381">four digits that correspond to the area code specific to the municipality where the person was born (country-wide codes are used for foreign countries)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-6382">一个奇偶校验数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-6382">one parity digit</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-6383">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-6383">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="088e4-6384">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-6384">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-6385">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-6385">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="088e4-6386">在 300 个字符的邻近度内，DLP 策略可高可信度地检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-6386">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-6387">该  `Func_italy_eu_national_id_card` 函数查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-6387">The function  `Func_italy_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-6388">找到一个  `Keywords_italy_eu_national_id_card` 关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-6388">A keyword from  `Keywords_italy_eu_national_id_card` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="088e4-6389">在 300 个字符的邻近度内，DLP 策略具有中等可信度，即检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-6389">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-6390">该  `Func_italy_eu_national_id_card` 函数查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-6390">The function  `Func_italy_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Italy Fiscal Code -->
      <Entity id="4cd79172-8da9-4ff5-9188-98b1e7e2eca6" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_italy_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_italy_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_italy_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="italy-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-6425">意大利护照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-6425">Italy passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-6426">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-6426">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="088e4-6427">两个字母或数字后跟七个数字，无空格或分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-6427">two letters or digits followed by seven digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-6428">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-6428">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="088e4-6429">两个字母或数字后跟七个数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-6429">two letters or digits followed by seven digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-6430">两个数字或字母 (不区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-6430">two digits or letters (not case-sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-6431">七个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-6431">seven digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-6432">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-6432">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="088e4-6433">不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-6433">not applicable</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-6434">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-6434">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="088e4-6435">在 300 个字符的邻近度内，DLP 策略可高可信度地检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-6435">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-6436">正则表达式查找  `Regex_italy_eu_passport_number` 与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-6436">The regular expression  `Regex_italy_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-6437">找到或  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` 找到 `Keywords_italy_eu_passport_number` 的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-6437">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_italy_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-6438">正则表达式查找格式 `Regex_italy_eu_passport_date` 为 DD MMM/MMM YYYY (示例 - 01 GEN/JAN 1988) 或找到的 `Keywords_eu_passport_date` 关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-6438">The regular expression `Regex_italy_eu_passport_date` finds date in the format DD MMM/MMM YYYY (Example - 01 GEN/JAN 1988) or a keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_date` is found</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="088e4-6439">在 300 个字符的邻近度内，DLP 策略具有中等可信度，即检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-6439">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-6440">正则表达式查找  `Regex_italy_eu_passport_number` 与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-6440">The regular expression  `Regex_italy_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-6441">找到或  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` 找到 `Keywords_italy_eu_passport_number` 的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-6441">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_italy_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Italy Passport Number -->
      <Entity id="39811019-4750-445f-b26d-4c0e6c431544" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_italy_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_italy_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Regex_italy_eu_passport_date" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_date" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_italy_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_italy_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-6442">关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-6442">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keywords_eu_passport_number_common"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-6443">Keywords_eu_passport_number_common</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-6443">Keywords_eu_passport_number_common</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-6444">passport#</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-6444">passport#</span></span>

## <a name="italy-value-added-tax-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-6465">意大利增值税编号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-6465">Italy value added tax number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="088e4-6466">此敏感信息类型仅适用于：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-6466">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-6467">数据丢失防护策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-6467">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-6468">通信合规性策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-6468">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-6469">信息治理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-6469">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-6470">记录管理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-6470">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-6471">Microsoft 云应用安全</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-6471">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-6472">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-6472">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="088e4-6473">带可选分隔符的 13 个字符字母数字模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-6473">13 character alphanumeric pattern with optional delimiters</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-6474">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-6474">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="088e4-6475">带可选分隔符的 13 个字符字母数字模式：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-6475">13 character alphanumeric pattern with optional delimiters:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-6476">I 或 i</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-6476">I or i</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-6477">T 或 t</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-6477">T or t</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-6478">可选空格、点、连字符或逗号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-6478">optional space, dot, hyphen, or comma</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-6479">11 个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-6479">11 digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-6480">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-6480">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="088e4-6481">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-6481">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-6482">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-6482">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="088e4-6483">在 300 个字符的邻近度内，DLP 策略可高可信度地检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-6483">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-6484">函数Func_italy_value_added_tax_number查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-6484">The function Func_italy_value_added_tax_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-6485">找到来自Keywords_italy_value_added_tax_number的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-6485">A keyword from Keywords_italy_value_added_tax_number is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="088e4-6486">在 300 个字符的邻近度内，DLP 策略具有中等可信度，即检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-6486">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-6487">函数Func_italy_value_added_tax_number查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-6487">The function Func_italy_value_added_tax_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Italy Value Added Tax -->
      <Entity id="26a8cc07-2283-4a2a-ab1d-4ab643c4c67f" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_italy_value_added_tax_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_italy_value_added_tax_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_italy_value_added_tax_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="japan-bank-account-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-6495">日本银行帐号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-6495">Japan bank account number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-6496">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-6496">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="088e4-6497">七个或八个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-6497">seven or eight digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-6498">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-6498">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="088e4-6499">bank account number：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-6499">bank account number:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-6500">七个或八个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-6500">seven or eight digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-6501">bank account branch code：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-6501">bank account branch code:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-6502">四个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-6502">four digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-6503">可选 (或短) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-6503">a space or dash (optional)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-6504">三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-6504">three digits</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="088e4-6505">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-6505">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="088e4-6506">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-6506">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-6507">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-6507">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="088e4-6508">在 300 个字符的邻近度内，DLP 策略可高可信度地检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-6508">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-6509">函数 Func_jp_bank_account 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-6509">The function Func_jp_bank_account finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-6510">找到 Keyword_jp_bank_account 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-6510">A keyword from Keyword_jp_bank_account is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-6511">下列其中一项为真：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-6511">One of the following is true:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-6512">函数 Func_jp_bank_account_branch_code 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-6512">The function Func_jp_bank_account_branch_code finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-6513">找到 Keyword_jp_bank_branch_code 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-6513">A keyword from Keyword_jp_bank_branch_code is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="088e4-6514">在 300 个字符的邻近度内，DLP 策略具有中等可信度，即检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-6514">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-6515">函数 Func_jp_bank_account 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-6515">The function Func_jp_bank_account finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-6516">找到 Keyword_jp_bank_account 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-6516">A keyword from Keyword_jp_bank_account is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Japan Bank Account Number -->
<Entity id="d354f95b-96ee-4b80-80bc-4377312b55bc" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
  <Version minEngineVersion="15.01.0131.000">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_jp_bank_account" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_jp_bank_account" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Func_jp_bank_account_branch_code" />
            <Match idRef="Keyword_jp_bank_branch_code" />
          </Any>
      </Pattern>
  </Version>    
     <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_jp_bank_account" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_jp_bank_account" />
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="japan-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-6563">日本驾驶证号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-6563">Japan driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-6564">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-6564">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="088e4-6565">12 个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-6565">12 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-6566">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-6566">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="088e4-6567">12 个连续的数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-6567">12 consecutive digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-6568">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-6568">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="088e4-6569">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-6569">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-6570">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-6570">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="088e4-6571">在 300 个字符的邻近度内，DLP 策略具有中等可信度，即检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-6571">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-6572">函数 Func_jp_drivers_license_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-6572">The function Func_jp_drivers_license_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-6573">找到 Keyword_jp_drivers_license_number 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-6573">A keyword from Keyword_jp_drivers_license_number is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Japan Driver's License Number -->
<Entity id="c6011143-d087-451c-8313-7f6d4aed2270" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_jp_drivers_license_number" />
        <Match idRef ="Keyword_jp_drivers_license_number" />
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```
