## <a name="japan-my-number---corporate"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-6611">日本我的号码 - 公司</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-6611">Japan My Number - Corporate</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="088e4-6612">此敏感信息类型仅适用于：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-6612">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-6613">数据丢失防护策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-6613">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-6614">通信合规性策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-6614">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-6615">信息治理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-6615">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-6616">记录管理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-6616">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-6617">Microsoft 云应用安全</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-6617">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-6618">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-6618">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="088e4-6619">13 位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-6619">13-digit number</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-6620">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-6620">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="088e4-6621">13 位数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-6621">13-digit number:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-6622">一个数字，从 1 到 9</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-6622">one digit from one to nine</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-6623">12 个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-6623">12 digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-6624">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-6624">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="088e4-6625">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-6625">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-6626">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-6626">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="088e4-6627">在 300 个字符的邻近度内，DLP 策略可高可信度地检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-6627">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-6628">函数Func_japanese_my_number_corporate查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-6628">The function Func_japanese_my_number_corporate finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-6629">找到来自Keywords_japanese_my_number_corporate关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-6629">A keyword from Keywords_japanese_my_number_corporate is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="088e4-6630">在 300 个字符的邻近度内，DLP 策略具有中等可信度，即检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-6630">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-6631">函数Func_japanese_my_number_corporate查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-6631">The function Func_japanese_my_number_corporate finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Japanese My Number – Corporate -->
      <Entity id="9e0eaf79-ff20-4ffb-b3e4-e7368d5db6ff" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_japanese_my_number_corporate" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_japanese_my_number_corporate" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_japanese_my_number_corporate" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-6632">关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-6632">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_japan_my_number_corporate"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-6633">Keyword_japan_my_number_corporate</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-6633">Keyword_japan_my_number_corporate</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-6634">公司编号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-6634">corporate number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-6635">マイナンバー</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-6635">マイナンバー</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-6636">共通番号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-6636">共通番号</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-6637">マイナンバーカード</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-6637">マイナンバーカード</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-6638">マイナンバーカード番号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-6638">マイナンバーカード番号</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-6639">個人番号カード</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-6639">個人番号カード</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-6640">個人識別番号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-6640">個人識別番号</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-6641">個人識別ナンバー</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-6641">個人識別ナンバー</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-6642">法人番号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-6642">法人番号</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-6643">指定通知書</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-6643">指定通知書</span></span>


## <a name="japan-my-number---personal"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-6644">日本我的号码 - 个人</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-6644">Japan My Number - Personal</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="088e4-6645">此敏感信息类型仅适用于：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-6645">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-6646">数据丢失防护策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-6646">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-6647">通信合规性策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-6647">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-6648">信息治理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-6648">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-6649">记录管理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-6649">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-6650">Microsoft 云应用安全</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-6650">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-6651">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-6651">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="088e4-6652">12 位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-6652">12-digit number</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-6653">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-6653">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="088e4-6654">12 位数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-6654">12-digit number:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-6655">四个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-6655">four digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-6656">可选空格、点或连字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-6656">an optional space, dot, or hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-6657">四个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-6657">four digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-6658">可选空格、点或连字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-6658">an optional space, dot, or hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-6659">四个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-6659">four digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-6660">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-6660">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="088e4-6661">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-6661">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-6662">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-6662">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="088e4-6663">在 300 个字符的邻近度内，DLP 策略可高可信度地检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-6663">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-6664">该Func_japanese_my_number_personal查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-6664">The function Func_japanese_my_number_personal finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-6665">找到搜索Keywords_japanese_my_number_personal关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-6665">A keyword from Keywords_japanese_my_number_personal is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="088e4-6666">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，置信度较低：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-6666">A DLP policy has low confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-6667">该Func_japanese_my_number_personal查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-6667">The function Func_japanese_my_number_personal finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Japanese My Number – Personal -->
      <Entity id="98da8e66-7299-4ebd-9f82-c871ab37d3ef" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_japanese_my_number_personal" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_japanese_my_number_personal" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_japanese_my_number_personal" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-6668">关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-6668">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_japan_my_number_personal"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-6669">Keyword_japan_my_number_personal</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-6669">Keyword_japan_my_number_personal</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-6670">我的号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-6670">my number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-6671">マイナンバー</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-6671">マイナンバー</span></span>

## <a name="japan-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-6680">日本护照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-6680">Japan passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-6681">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-6681">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="088e4-6682">两个字母后跟七个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-6682">two letters followed by seven digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-6683">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-6683">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="088e4-6684">两个字母 (不区分大小写) 后跟七个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-6684">two letters (not case-sensitive) followed by seven digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-6685">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-6685">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="088e4-6686">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-6686">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-6687">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-6687">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="088e4-6688">在 300 个字符的邻近度内，DLP 策略具有中等可信度，即检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-6688">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-6689">函数 Func_jp_passport 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-6689">The function Func_jp_passport finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-6690">找到 Keyword_jp_passport 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-6690">A keyword from Keyword_jp_passport is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Japan Passport Number -->
<Entity id="75177310-1a09-4613-bf6d-833aae3743f8" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_jp_passport" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_jp_passport" />
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-6700">パスポート＃</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-6700">パスポート＃</span></span>

## <a name="japan-residence-card-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-6707">日本居民卡号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-6707">Japan residence card number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-6708">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-6708">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="088e4-6709">12 个字母和数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-6709">12 letters and digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-6710">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-6710">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="088e4-6711">12 个字母和数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-6711">12 letters and digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-6712">两个字母 (不区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-6712">two letters (not case-sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-6713">八个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-6713">eight digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-6714">两个字母 (不区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-6714">two letters (not case-sensitive)</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-6715">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-6715">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="088e4-6716">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-6716">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-6717">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-6717">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="088e4-6718">在 300 个字符的邻近度内，DLP 策略具有中等可信度，即检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-6718">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-6719">正则表达式Regex_jp_residence_card_number查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-6719">The regular expression Regex_jp_residence_card_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-6720">找到搜索Keyword_jp_residence_card_number关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-6720">A keyword from Keyword_jp_residence_card_number is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!--Japan Residence Card Number-->
-<Entity id="ac36fef2-a289-4e2c-bb48-b02366e89fc0" recommendedConfidence="75" patternsProximity="300">
   -<Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
      <IdMatch idRef="Regex_jp_residence_card_number"/>
      <Match idRef="Keyword_jp_residence_card_number"/>
   </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

#### <a name="keyword_jp_residence_card_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-6722">Keyword_jp_residence_card_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-6722">Keyword_jp_residence_card_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-6723">住宅卡号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-6723">Residence card number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-6724">住宅卡否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-6724">Residence card no</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-6725">居住地卡#</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-6725">Residence card #</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-6726">在留カード番号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-6726">在留カード番号</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-6727">在留カード</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-6727">在留カード</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-6728">在留番号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-6728">在留番号</span></span>

## <a name="japan-resident-registration-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-6729">日本居民注册号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-6729">Japan resident registration number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-6730">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-6730">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="088e4-6731">11 个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-6731">11 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-6732">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-6732">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="088e4-6733">11 个连续的数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-6733">11 consecutive digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-6734">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-6734">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="088e4-6735">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-6735">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-6736">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-6736">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="088e4-6737">在 300 个字符的邻近度内，DLP 策略具有中等可信度，即检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-6737">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-6738">函数 Func_jp_resident_registration_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-6738">The function Func_jp_resident_registration_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-6739">找到 Keyword_jp_resident_registration_number 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-6739">A keyword from Keyword_jp_resident_registration_number is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Japan Resident Registration Number -->
<Entity id="01c1209b-6389-4faf-a5f8-3f7e13899652" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_jp_resident_registration_number" />
        <Match idRef ="Keyword_jp_resident_registration_number" />
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-6740">关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-6740">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_jp_resident_registration_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-6741">Keyword_jp_resident_registration_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-6741">Keyword_jp_resident_registration_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-6742">Resident Registration Number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-6742">Resident Registration Number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-6743">Residents Basic Registry Number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-6743">Residents Basic Registry Number</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-6744">Resident Registration No.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-6744">Resident Registration No.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-6745">Resident Register No.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-6745">Resident Register No.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-6746">Residents Basic Registry No.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-6746">Residents Basic Registry No.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-6747">Basic Resident Register No.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-6747">Basic Resident Register No.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-6748">外国人登録証明書番号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-6748">外国人登録証明書番号</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-6749">証明書番号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-6749">証明書番号</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-6750">登録番号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-6750">登録番号</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-6751">外国人登録証</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-6751">外国人登録証</span></span>

   
## <a name="japan-social-insurance-number-sin"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-6752">日本社会保险号码 (SIN) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-6752">Japan social insurance number (SIN)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-6753">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-6753">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="088e4-6754">7-12 个数字 </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-6754">7-12 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-6755">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-6755">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="088e4-6756">7-12 位数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-6756">7-12 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-6757">四个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-6757">four digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-6758">可选连字符 (可选) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-6758">a hyphen (optional)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-6759">六位数字 OR</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-6759">six digits OR</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-6760">7-12 个连续的数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-6760">7-12 consecutive digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-6761">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-6761">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="088e4-6762">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-6762">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-6763">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-6763">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="088e4-6764">在 300 个字符的邻近度内，DLP 策略可高可信度地检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-6764">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-6765">函数 Func_jp_sin 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-6765">The function Func_jp_sin finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-6766">找到 Keyword_jp_sin 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-6766">A keyword from Keyword_jp_sin is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="088e4-6767">在 300 个字符的邻近度内，DLP 策略具有中等可信度，即检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-6767">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-6768">函数 Func_jp_sin_pre_1997 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-6768">The function Func_jp_sin_pre_1997 finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-6769">找到 Keyword_jp_sin 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-6769">A keyword from Keyword_jp_sin is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Japan Social Insurance Number -->
<Entity id="c840e719-0896-45bb-84fd-1ed5c95e45ff" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_jp_sin" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_jp_sin" />
    </Pattern>
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_jp_sin_pre_1997" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_jp_sin" />
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-6770">关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-6770">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_jp_sin"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-6771">Keyword_jp_sin</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-6771">Keyword_jp_sin</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-6772">Social Insurance No.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-6772">Social Insurance No.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-6773">Social Insurance Num</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-6773">Social Insurance Num</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-6774">Social Insurance Number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-6774">Social Insurance Number</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-6775">健康保険被保険者番号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-6775">健康保険被保険者番号</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-6776">健保番号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-6776">健保番号</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-6777">基礎年金番号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-6777">基礎年金番号</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-6778">雇用保険被保険者番号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-6778">雇用保険被保険者番号</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-6779">雇用保険番号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-6779">雇用保険番号</span></span>

## <a name="latvia-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-6790">拉脱维亚驾驶证号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-6790">Latvia driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-6791">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-6791">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="088e4-6792">三个字母后跟六个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-6792">three letters followed by six digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-6793">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-6793">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="088e4-6794">三个字母和六个数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-6794">three letters and six digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-6795">三个字母 (不区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-6795">three letters (not case-sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-6796">六个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-6796">six digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-6797">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-6797">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="088e4-6798">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-6798">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-6799">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-6799">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="088e4-6800">在 300 个字符的邻近度内，DLP 策略具有中等可信度，即检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-6800">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-6801">正则表达式查找  `Regex_latvia_eu_driver's_license_number` 与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-6801">The regular expression  `Regex_latvia_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-6802">找到或  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` 找到 `Keywords_latvia_eu_driver's_license_number` 的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-6802">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_latvia_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Latvia Driver's License Number -->
      <Entity id="ec996de0-30f2-46b1-b192-4d2ff8805fa7" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_latvia_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_latvia_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="latvia-personal-code"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-6927">拉脱维亚个人代码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-6927">Latvia personal code</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-6928">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-6928">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="088e4-6929">11 个数字和一个可选连字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-6929">11 digits and an optional hyphen</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-6930">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-6930">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="088e4-6931">旧格式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-6931">Old format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="088e4-6932">11 个数字和一个连字符：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-6932">11 digits and a hyphen:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-6933">对应于 DD.2016 (日期的六个数字) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-6933">six digits that correspond to the birth date (DDMMYY)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-6934">连字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-6934">a hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-6935">一个数字，对应于 19 世纪 ("0"，"1"表示 20 世纪，"2"对应于 21 世纪) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-6935">one digit that corresponds to the century of birth ("0" for 19th century, "1" for 20th century, and "2" for 21st century)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-6936">四个数字，随机生成</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-6936">four digits, randomly generated</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="088e4-6937">新格式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-6937">New format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="088e4-6938">11 个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-6938">11 digits</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-6939">两个数字"32"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-6939">Two digits "32"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-6940">九个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-6940">Nine digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-6941">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-6941">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="088e4-6942">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-6942">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-6943">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-6943">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="088e4-6944">在 300 个字符的邻近度内，DLP 策略可高可信度地检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-6944">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-6945">函数  `Func_latvia_eu_national_id_card` 或正则表达式 `Regex_latvia_eu_national_id_card_new_format` 查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-6945">The function  `Func_latvia_eu_national_id_card` or the regex `Regex_latvia_eu_national_id_card_new_format` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-6946">找到一个  `Keywords_latvia_eu_national_id_card` 关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-6946">A keyword from  `Keywords_latvia_eu_national_id_card` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="088e4-6947">在 300 个字符的邻近度内，DLP 策略具有中等可信度，即检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-6947">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-6948">函数  `Func_latvia_eu_national_id_card` 或正则表达式 `Regex_latvia_eu_national_id_card_new_format` 查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-6948">The function  `Func_latvia_eu_national_id_card` or the regex `Regex_latvia_eu_national_id_card_new_format` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Latvia Personal Code -->
      <Entity id="03fcf763-27c2-49ed-9422-2641c6c895c9" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_latvia_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_latvia_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_latvia_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_latvia_eu_telephone_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_latvia_eu_mobile_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_latvia_eu_national_id_card_new_format" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_latvia_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_latvia_eu_national_id_card_new_format" />
          <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_latvia_eu_telephone_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_latvia_eu_mobile_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>

```

## <a name="latvia-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-7011">拉脱维亚护照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-7011">Latvia passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-7012">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-7012">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="088e4-7013">两个字母或数字后跟七个数字，无空格或分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-7013">two letters or digits followed by seven digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-7014">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-7014">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="088e4-7015">两个字母或数字后跟七个数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-7015">two letters or digits followed by seven digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-7016">两个数字或字母 (不区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-7016">two digits or letters (not case-sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-7017">七个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-7017">seven digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-7018">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-7018">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="088e4-7019">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-7019">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-7020">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-7020">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="088e4-7021">在 300 个字符的邻近度内，DLP 策略可高可信度地检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-7021">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-7022">正则表达式查找  `Regex_latvia_eu_passport_number` 与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-7022">The regular expression  `Regex_latvia_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-7023">找到或  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` 找到 `Keywords_latvia_eu_passport_number` 的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-7023">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_latvia_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-7024">正则表达式查找 `Regex_eu_passport_date1` DD.MM.YYYY 格式的日期或找到 `Keywords_eu_passport_date` 的关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-7024">The regular expression `Regex_eu_passport_date1` finds date in the format DD.MM.YYYY or a keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_date` is found</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="088e4-7025">在 300 个字符的邻近度内，DLP 策略具有中等可信度，即检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-7025">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-7026">正则表达式查找  `Regex_latvia_eu_passport_number` 与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-7026">The regular expression  `Regex_latvia_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-7027">找到或  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` 找到 `Keywords_latvia_eu_passport_number` 的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-7027">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_latvia_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Latvia Passport Number -->
      <Entity id="23ae25ec-cc28-421b-b77a-3054eadf1ede" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_latvia_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_latvia_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Regex_eu_passport_date1" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_date" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_latvia_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_latvia_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="lithuania-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-7050">立陶宛驾驶证号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-7050">Lithuania driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-7051">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-7051">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="088e4-7052">八个数字，不带空格和分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-7052">eight digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-7053">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-7053">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="088e4-7054">八个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-7054">eight digits</span></span> 
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-7055">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-7055">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="088e4-7056">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-7056">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-7057">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-7057">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="088e4-7058">在 300 个字符的邻近度内，DLP 策略具有中等可信度，即检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-7058">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-7059">正则表达式查找  `Regex_lithuania_eu_driver's_license_number` 与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-7059">The regular expression  `Regex_lithuania_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-7060">找到或  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` 找到 `Keywords_lithuania_eu_driver's_license_number` 的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-7060">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_lithuania_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Lithuania Driver's License Number -->
      <Entity id="86f7628b-e0f4-4dc3-9fbc-e4300e4c7d78" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_lithuania_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_lithuania_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="lithuania-personal-code"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-7185">立陶宛个人代码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-7185">Lithuania personal code</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="088e4-7186">此敏感信息类型仅适用于：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-7186">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-7187">数据丢失防护策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-7187">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-7188">通信合规性策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-7188">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-7189">信息治理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-7189">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-7190">记录管理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-7190">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-7191">Microsoft 云应用安全</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-7191">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-7192">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-7192">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="088e4-7193">11 个数字，不带空格和分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-7193">11 digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-7194">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-7194">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="088e4-7195">11 个数字，不含空格和分隔符：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-7195">11 digits without spaces and delimiters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-7196">1 (1-6) 对应于性别和出生日期的世纪</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-7196">one digit (1-6) that corresponds to the person's gender and century of birth</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-7197">与 YYMMDD (日期对应的六) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-7197">six digits that correspond to birth date (YYMMDD)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-7198">三个数字，对应于出生日期的序列号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-7198">three digits that correspond to the serial number of the date of birth</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-7199">一个检查数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-7199">one check digit</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-7200">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-7200">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="088e4-7201">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-7201">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-7202">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-7202">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="088e4-7203">在 300 个字符的邻近度内，DLP 策略可高可信度地检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-7203">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-7204">该  `Func_lithuania_eu_tax_file_number` 函数查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-7204">The function  `Func_lithuania_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-7205">找到一个  `Keywords_lithuania_eu_tax_file_number` 关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-7205">A keyword from  `Keywords_lithuania_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="088e4-7206">在 300 个字符的邻近度内，DLP 策略具有中等可信度，即检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-7206">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-7207">该  `Func_lithuania_eu_tax_file_number` 函数查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-7207">The function  `Func_lithuania_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Lithuania Personal Code -->
      <Entity id="cd6d3786-8ec3-4524-a2cf-1e0095379171" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_lithuania_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_lithuania_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_lithuania_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_lithuania_eu_telephone_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_lithuania_eu_mobile_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="lithuania-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-7242">立陶宛护照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-7242">Lithuania passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-7243">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-7243">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="088e4-7244">八个数字或字母，无空格或分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-7244">eight digits or letters with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-7245">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-7245">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="088e4-7246">八个数字或字母 (不区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-7246">eight digits or letters (not case-sensitive)</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-7247">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-7247">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="088e4-7248">不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-7248">not applicable</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-7249">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-7249">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="088e4-7250">在 300 个字符的邻近度内，DLP 策略可高可信度地检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-7250">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-7251">正则表达式查找  `Regex_lithuania_eu_passport_number` 与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-7251">The regular expression  `Regex_lithuania_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-7252">找到或  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` 找到 `Keywords_lithuania_eu_passport_number` 的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-7252">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_lithuania_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-7253">正则表达式查找 `Regex_eu_passport_date3` DD MM YYYY 格式的日期或找到 `Keywords_eu_passport_date` 的关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-7253">The regular expression `Regex_eu_passport_date3` finds date in the format DD MM YYYY or a keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_date` is found</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="088e4-7254">在 300 个字符的邻近度内，DLP 策略具有中等可信度，即检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-7254">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-7255">正则表达式查找  `Regex_lithuania_eu_passport_number` 与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-7255">The regular expression  `Regex_lithuania_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-7256">找到或  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` 找到 `Keywords_lithuania_eu_passport_number` 的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-7256">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_lithuania_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Lithuania Passport Number -->
      <Entity id="1b79900f-047b-4c3f-846f-7d73b5534bce" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_lithuania_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_lithuania_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Regex_eu_passport_date3" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_date" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_lithuania_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_lithuania_eu_passport_number" />

```

## <a name="luxemburg-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-7276">都明网驾驶证号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-7276">Luxemburg driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-7277">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-7277">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="088e4-7278">不带空格和分隔符的六个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-7278">six digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-7279">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-7279">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="088e4-7280">六个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-7280">six digits</span></span> 
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-7281">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-7281">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="088e4-7282">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-7282">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-7283">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-7283">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="088e4-7284">在 300 个字符的邻近度内，DLP 策略具有中等可信度，即检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-7284">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-7285">正则表达式查找  `Regex_luxemburg_eu_driver's_license_number` 与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-7285">The regular expression  `Regex_luxemburg_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-7286">找到或  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` 找到 `Keywords_luxemburg_eu_driver's_license_number` 的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-7286">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_luxemburg_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Luxemburg Driver's License Number -->
      <Entity id="89daf717-1544-4860-9a2e-fc9166dd8852" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_luxemburg_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_luxemburg_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="luxemburg-national-identification-number-natural-persons"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-7410"> () </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-7410">Luxemburg national identification number (natural persons)</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="088e4-7411">此敏感信息类型仅适用于：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-7411">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-7412">数据丢失防护策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-7412">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-7413">通信合规性策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-7413">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-7414">信息治理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-7414">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-7415">记录管理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-7415">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-7416">Microsoft 云应用安全</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-7416">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-7417">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-7417">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="088e4-7418">13 个数字，无空格或分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-7418">13 digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-7419">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-7419">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="088e4-7420">13 个数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-7420">13 digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-7421">11 个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-7421">11 digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-7422">两个检查数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-7422">two check digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-7423">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-7423">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="088e4-7424">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-7424">yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-7425">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-7425">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="088e4-7426">在 300 个字符的邻近度内，DLP 策略可高可信度地检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-7426">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-7427">该  `Func_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number` 函数查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-7427">The function  `Func_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-7428">找到一个  `Keywords_luxemburg_eu_national_id_card` 关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-7428">A keyword from  `Keywords_luxemburg_eu_national_id_card` is found.</span></span> 

<span data-ttu-id="088e4-7429">在 300 个字符的邻近度内，DLP 策略具有中等可信度，即检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-7429">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-7430">该  `Func_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number` 函数查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-7430">The function  `Func_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 


```xml
      <!-- Luxemburg National Identification Number (Natural persons) -->
      <Entity id="aaf661ed-29ec-426d-8bf9-880cad298ebb" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_luxemburg_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_luxemburg_eu_telephone_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_luxemburg_eu_mobile_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="luxemburg-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-7453">都鲁比卡护照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-7453">Luxemburg passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-7454">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-7454">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="088e4-7455">八个数字或字母，无空格或分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-7455">eight digits or letters with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-7456">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-7456">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="088e4-7457">八个数字或字母 (不区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-7457">eight digits or letters (not case-sensitive)</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-7458">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-7458">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="088e4-7459">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-7459">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-7460">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-7460">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="088e4-7461">在 300 个字符的邻近度内，DLP 策略可高可信度地检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-7461">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-7462">正则表达式查找  `Regex_luxemburg_eu_passport_number` 与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-7462">The regular expression  `Regex_luxemburg_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-7463">找到或  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` 找到 `Keywords_luxemburg_eu_passport_number` 的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-7463">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_luxemburg_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-7464">正则表达式查找 `Regex_eu_passport_date3` DD MM YYYY 格式的日期或找到 `Keywords_eu_passport_date` 的关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-7464">The regular expression `Regex_eu_passport_date3` finds date in the format DD MM YYYY or a keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_date` is found</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="088e4-7465">在 300 个字符的邻近度内，DLP 策略具有中等可信度，即检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-7465">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-7466">正则表达式查找  `Regex_luxemburg_eu_passport_number` 与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-7466">The regular expression  `Regex_luxemburg_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-7467">找到或  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` 找到 `Keywords_luxemburg_eu_passport_number` 的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-7467">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_luxemburg_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Luxemburg Passport Number -->
      <Entity id="81d5c027-bed9-4421-91a0-3b2e55b3eb85" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_luxemburg_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_luxemburg_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Regex_eu_passport_date3" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_date" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_luxemburg_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_luxemburg_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="luxemburg-national-identification-number-non-natural-persons"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-7499"> (非自然人的) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-7499">Luxemburg national identification number (non-natural persons)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-7500">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-7500">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="088e4-7501">11 个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-7501">11 digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-7502">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-7502">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="088e4-7503">11 个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-7503">11 digits</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-7504">两个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-7504">two digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-7505">可选空格</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-7505">an optional space</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-7506">三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-7506">three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-7507">可选空格</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-7507">an optional space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-7508">三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-7508">three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-7509">可选空格</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-7509">an optional space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-7510">两个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-7510">two digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-7511">一个检查数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-7511">one check digit</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-7512">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-7512">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="088e4-7513">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-7513">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-7514">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-7514">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="088e4-7515">在 300 个字符的邻近度内，DLP 策略可高可信度地检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-7515">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-7516">该  `Func_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number_non_natural` 函数查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-7516">The function  `Func_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number_non_natural` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-7517">找到一个  `Keywords_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number` 关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-7517">A keyword from  `Keywords_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="088e4-7518">在 300 个字符的邻近度内，DLP 策略具有中等可信度，即检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-7518">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-7519">该  `Func_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number_non_natural` 函数查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-7519">The function  `Func_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number_non_natural` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Luxemburg National Identification Number (Non-natural persons) -->
      <Entity id="84bffa3a-d805-4788-a613-b1e4df3804cf" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number_non_natural" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number_non_natural" />
          <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_luxemburg_eu_telephone_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_luxemburg_eu_mobile_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="malaysia-identification-card-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-7559">马来西亚身份证号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-7559">Malaysia identification card number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-7560">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-7560">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="088e4-7561">12 个数字（包含可选连字符）</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-7561">12 digits containing optional hyphens</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-7562">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-7562">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="088e4-7563">12 个数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-7563">12 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-7564">YYMMDD 格式的六个数字，即出生日期</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-7564">six digits in the format YYMMDD, which are the date of birth</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-7565">短划线 (可选) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-7565">a dash (optional)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-7566">双字母的出生日期代码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-7566">two-letter place-of-birth code</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-7567">短划线 (可选) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-7567">a dash (optional)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-7568">三个随机数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-7568">three random digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-7569">一位数性别代码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-7569">one-digit gender code</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-7570">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-7570">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="088e4-7571">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-7571">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-7572">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-7572">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="088e4-7573">在 300 个字符的邻近度内，DLP 策略可高可信度地检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-7573">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-7574">正则表达式 Regex_malaysia_id_card_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-7574">The regular expression Regex_malaysia_id_card_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-7575">找到 Keyword_malaysia_id_card_number 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-7575">A keyword from Keyword_malaysia_id_card_number is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Malaysia ID Card Number -->
</Entity>
      <Entity id="7f0e921c-9677-435b-aba2-bb8f1013c749" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
            <IdMatch idRef="Regex_malaysia_id_card_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keyword_malaysia_id_card_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-7598">马来西亚身份证</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-7598">malaysia identity card</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-7599">管理身份卡</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-7599">malaysian identity card</span></span>

## <a name="malta-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-7602">马耳他驾驶证号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-7602">Malta driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-7603">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-7603">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="088e4-7604">指定模式中两个字符和六个数字的组合</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-7604">Combination of two characters and six digits in the specified pattern</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-7605">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-7605">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="088e4-7606">两个字符和六个数字的组合：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-7606">combination of two characters and six digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-7607">两个字符 (或字母，不区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-7607">two characters (digits or letters, not case-sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-7608">可选 (空格) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-7608">a space (optional)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-7609">三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-7609">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-7610">可选 (空格) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-7610">a space (optional)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-7611">三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-7611">three digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-7612">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-7612">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="088e4-7613">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-7613">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-7614">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-7614">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="088e4-7615">在 300 个字符的邻近度内，DLP 策略具有中等可信度，即检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-7615">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-7616">正则表达式查找  `Regex_malta_eu_driver's_license_number` 与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-7616">The regular expression  `Regex_malta_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-7617">找到或  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` 找到 `Keywords_malta_eu_driver's_license_number` 的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-7617">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_malta_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Malta Driver's License Number -->
      <Entity id="a3bdaa4a-8371-4735-8fa5-56ee0fb4afc4" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_malta_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_malta_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-7746">记录管理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-7746">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-7747">Microsoft 云应用安全</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-7747">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-7748">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-7748">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="088e4-7749">七个数字后跟一个字母</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-7749">seven digits followed by one letter</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-7750">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-7750">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="088e4-7751">七个数字后跟一个字母：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-7751">seven digits followed by one letter:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-7752">七个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-7752">seven digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-7753">"M、G、A、P、L、H、B、Z"中的一个字母 (不区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-7753">one letter in "M, G, A, P, L, H, B, Z" (case insensitive)</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-7754">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-7754">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="088e4-7755">不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-7755">Not applicable</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-7756">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-7756">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="088e4-7757">在 300 个字符的邻近度内，DLP 策略具有中等可信度，即检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-7757">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-7758">正则表达式查找  `Regex_malta_eu_national_id_card` 与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-7758">The regular expression  `Regex_malta_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-7759">找到一个  `Keywords_malta_eu_national_id_card` 关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-7759">A keyword from  `Keywords_malta_eu_national_id_card` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="088e4-7760">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，置信度较低：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-7760">A DLP policy has low confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-7761">正则表达式查找  `Regex_malta_eu_national_id_card` 与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-7761">The regular expression  `Regex_malta_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Malta Identity Card Number -->
      <Entity id="854b36b3-a388-4ac8-a4ec-677c2b5e4356" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_malta_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_malta_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_malta_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

#### <a name="keywords_malta_eu_national_id_card"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-7763">Keywords_malta_eu_national_id_card</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-7763">Keywords_malta_eu_national_id_card</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-7766">identifjet numru tal-jetjett</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-7766">identifika numru tal-biljett</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-7767">kodiċi数字个人</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-7767">kodiċi numerali personali</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-7768">numru ta 'identifikazzjoni personali</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-7768">numru ta 'identifikazzjoni personali</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-7769">numru ta 'identifikazzjoni tat-taxxa</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-7769">numru ta 'identifikazzjoni tat-taxxa</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-7770">numru ta 'identifkuzzjoni uniku</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-7770">numru ta 'identifikazzjoni uniku</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-7771">numru ta' identità uniku</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-7771">numru ta' identità uniku</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-7772">numru tas-servizz taċ-ċittadin</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-7772">numru tas-servizz taċ-ċittadin</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-7773">numru tat-taxxa</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-7773">numru tat-taxxa</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-7774">个人数字代码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-7774">personal numeric code</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-7775">唯一标识号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-7775">unique identification number</span></span>
