- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-7777">uniqueidentityno#</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-7777">uniqueidentityno#</span></span>


## <a name="malta-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-7778">马耳他护照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-7778">Malta passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-7779">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-7779">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="088e4-7780">不带空格或分隔符的七个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-7780">seven digits without spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-7781">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-7781">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="088e4-7782">七个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-7782">seven digits</span></span> 
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-7783">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-7783">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="088e4-7784">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-7784">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-7785">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-7785">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="088e4-7786">在 300 个字符的邻近度内，DLP 策略可高可信度地检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-7786">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-7787">正则表达式查找  `Regex_malta_eu_passport_number` 与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-7787">The regular expression  `Regex_malta_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-7788">找到或  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` 找到 `Keywords_malta_eu_passport_number` 的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-7788">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_malta_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-7789">找到一个 `Keywords_eu_passport_date` 关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-7789">A keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_date` is found</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="088e4-7790">在 300 个字符的邻近度内，DLP 策略具有中等可信度，即检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-7790">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-7791">正则表达式查找  `Regex_malta_eu_passport_number` 与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-7791">The regular expression  `Regex_malta_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-7792">找到或  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` 找到 `Keywords_malta_eu_passport_number` 的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-7792">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_malta_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Malta Passport Number -->
      <Entity id="b2b21198-48f9-4d13-b2a5-03969bff0fb8" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_malta_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_malta_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
          <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_date" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_malta_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_malta_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-7806">numru tal-passaport</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-7806">numru tal-passaport</span></span>

## <a name="malta-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-7812">马耳他税务标识号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-7812">Malta tax identification number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-7813">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-7813">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="088e4-7814">对于马耳他语的公民：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-7814">For Maltese nationals:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-7815">指定模式中七个数字和一个字母</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-7815">seven digits and one letter in the specified pattern</span></span>
  
<span data-ttu-id="088e4-7816">非马耳他语国家/省/市</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-7816">Non-Maltese nationals and Maltese entities:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-7817">九个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-7817">nine digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-7818">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-7818">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="088e4-7819">马耳他语：七位数字和一个字母</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-7819">Maltese nationals: seven digits and one letter</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-7820">七个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-7820">seven digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-7821">一个字母 (不区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-7821">one letter (not case-sensitive)</span></span>
    
<span data-ttu-id="088e4-7822">非马耳他语公民和马耳他实体：9 个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-7822">Non-Maltese nationals and Maltese entities: nine digits</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-7823">九个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-7823">nine digits</span></span> 
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-7824">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-7824">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="088e4-7825">不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-7825">Not applicable</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-7826">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-7826">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="088e4-7827">在 300 个字符的邻近度内，DLP 策略具有中等可信度，即检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-7827">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-7828">正则表达式或  `Regex_malta_eu_tax_file_number` `Regex_malta_eu_tax_file_number_non_maltese_national` 查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-7828">The regex  `Regex_malta_eu_tax_file_number`  or `Regex_malta_eu_tax_file_number_non_maltese_national` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-7829">找到一个  `Keywords_malta_eu_tax_file_number` 关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-7829">A keyword from  `Keywords_malta_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="088e4-7830">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，置信度较低：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-7830">A DLP policy has low confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-7831">正则表达式或  `Regex_malta_eu_tax_file_number` `Regex_malta_eu_tax_file_number_non_maltese_national` 查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-7831">The regex  `Regex_malta_eu_tax_file_number` or `Regex_malta_eu_tax_file_number_non_maltese_national` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Malta Tax ID Number -->
      <Entity id="ec830c63-65f4-45d0-9d8c-910dc8334b20" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_malta_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_malta_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_malta_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_malta_eu_tax_file_number_non_maltese_national" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_malta_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_malta_eu_tax_file_number_non_maltese_national" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-7832">关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-7832">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keywords_malta_eu_tax_file_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-7833">Keywords_malta_eu_tax_file_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-7833">Keywords_malta_eu_tax_file_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-7834">citizen service number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-7834">citizen service number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-7835">id tat-taxxa</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-7835">id tat-taxxa</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-7836">identifjet numru tal-jetjett</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-7836">identifika numru tal-biljett</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-7837">kodiċi数字个人</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-7837">kodiċi numerali personali</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-7838">numru ta 'identifikazzjoni personali</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-7838">numru ta 'identifikazzjoni personali</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-7839">numru ta 'identifikazzjoni tat-taxxa</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-7839">numru ta 'identifikazzjoni tat-taxxa</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-7840">numru ta 'identifkuzzjoni uniku</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-7840">numru ta 'identifikazzjoni uniku</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-7841">numru ta' identità uniku</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-7841">numru ta' identità uniku</span></span>

## <a name="netherlands-citizens-service-bsn-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-7864">荷兰公民的服务 (BSN) 号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-7864">Netherlands citizen's service (BSN) number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-7865">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-7865">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="088e4-7866">包含可选空格的八个或九个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-7866">eight or nine digits containing optional spaces</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-7867">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-7867">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="088e4-7868">八九个数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-7868">eight-nine digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-7869">三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-7869">three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-7870">可选 (空格) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-7870">a space (optional)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-7871">三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-7871">three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-7872">可选 (空格) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-7872">a space (optional)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-7873">两位三位</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-7873">two-three digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-7874">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-7874">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="088e4-7875">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-7875">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-7876">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-7876">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="088e4-7877">在 300 个字符的邻近度内，DLP 策略可高可信度地检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-7877">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-7878">函数 Func_netherlands_bsn 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-7878">The function Func_netherlands_bsn finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-7879">找到 Keyword_netherlands_bsn 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-7879">A keyword from Keyword_netherlands_bsn is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-7880">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-7880">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Netherlands Citizen's Service (BSN) Number -->
      <Entity id="c5f54253-ef7e-44f6-a578-440ed67e946d" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_netherlands_bsn" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_netherlands_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="netherlands-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-7904">荷兰驾驶证号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-7904">Netherlands driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-7905">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-7905">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="088e4-7906">10 个数字，不带空格和分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-7906">ten digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-7907">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-7907">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="088e4-7908">十个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-7908">ten digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-7909">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-7909">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="088e4-7910">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-7910">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-7911">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-7911">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="088e4-7912">在 300 个字符的邻近度内，DLP 策略具有中等可信度，即检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-7912">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-7913">正则表达式查找  `Regex_netherlands_eu_driver's_license_number` 与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-7913">The regular expression  `Regex_netherlands_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-7914">找到或  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` 找到 `Keywords_netherlands_eu_driver's_license_number` 的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-7914">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_netherlands_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Netherlands Driver's License Number -->
      <Entity id="6247fbea-ab80-4be5-8233-308b7c031401" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_netherlands_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_netherlands_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="netherlands-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-8042">荷兰护照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-8042">Netherlands passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-8043">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-8043">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="088e4-8044">无空格或分隔符的九个字母或数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-8044">nine letters or digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-8045">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-8045">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="088e4-8046">九个字母或数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-8046">nine letters or digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-8047">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-8047">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="088e4-8048">不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-8048">not applicable</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-8049">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-8049">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="088e4-8050">在 300 个字符的邻近度内，DLP 策略可高可信度地检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-8050">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-8051">正则表达式查找  `Regex_netherlands_eu_passport_number` 与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-8051">The regular expression  `Regex_netherlands_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-8052">找到或  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` 找到 `Keywords_netherlands_eu_passport_number` 的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-8052">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_netherlands_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-8053">正则表达式查找格式 `Regex_netherlands_eu_passport_date` 为 DD MMM/MMM YYYY (示例 - 26 MAA/MAR 2012) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-8053">The regular expression `Regex_netherlands_eu_passport_date` finds date in the format  DD MMM/MMM YYYY (Example - 26 MAA/MAR 2012)</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="088e4-8054">在 300 个字符的邻近度内，DLP 策略具有中等可信度，即检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-8054">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-8055">正则表达式查找  `Regex_netherlands_eu_passport_number` 与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-8055">The regular expression  `Regex_netherlands_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-8056">找到或  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` 找到 `Keywords_netherlands_eu_passport_number` 的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-8056">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_netherlands_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Netherlands Passport Number -->
      <Entity id="61786727-bafd-45f6-94d9-888d815e228e" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_netherlands_eu_passport_number" />
          <Match idRef="Regex_netherlands_eu_passport_date" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_netherlands_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_netherlands_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_netherlands_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="netherlands-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-8074">荷兰税务标识号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-8074">Netherlands tax identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="088e4-8075">此敏感信息类型仅适用于：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-8075">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-8076">数据丢失防护策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-8076">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-8077">通信合规性策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-8077">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-8078">信息治理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-8078">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-8079">记录管理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-8079">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-8080">Microsoft 云应用安全</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-8080">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-8081">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-8081">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="088e4-8082">不带空格或分隔符的九个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-8082">nine digits without spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-8083">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-8083">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="088e4-8084">九个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-8084">nine digits</span></span> 
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-8085">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-8085">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="088e4-8086">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-8086">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-8087">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-8087">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="088e4-8088">在 300 个字符的邻近度内，DLP 策略可高可信度地检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-8088">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-8089">该  `Func_netherlands_eu_tax_file_number` 函数查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-8089">The function  `Func_netherlands_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-8090">找到一个  `Keywords_netherlands_eu_tax_file_number` 关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-8090">A keyword from  `Keywords_netherlands_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="088e4-8091">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，置信度较低：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-8091">A DLP policy has low confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-8092">该  `Func_netherlands_eu_tax_file_number` 函数查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-8092">The function  `Func_netherlands_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Netherlands Tax Identification Number -->
      <Entity id="01f42a64-eba7-4892-a67b-398237e4ade2" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_netherlands_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_netherlands_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_netherlands_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="netherlands-value-added-tax-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-8130">荷兰增值税编号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-8130">Netherlands value added tax number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="088e4-8131">此敏感信息类型仅适用于：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-8131">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-8132">数据丢失防护策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-8132">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-8133">通信合规性策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-8133">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-8134">信息治理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-8134">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-8135">记录管理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-8135">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-8136">Microsoft 云应用安全</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-8136">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-8137">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-8137">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="088e4-8138">14 个字符字母数字模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-8138">14 character alphanumeric pattern</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-8139">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-8139">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="088e4-8140">14 个字符字母数字模式：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-8140">14-character alphanumeric pattern:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-8141">N 或 n</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-8141">N or n</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-8142">L 或 l</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-8142">L or l</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-8143">可选空格、点或连字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-8143">optional space, dot, or hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-8144">九个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-8144">nine digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-8145">可选空格、点或连字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-8145">optional space, dot, or hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-8146">B 或 b</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-8146">B or b</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-8147">两个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-8147">two digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-8148">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-8148">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="088e4-8149">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-8149">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-8150">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-8150">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="088e4-8151">在 300 个字符的邻近度内，DLP 策略可高可信度地检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-8151">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-8152">该函数Func_netherlands_value_added_tax_number查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-8152">The function Func_netherlands_value_added_tax_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-8153">找到来自Keywords_netherlands_value_added_tax_number的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-8153">A keyword from Keywords_netherlands_value_added_tax_number is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="088e4-8154">在 300 个字符的邻近度内，DLP 策略具有中等可信度，即检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-8154">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-8155">该函数Func_netherlands_value_added_tax_number查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-8155">The function Func_netherlands_value_added_tax_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Netherlands Value Added Tax Number -->
      <Entity id="4f320d9b-4972-41ae-b337-88d499bb1ade" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_netherlands_value_added_tax_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_netherlands_value_added_tax_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_netherlands_value_added_tax_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="new-zealand-bank-account-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-8164">新西兰银行帐号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-8164">New Zealand bank account number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="088e4-8165">此敏感信息类型仅适用于：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-8165">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-8166">数据丢失防护策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-8166">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-8167">通信合规性策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-8167">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-8168">信息治理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-8168">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-8169">记录管理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-8169">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-8170">Microsoft 云应用安全</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-8170">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-8171">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-8171">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="088e4-8172">带可选分隔符的 14 位到 16 位模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-8172">14-digit to 16-digit pattern with optional delimiter</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-8173">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-8173">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="088e4-8174">带可选分隔符的 14 位到 16 位模式：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-8174">14-digit to 16-digit pattern with optional delimiter:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-8175">两个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-8175">two digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-8176">可选连字符或空格</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-8176">an optional hyphen or space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-8177">三到四个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-8177">three to four digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-8178">可选连字符或空格</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-8178">an optional hyphen or space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-8179">七个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-8179">seven digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-8180">可选连字符或空格</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-8180">an optional hyphen or space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-8181">两到三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-8181">two to three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-8182">选项连字符或空格</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-8182">an options hyphen or space</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-8183">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-8183">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="088e4-8184">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-8184">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-8185">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-8185">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="088e4-8186">在 300 个字符的邻近度内，DLP 策略可高可信度地检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-8186">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-8187">该函数Func_new_zealand_bank_account_number查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-8187">The function Func_new_zealand_bank_account_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-8188">找到搜索Keywords_new_zealand_bank_account_number关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-8188">A keyword from Keywords_new_zealand_bank_account_number is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="088e4-8189">在 300 个字符的邻近度内，DLP 策略具有中等可信度，即检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-8189">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-8190">该函数Func_new_zealand_bank_account_number查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-8190">The function Func_new_zealand_bank_account_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- New Zealand Bank Account Number -->
      <Entity id="1a97fc2b-dd2f-48f1-bc4e-2ddf25813956" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_new_zealand_bank_account_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_new_zFealand_bank_account_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_new_zealand_bank_account_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-8191">关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-8191">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_new_zealand_bank_account_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-8192">Keyword_new_zealand_bank_account_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-8192">Keyword_new_zealand_bank_account_number</span></span>

## <a name="new-zealand-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-8198">新西兰驾驶证号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-8198">New Zealand driver's license number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="088e4-8199">此敏感信息类型仅适用于：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-8199">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-8200">数据丢失防护策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-8200">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-8201">通信合规性策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-8201">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-8202">信息治理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-8202">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-8203">记录管理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-8203">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-8204">Microsoft 云应用安全</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-8204">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-8205">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-8205">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="088e4-8206">八个字符字母数字模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-8206">eight character alphanumeric pattern</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-8207">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-8207">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="088e4-8208">八个字符字母数字模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-8208">eight character alphanumeric pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-8209">两个字母</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-8209">two letters</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-8210">六个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-8210">six digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-8211">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-8211">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="088e4-8212">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-8212">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-8213">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-8213">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="088e4-8214">在 300 个字符的邻近度内，DLP 策略可高可信度地检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-8214">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-8215">该函数Func_newzealand_driver_license_number查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-8215">The function Func_newzealand_driver_license_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-8216">找到来自Keywords_newzealand_driver_license_number关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-8216">A keyword from Keywords_newzealand_driver_license_number is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="088e4-8217">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，置信度较低：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-8217">A DLP policy has low confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-8218">该函数Func_newzealand_driver_license_number查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-8218">The function Func_newzealand_driver_license_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- New Zealand Driver License Number -->
      <Entity id="1924b377-d287-49c9-a737-cfe7a8a2615a" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_newzealand_driver_license_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_newzealand_driver_license_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_newzealand_driver_license_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="new-zealand-inland-revenue-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-8285">新西兰的收入数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-8285">New Zealand inland revenue number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="088e4-8286">此敏感信息类型仅适用于：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-8286">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-8287">数据丢失防护策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-8287">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-8288">通信合规性策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-8288">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-8289">信息治理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-8289">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-8290">记录管理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-8290">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-8291">Microsoft 云应用安全</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-8291">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-8292">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-8292">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="088e4-8293">带可选分隔符的八个或九个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-8293">eight or nine digits with optional delimiters</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-8294">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-8294">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="088e4-8295">带可选分隔符的八个或九个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-8295">eight or nine digits with optional delimiters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-8296">两个或三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-8296">two or three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-8297">可选空格或连字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-8297">an optional space or hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-8298">三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-8298">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-8299">可选空格或连字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-8299">an optional space or hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-8300">三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-8300">three digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-8301">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-8301">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="088e4-8302">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-8302">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-8303">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-8303">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="088e4-8304">在 300 个字符的邻近度内，DLP 策略可高可信度地检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-8304">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-8305">该函数Func_new_zealand_inland_revenue_number查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-8305">The function Func_new_zealand_inland_revenue_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-8306">找到搜索Keywords_new_zealand_inland_revenue_number关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-8306">A keyword from Keywords_new_zealand_inland_revenue_number is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="088e4-8307">在 300 个字符的邻近度内，DLP 策略具有中等可信度，即检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-8307">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-8308">该函数Func_new_zealand_inland_revenue_number查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-8308">The function Func_new_zealand_inland_revenue_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- New Zealand Inland Revenue Number -->
      <Entity id="dd0fe2bc-7bcf-455f-bac1-83b1e3eb25fd" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_new_zealand_inland_revenue_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_new_zealand_inland_revenue_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_new_zealand_inland_revenue_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-8309">关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-8309">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_new_zealand_inland_revenue_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-8310">Keyword_new_zealand_inland_revenue_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-8310">Keyword_new_zealand_inland_revenue_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-8311">否。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-8311">ird no.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-8312">ird no#</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-8312">ird no#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-8313">nz ird</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-8313">nz ird</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-8314">新西兰 ird</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-8314">new zealand ird</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-8315">ird number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-8315">ird number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-8316">区收入数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-8316">inland revenue number</span></span>


## <a name="new-zealand-ministry-of-health-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-8317">新西兰卫生服务号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-8317">New Zealand ministry of health number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-8318">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-8318">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="088e4-8319">三个字母，一个 (可选) ，四个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-8319">three letters, a space (optional), and four digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-8320">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-8320">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-8321">三个字母 (区分大小写) "I"和"O"除外</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-8321">three letters (not case-sensitive) except 'I' and 'O'</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-8322">可选 (空格) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-8322">a space (optional)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-8323">四个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-8323">four digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-8324">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-8324">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="088e4-8325">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-8325">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-8326">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-8326">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="088e4-8327">在 300 个字符的邻近度内，DLP 策略可高可信度地检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-8327">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-8328">函数 Func_new_zealand_ministry_of_health_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-8328">The function Func_new_zealand_ministry_of_health_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-8329">找到 Keyword_nz_terms 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-8329">A keyword from Keyword_nz_terms is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-8330">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-8330">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="088e4-8331">在 300 个字符的邻近度内，DLP 策略具有中等可信度，即检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-8331">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-8332">函数 Func_new_zealand_ministry_of_health_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-8332">The function Func_new_zealand_ministry_of_health_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-8333">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-8333">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
    <!-- New Zealand Health Number -->
    <Entity id="2b71c1c8-d14e-4430-82dc-fd1ed6bf05c7" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_new_zealand_ministry_of_health_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_nz_terms" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_new_zealand_ministry_of_health_number" />
       </Pattern>
    </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-8334">关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-8334">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_nz_terms"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-8335">Keyword_nz_terms</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-8335">Keyword_nz_terms</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-8336">NHI</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-8336">NHI</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-8337">New Zealand</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-8337">New Zealand</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-8338">健康</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-8338">Health</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-8339">处理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-8339">treatment</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-8340">National Health Index Number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-8340">National Health Index Number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-8342">nhi no.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-8342">nhi no.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-8343">NHI#</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-8343">NHI#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-8344">National Health Index No.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-8344">National Health Index No.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-8345">National Health Index Id</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-8345">National Health Index Id</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-8346">国家健康索引#</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-8346">National Health Index #</span></span>

## <a name="new-zealand-social-welfare-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-8347">新西兰社会电话号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-8347">New Zealand social welfare number</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="088e4-8348">此敏感信息类型仅适用于：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-8348">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-8349">数据丢失防护策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-8349">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-8350">通信合规性策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-8350">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-8351">信息治理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-8351">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-8352">记录管理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-8352">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-8353">Microsoft 云应用安全</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-8353">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-8354">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-8354">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="088e4-8355">九个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-8355">nine digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-8356">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-8356">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="088e4-8357">九个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-8357">nine digits</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-8358">三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-8358">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-8359">可选连字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-8359">an optional hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-8360">三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-8360">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-8361">可选连字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-8361">an optional hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-8362">三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-8362">three digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-8363">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-8363">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="088e4-8364">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-8364">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-8365">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-8365">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="088e4-8366">在 300 个字符的邻近度内，DLP 策略可高可信度地检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-8366">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-8367">函数Func_newzealand_social_welfare_number查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-8367">The function Func_newzealand_social_welfare_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-8368">找到来自Keywords_newzealand_social_welfare_number关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-8368">A keyword from Keywords_newzealand_social_welfare_number is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="088e4-8369">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，置信度较低：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-8369">A DLP policy has low confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-8370">函数Func_newzealand_social_welfare_number查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-8370">The function Func_newzealand_social_welfare_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Newzealand Social Welfare Number -->
      <Entity id="20f3c48d-4ac1-4cd2-86bd-34ecc1826e9d" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_newzealand_social_welfare_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_newzealand_social_welfare_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_newzealand_social_welfare_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
    </Version>
```

#### <a name="keyword_new_zealand_social_welfare_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-8372">Keyword_new_zealand_social_welfare_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-8372">Keyword_new_zealand_social_welfare_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-8374">社交发展#</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-8374">social welfare#</span></span>

## <a name="norway-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-8378">挪威标识号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-8378">Norway identification number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-8379">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-8379">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="088e4-8380">11 个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-8380">11 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-8381">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-8381">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="088e4-8382">11 个数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-8382">11 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-8383">六个数字，格式为 DDMMYY，表示出生日期</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-8383">six digits in the format DDMMYY which are the date of birth</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-8384">三位数个人号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-8384">three-digit individual number</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-8385">两个检查数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-8385">two check digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-8386">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-8386">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="088e4-8387">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-8387">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-8388">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-8388">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="088e4-8389">在 300 个字符的邻近度内，DLP 策略可高可信度地检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-8389">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-8390">函数 Func_norway_id_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-8390">The function Func_norway_id_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-8391">找到 Keyword_norway_id_number 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-8391">A keyword from Keyword_norway_id_number is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-8392">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-8392">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="088e4-8393">在 300 个字符的邻近度内，DLP 策略具有中等可信度，即检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-8393">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-8394">函数 Func_norway_id_numbe 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-8394">The function Func_norway_id_numbe finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-8395">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-8395">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Norway Identification Number -->
<Entity id="d4c8a798-e9f2-4bd3-9652-500d24080fc3" recommendedConfidence="85" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_norway_id_number"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_norway_id_number"/>
  </Pattern>
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_norway_id_number"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-8396">关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-8396">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_norway_id_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-8397">Keyword_norway_id_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-8397">Keyword_norway_id_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-8398">Personal identification number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-8398">Personal identification number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-8399">Norwegian ID Number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-8399">Norwegian ID Number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-8400">ID Number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-8400">ID Number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-8401">标识</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-8401">Identification</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-8402">Personnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-8402">Personnummer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-8403">Fselsnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-8403">Fødselsnummer</span></span>

   
## <a name="philippines-unified-multi-purpose-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-8404">菲律宾统一的多用途标识号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-8404">Philippines unified multi-purpose identification number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-8405">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-8405">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="088e4-8406">12 个数字，通过连字符分隔 </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-8406">12 digits separated by hyphens</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-8407">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-8407">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="088e4-8408">12 个数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-8408">12 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-8409">四个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-8409">four digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-8410">连字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-8410">a hyphen</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-8411">七个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-8411">seven digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-8412">连字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-8412">a hyphen</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-8413">一个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-8413">one digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-8414">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-8414">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="088e4-8415">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-8415">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-8416">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-8416">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="088e4-8417">在 300 个字符的邻近度内，DLP 策略具有中等可信度，即检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-8417">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-8418">正则表达式 Regex_philippines_unified_id 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-8418">The regular expression Regex_philippines_unified_id finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-8419">找到 Keyword_philippines_id 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-8419">A keyword from Keyword_philippines_id is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Philippines Unified Multi-Purpose ID number -->
<Entity id="019b39dd-8c25-4765-91a3-d9c6baf3c3b3" recommendedConfidence="75" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Regex_philippines_unified_id"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_philippines_id"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-8420">关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-8420">Keywords</span></span>
   
#### <a name="keyword_philippines_id"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-8421">Keyword_philippines_id</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-8421">Keyword_philippines_id</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-8422">Unified Multi-Purpose ID</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-8422">Unified Multi-Purpose ID</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-8423">UMID</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-8423">UMID</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-8425">Pinag-isang Multi-Layunin ID</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-8425">Pinag-isang Multi-Layunin ID</span></span>

## <a name="poland-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-8426">波兰驾驶证号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-8426">Poland driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-8427">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-8427">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="088e4-8428">14 个数字，包含 2 个正斜杠</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-8428">14 digits containing 2 forward slashes</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-8429">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-8429">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="088e4-8430">14 个数字和 2 个正斜杠：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-8430">14 digits and 2 forward slashes:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-8431">五个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-8431">five digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-8432">正斜杠</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-8432">a forward slash</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-8433">两个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-8433">two digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-8434">正斜杠</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-8434">a forward slash</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-8435">七个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-8435">seven digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-8436">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-8436">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="088e4-8437">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-8437">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-8438">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-8438">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="088e4-8439">在 300 个字符的邻近度内，DLP 策略具有中等可信度，即检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-8439">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-8440">正则表达式查找  `Regex_poland_eu_driver's_license_number` 与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-8440">The regular expression  `Regex_poland_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-8441">找到或  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` 找到 `Keywords_poland_eu_driver's_license_number` 的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-8441">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_poland_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Poland Driver's License Number -->
      <Entity id="24d51f99-ee9e-4060-a077-cae58cab1ee4" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_poland_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_poland_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="poland-identity-card"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-8565">波兰身份证</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-8565">Poland identity card</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-8566">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-8566">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="088e4-8567">三个字母和六个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-8567">three letters and six digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-8568">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-8568">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="088e4-8569">三个字母 (不区分大小写) 后跟六个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-8569">three letters (not case-sensitive) followed by six digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-8570">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-8570">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="088e4-8571">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-8571">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-8572">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-8572">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="088e4-8573">在 300 个字符的邻近度内，DLP 策略具有中等可信度，即检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-8573">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-8574">函数 Func_polish_national_id 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-8574">The function Func_polish_national_id finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-8575">找到 Keyword_polish_national_id_passport_number 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-8575">A keyword from Keyword_polish_national_id_passport_number is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-8576">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-8576">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Poland Identity Card-->
<Entity id="25E64989-ED5D-40CA-A939-6C14183BB7BF" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_polish_national_id" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_polish_national_id_passport_number" />
      </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-8577">关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-8577">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_poland_national_id_passport_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-8578">Keyword_poland_national_id_passport_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-8578">Keyword_poland_national_id_passport_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-8579">博拉维多 osobisty</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-8579">Dowód osobisty</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-8580">Numer dowodu osobistego</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-8580">Numer dowodu osobistego</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-8581">Nazwa i numer dowodu osobistego</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-8581">Nazwa i numer dowodu osobistego</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-8582">Nazwa i nr dowodu osobistego</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-8582">Nazwa i nr dowodu osobistego</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-8583">Nazwa i nr dowodu tożsamości</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-8583">Nazwa i nr dowodu tożsamości</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-8584">Dowód Tożsamości</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-8584">Dowód Tożsamości</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-8585">。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-8585">dow.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="088e4-8586">os.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-8586">os.</span></span>

   
## <a name="poland-national-id-pesel"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-8587">波兰国家/ (PESEL) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-8587">Poland national ID (PESEL)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-8588">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-8588">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="088e4-8589">11 个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-8589">11 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-8590">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-8590">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-8591">六个数字，表示 YYMMDD 格式的出生日期</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-8591">six digits representing date of birth in the format YYMMDD</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-8592">四个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-8592">four digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-8593">一个检查数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-8593">one check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-8594">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-8594">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="088e4-8595">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-8595">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-8596">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-8596">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="088e4-8597">在 300 个字符的邻近度内，DLP 策略可高可信度地检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-8597">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-8598">函数 Func_pesel_identification_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-8598">The function Func_pesel_identification_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-8599">找到 Keyword_pesel_identification_number 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-8599">A keyword from Keyword_pesel_identification_number is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-8600">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-8600">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="088e4-8601">在 300 个字符的邻近度内，DLP 策略具有中等可信度，即检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-8601">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-8602">函数 Func_pesel_identification_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-8602">The function Func_pesel_identification_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-8603">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-8603">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Poland National ID (PESEL) -->
      <Entity id="E3AAF206-4297-412F-9E06-BA8487E22456" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_pesel_identification_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_pesel_identification_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_pesel_identification_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="poland-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-8615">波兰护照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-8615">Poland passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="088e4-8616">此敏感信息类型实体包含在欧盟护照号码敏感信息类型中。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-8616">This sensitive information type entity is included in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="088e4-8617">它作为独立的敏感信息类型实体提供。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-8617">It's available as a stand-alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-8618">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-8618">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="088e4-8619">两个字母和七个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-8619">two letters and seven digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-8620">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-8620">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="088e4-8621">两个字母 (区分大小写) 后跟七个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-8621">Two letters (not case-sensitive) followed by seven digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-8622">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-8622">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="088e4-8623">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-8623">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-8624">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-8624">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="088e4-8625">在 300 个字符的邻近度内，DLP 策略可高可信度地检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-8625">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-8626">函数 Func_polish_passport_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-8626">The function Func_polish_passport_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-8627">找到 Keyword_polish_national_id_passport_number 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-8627">A keyword from Keyword_polish_national_id_passport_number is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-8628">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-8628">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Poland Passport Number -->
<Entity id="03937FB5-D2B6-4487-B61F-0F8BFF7C3517" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_polish_passport_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_polish_national_id_passport_number" />
      </Pattern>
</Entity>
</Version>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-8629">关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-8629">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_poland_national_id_passport_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-8630">Keyword_poland_national_id_passport_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-8630">Keyword_poland_national_id_passport_number</span></span>
