- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-8632">Nr.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-8632">Nr.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="088e4-8633">Paszportu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-8633">Paszportu</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-8634">Paszport</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-8634">Paszport</span></span>

## <a name="poland-regon-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-8635">波兰 REGON 号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-8635">Poland REGON number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="088e4-8636">此敏感信息类型仅适用于：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-8636">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-8637">数据丢失防护策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-8637">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-8638">通信合规性策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-8638">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-8639">信息治理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-8639">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-8640">记录管理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-8640">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-8641">Microsoft 云应用安全</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-8641">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-8642">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-8642">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="088e4-8643">9 位或 14 位号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-8643">9-digit or 14-digit number</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-8644">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-8644">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="088e4-8645">九位数字或 14 位号码：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-8645">nine digit or 14-digit number:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-8646">九位数字或</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-8646">nine digits or</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-8647">九个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-8647">nine digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-8648">连字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-8648">hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-8649">五个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-8649">five digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-8650">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-8650">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="088e4-8651">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-8651">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-8652">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-8652">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="088e4-8653">在 300 个字符的邻近度内，DLP 策略可高可信度地检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-8653">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-8654">函数Func_polish_regon_number查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-8654">The function Func_polish_regon_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-8655">找到搜索Keywords_polish_regon_number关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-8655">A keyword from Keywords_polish_regon_number is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="088e4-8656">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，置信度较低：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-8656">A DLP policy has low confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-8657">函数Func_polish_regon_number查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-8657">The function Func_polish_regon_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Polish REGON Number  -->
      <Entity id="fc87b421-f437-4f8b-b739-29a735ead0d9" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_polish_regon_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_polish_regon_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_polish_regon_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```
### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-8658">关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-8658">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keywords_poland_regon_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-8659">Keywords_poland_regon_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-8659">Keywords_poland_regon_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-8660">regon id</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-8660">regon id</span></span>

## <a name="poland-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-8674">波兰税务标识号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-8674">Poland tax identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="088e4-8675">此敏感信息类型仅适用于：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-8675">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-8676">数据丢失防护策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-8676">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-8677">通信合规性策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-8677">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-8678">信息治理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-8678">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-8679">记录管理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-8679">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-8680">Microsoft 云应用安全</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-8680">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-8681">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-8681">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="088e4-8682">11 个数字，无空格或分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-8682">11 digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-8683">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-8683">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="088e4-8684">11 个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-8684">11 digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-8685">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-8685">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="088e4-8686">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-8686">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-8687">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-8687">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="088e4-8688">在 300 个字符的邻近度内，DLP 策略可高可信度地检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-8688">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-8689">该  `Func_poland_eu_tax_file_number` 函数查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-8689">The function  `Func_poland_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-8690">找到一个  `Keywords_poland_eu_tax_file_number` 关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-8690">A keyword from  `Keywords_poland_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
  
```xml
      <!-- Poland Tax Identification Number -->
      <Entity id="1ff28b4d-40f2-49e9-b677-9606a88e2bca" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_poland_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_poland_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="portugal-citizen-card-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-8720">葡萄牙公民卡号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-8720">Portugal citizen card number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-8721">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-8721">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="088e4-8722">八个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-8722">eight digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-8723">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-8723">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="088e4-8724">八个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-8724">eight digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-8725">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-8725">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="088e4-8726">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-8726">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-8727">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-8727">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="088e4-8728">在 300 个字符的邻近度内，DLP 策略可高可信度地检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-8728">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-8729">正则表达式 Regex_portugal_citizen_card 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-8729">The regular expression Regex_portugal_citizen_card finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-8730">找到 Keyword_portugal_citizen_card 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-8730">A keyword from Keyword_portugal_citizen_card is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Portugal Citizen Card Number -->
<Entity id="91a7ece2-add4-4986-9a15-c84544d81ecd" recommendedConfidence="85" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
     <IdMatch idRef="Regex_portugal_citizen_card"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_portugal_citizen_card"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="portugal-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-8750">葡萄牙驾驶证号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-8750">Portugal driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-8751">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-8751">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="088e4-8752">两个模式 - 两个字母后跟 5-8 个数字（带特殊字符）</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-8752">two patterns - two letters followed by 5-8 digits with special characters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-8753">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-8753">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="088e4-8754">模式 1：两个字母后跟 5/6 特殊字符：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-8754">Pattern 1: Two letters followed by 5/6 with special characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-8755">两个字母 (不区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-8755">Two letters (not case-sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-8756">一个连字符 </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-8756">A hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-8757">五个或六个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-8757">Five or Six digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-8758">一个空格</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-8758">A space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-8759">一位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-8759">One digit</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="088e4-8760">模式 2：一个字母后跟 6/8 个数字，带特殊字符：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-8760">Pattern 2: One letter followed by 6/8 digits with special characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-8761">一个字母 (不区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-8761">One letter (not case-sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-8762">一个连字符 </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-8762">A hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-8763">六个或八个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-8763">Six or eight digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-8764">一个空格</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-8764">A space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-8765">一个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-8765">One digit</span></span>

    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-8766">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-8766">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="088e4-8767">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-8767">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-8768">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-8768">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="088e4-8769">在 300 个字符的邻近度内，DLP 策略具有中等可信度，即检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-8769">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-8770">正则表达式查找  `Regex_portugal_eu_driver's_license_number` 与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-8770">The regular expression  `Regex_portugal_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-8771">找到或  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` 找到 `Keywords_portugal_eu_driver's_license_number` 的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-8771">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_portugal_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Portugal Driver's License Number -->
      <Entity id="977f1e5a-2c33-4bcc-b516-95bb275cff23" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_portugal_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_portugal_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-8772">关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-8772">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keywords_eu_drivers_license_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-8773">Keywords_eu_driver s_license_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-8773">Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-8774">driverlic</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-8774">driverlic</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-8775">driverlics</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-8775">driverlics</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-8776">driverlicense</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-8776">driverlicense</span></span>

## <a name="portugal-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-8903">葡萄牙护照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-8903">Portugal passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-8904">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-8904">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="088e4-8905">一个字母后跟六个数字，无空格或分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-8905">one letter followed by six digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-8906">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-8906">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="088e4-8907">一个字母后跟六个数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-8907">one letter followed by six digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-8908">一个字母 (不区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-8908">one letter (not case-sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-8909">六个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-8909">six digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-8910">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-8910">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="088e4-8911">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-8911">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-8912">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-8912">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="088e4-8913">在 300 个字符的邻近度内，DLP 策略可高可信度地检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-8913">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-8914">正则表达式查找  `Regex_portugal_eu_passport_number` 与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-8914">The regular expression  `Regex_portugal_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-8915">找到或  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` 找到 `Keywords_portugal_eu_passport_number` 的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-8915">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_portugal_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-8916">正则表达式查找 `Regex_eu_passport_date1` DD.MM.YYYY 格式的日期或找到 `Keywords_eu_passport_date` 的关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-8916">The regular expression `Regex_eu_passport_date1` finds date in the format DD.MM.YYYY or a keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_date` is found</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="088e4-8917">在 300 个字符的邻近度内，DLP 策略具有中等可信度，即检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-8917">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-8918">正则表达式查找  `Regex_portugal_eu_passport_number` 与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-8918">The regular expression  `Regex_portugal_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-8919">找到或  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` 找到 `Keywords_portugal_eu_passport_number` 的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-8919">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_portugal_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span>
    
```xml
      <!-- Portugal Passport Number -->
      <Entity id="080a52fd-a7bc-431e-b54d-51f08f59db11" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_portugal_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_portugal_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Regex_eu_passport_date1" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_date" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_portugal_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_portugal_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="portugal-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-8946">葡萄牙税务标识号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-8946">Portugal tax identification number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-8947">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-8947">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="088e4-8948">九个数字（带可选空格）</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-8948">nine digits with optional spaces</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-8949">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-8949">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-8950">三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-8950">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-8951">可选空格</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-8951">an optional space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-8952">三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-8952">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-8953">可选空格</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-8953">an optional space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-8954">三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-8954">three digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-8955">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-8955">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="088e4-8956">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-8956">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-8957">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-8957">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="088e4-8958">在 300 个字符的邻近度内，DLP 策略可高可信度地检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-8958">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-8959">该  `Func_portugal_eu_tax_file_number` 函数查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-8959">The function  `Func_portugal_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-8960">找到一个  `Keywords_portugal_eu_tax_file_number` 关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-8960">A keyword from  `Keywords_portugal_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="088e4-8961">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，置信度较低：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-8961">A DLP policy has low confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-8962">该  `Func_portugal_eu_tax_file_number` 函数查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-8962">The function  `Func_portugal_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Portugal Tax Identification Number -->
      <Entity id="65372402-3131-4f1e-9983-4439841d1f15" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_portugal_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_portugal_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_portugal_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-8979">一些#</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-8979">taxidno#</span></span>

## <a name="romania-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-8987">罗马尼亚驾驶证号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-8987">Romania driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-8988">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-8988">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="088e4-8989">一个字符后跟八个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-8989">one character followed by eight digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-8990">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-8990">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="088e4-8991">一个字符后跟八个数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-8991">one character followed by eight digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-8992">一个字母 (不区分大小写) 或数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-8992">one letter (not case-sensitive) or digit</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-8993">八个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-8993">eight digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-8994">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-8994">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="088e4-8995">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-8995">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-8996">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-8996">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="088e4-8997">在 300 个字符的邻近度内，DLP 策略具有中等可信度，即检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-8997">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-8998">正则表达式查找  `Regex_romania_eu_driver's_license_number` 与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-8998">The regular expression  `Regex_romania_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-8999">找到或  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` 找到 `Keywords_romania_eu_driver's_license_number` 的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-8999">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_romania_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Romania Driver's License Number -->
      <Entity id="b5511ace-2fd8-4ae4-b6fc-c7c6e4689e3c" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_romania_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_romania_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="romania-personal-numeric-code-cnp"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-9127">罗马尼亚个人数字代码 (CNP) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-9127">Romania personal numeric code (CNP)</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="088e4-9128">此敏感信息类型仅适用于：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-9128">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-9129">数据丢失防护策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-9129">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-9130">通信合规性策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-9130">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-9131">信息治理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-9131">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-9132">记录管理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-9132">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-9133">Microsoft 云应用安全</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-9133">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-9134">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-9134">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="088e4-9135">13 个数字，不含空格和分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-9135">13 digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-9136">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-9136">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-9137">一个数字，从 1 到 9</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-9137">one digit from 1-9</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-9138">六个数字，表示 YYMMDD (出生日期) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-9138">six digits representing date of birth (YYMMDD)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-9139">两个数字，可以是 01-52 或 99</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-9139">two digits, which can be 01-52 or 99</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-9140">四个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-9140">four digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-9141">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-9141">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="088e4-9142">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-9142">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-9143">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-9143">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="088e4-9144">在 300 个字符的邻近度内，DLP 策略可高可信度地检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-9144">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-9145">该  `Func_romania_eu_national_id_card` 函数查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-9145">The function  `Func_romania_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-9146">找到一个  `Keywords_romania_eu_national_id_card` 关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-9146">A keyword from  `Keywords_romania_eu_national_id_card` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="088e4-9147">在 300 个字符的邻近度内，DLP 策略具有中等可信度，即检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-9147">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-9148">该  `Func_romania_eu_national_id_card` 函数查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-9148">The function  `Func_romania_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Romania Personal Numerical Code (CNP) -->
      <Entity id="eb5fa399-fe28-4c67-8188-d63a616ed89c" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_romania_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_romania_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_romania_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="romania-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-9199">罗马尼亚护照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-9199">Romania passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-9200">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-9200">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="088e4-9201">八个或九个数字，不带空格和分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-9201">eight or nine digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-9202">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-9202">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="088e4-9203">八个或九个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-9203">eight or nine digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-9204">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-9204">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="088e4-9205">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-9205">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-9206">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-9206">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="088e4-9207">在 300 个字符的邻近度内，DLP 策略可高可信度地检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-9207">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-9208">正则表达式查找  `Regex_romania_eu_passport_number` 与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-9208">The regular expression  `Regex_romania_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-9209">找到或  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` 找到 `Keywords_romania_eu_passport_number` 的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-9209">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_romania_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-9210">正则表达式查找 `Regex_romania_eu_passport_date` DD MMM/MMM YY (示例- 01 二月/二月 10) 或找到 `Keywords_eu_passport_date` 的关键字的日期</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-9210">The regular expression `Regex_romania_eu_passport_date` finds date in the format DD MMM/MMM YY (Example- 01 FEB/FEB 10) or a keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_date` is found</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="088e4-9211">在 300 个字符的邻近度内，DLP 策略具有中等可信度，即检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-9211">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-9212">正则表达式查找  `Regex_romania_eu_passport_number` 与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-9212">The regular expression  `Regex_romania_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-9213">找到或  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` 找到 `Keywords_romania_eu_passport_number` 的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-9213">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_romania_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Romania Passport Number -->
      <Entity id="5d31b90c-7fe2-4a76-a14b-767b8fd19d6c" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_romania_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_romania_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Regex_romania_eu_passport_date" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_date" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_romania_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_romania_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="russia-passport-number-domestic"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-9231">俄罗斯护照号码国内</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-9231">Russia passport number domestic</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="088e4-9232">此敏感信息类型仅适用于：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-9232">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-9233">数据丢失防护策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-9233">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-9234">通信合规性策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-9234">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-9235">信息治理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-9235">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-9236">记录管理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-9236">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-9237">Microsoft 云应用安全</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-9237">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-9238">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-9238">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="088e4-9239">10 位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-9239">10-digit number</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-9240">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-9240">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="088e4-9241">10 位数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-9241">10-digit number:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-9242">两个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-9242">two digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-9243">可选空格或连字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-9243">an optional space or hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-9244">两个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-9244">two digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-9245">可选空格</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-9245">an optional space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-9246">六个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-9246">six digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-9247">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-9247">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="088e4-9248">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-9248">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-9249">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-9249">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="088e4-9250">在 300 个字符的邻近度内，DLP 策略具有中等可信度，即检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-9250">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-9251">正则表达式Regex_Russian_Passport_Number_Domestic查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-9251">The regex Regex_Russian_Passport_Number_Domestic finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-9252">找到来自Keyword_Russian_Passport_Number的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-9252">A keyword from Keyword_Russian_Passport_Number is found.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Russian Passport Number Domestic -->
      <Entity id="76ec2f5d-cedb-48e1-8070-1998794af445" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_Russian_Passport_Number_Domestic" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_Russian_Passport_Number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="russia-passport-number-international"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-9269">俄罗斯护照号码国际</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-9269">Russia passport number international</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="088e4-9270">此敏感信息类型仅适用于：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-9270">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-9271">数据丢失防护策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-9271">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-9272">通信合规性策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-9272">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-9273">信息治理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-9273">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-9274">记录管理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-9274">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-9275">Microsoft 云应用安全</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-9275">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-9276">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-9276">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="088e4-9277">九位数</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-9277">nine-digit number</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-9278">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-9278">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="088e4-9279">九位数：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-9279">nine-digit number:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-9280">两个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-9280">two digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-9281">可选空格或连字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-9281">an optional space or hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-9282">七个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-9282">seven digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-9283">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-9283">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="088e4-9284">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-9284">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-9285">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-9285">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="088e4-9286">在 300 个字符的邻近度内，DLP 策略具有中等可信度，即检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-9286">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-9287">正则表达式Regex_Russian_Passport_Number_International查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-9287">The regex Regex_Russian_Passport_Number_International finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-9288">找到来自Keyword_Russian_Passport_Number的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-9288">A keyword from Keyword_Russian_Passport_Number is found.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Russian Passport Number International -->
      <Entity id="ac5f4878-75e4-4b82-af2d-02e13ea9f411" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_Russian_Passport_Number_International" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_Russian_Passport_Number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="saudi-arabia-national-id"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-9305">沙特阿拉伯国家 ID</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-9305">Saudi Arabia National ID</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-9306">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-9306">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="088e4-9307">10 个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-9307">10 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-9308">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-9308">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="088e4-9309">10 个连续的数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-9309">10 consecutive digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-9310">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-9310">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="088e4-9311">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-9311">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-9312">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-9312">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="088e4-9313">在 300 个字符的邻近度内，DLP 策略具有中等可信度，即检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-9313">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-9314">正则表达式 Regex_saudi_arabia_national_id 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-9314">The regular expression Regex_saudi_arabia_national_id finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-9315">找到 Keyword_saudi_arabia_national_id 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-9315">A keyword from Keyword_saudi_arabia_national_id is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Saudi Arabia National ID -->
<Entity id="8c5a0ba8-404a-41a3-8871-746aa21ee6c0" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_saudi_arabia_national_id" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_saudi_arabia_national_id" />
        </Any>
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-9316">关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-9316">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_saudi_arabia_national_id"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-9317">Keyword_saudi_arabia_national_id</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-9317">Keyword_saudi_arabia_national_id</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-9320">ID number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-9320">ID number</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-9321">الوطنية الهوية بطاقة رقم</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-9321">الوطنية الهوية بطاقة رقم</span></span> 

   
## <a name="singapore-national-registration-identity-card-nric-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-9322">新加坡国家/ (身份证号码) NRIC 号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-9322">Singapore national registration identity card (NRIC) number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-9323">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-9323">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="088e4-9324">九个字母和数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-9324">nine letters and digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-9325">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-9325">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-9326">九个字母和数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-9326">nine letters and digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-9327">字母"F"、"G"、"S"或"T" (不区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-9327">the letter "F", "G", "S", or "T" (not case-sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-9328">七个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-9328">seven digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-9329">字母检查数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-9329">an alphabetic check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-9330">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-9330">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="088e4-9331">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-9331">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-9332">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-9332">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="088e4-9333">在 300 个字符的邻近度内，DLP 策略可高可信度地检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-9333">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-9334">正则表达式 Regex_singapore_nric 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-9334">The regular expression Regex_singapore_nric finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-9335">找到 Keyword_singapore_nric 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-9335">A keyword from Keyword_singapore_nric is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-9336">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-9336">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="088e4-9337">在 300 个字符的邻近度内，DLP 策略具有中等可信度，即检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-9337">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-9338">正则表达式 Regex_singapore_nric 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-9338">The regular expression Regex_singapore_nric finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-9339">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-9339">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Singapore National Registration Identity Card (NRIC) Number -->
<Entity id="cead390a-dd83-4856-9751-fb6dc98c34da" recommendedConfidence="75" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
     <IdMatch idRef="Regex_singapore_nric"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_singapore_nric"/>
  </Pattern>
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Regex_singapore_nric"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

#### <a name="keyword_singapore_nric"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-9341">Keyword_singapore_nric</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-9341">Keyword_singapore_nric</span></span>

## <a name="slovakia-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-9350">斯洛伐克驾驶证号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-9350">Slovakia driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-9351">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-9351">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="088e4-9352">一个字符后跟七个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-9352">one character followed by seven digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-9353">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-9353">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="088e4-9354">一个字符后跟七个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-9354">one character followed by seven digits</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-9355">一个字母 (不区分大小写) 或数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-9355">one letter (not case-sensitive) or digit</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-9356">七个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-9356">seven digits</span></span> 
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-9357">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-9357">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="088e4-9358">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-9358">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-9359">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-9359">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="088e4-9360">在 300 个字符的邻近度内，DLP 策略具有中等可信度，即检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-9360">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-9361">正则表达式查找  `Regex_slovakia_eu_driver's_license_number` 与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-9361">The regular expression  `Regex_slovakia_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-9362">找到或  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` 找到 `Keywords_slovakia_eu_driver's_license_number` 的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-9362">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_slovakia_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Slovakia Driver's License Number -->
      <Entity id="14240c22-b6de-4ce5-a90b-137f74252513" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_slovakia_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_slovakia_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-9363">关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-9363">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keywords_eu_drivers_license_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-9364">Keywords_eu_driver s_license_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-9364">Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-9365">driverlic</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-9365">driverlic</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-9366">driverlics</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-9366">driverlics</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-9367">driverlicense</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-9367">driverlicense</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-9368">driverlicenses</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-9368">driverlicenses</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-9369">driverlicence</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-9369">driverlicence</span></span>

## <a name="slovakia-personal-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-9488">斯洛伐克个人编号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-9488">Slovakia personal number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="088e4-9489">此敏感信息类型仅适用于：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-9489">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-9490">数据丢失防护策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-9490">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-9491">通信合规性策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-9491">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-9492">信息治理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-9492">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-9493">记录管理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-9493">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-9494">Microsoft 云应用安全</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-9494">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-9495">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-9495">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="088e4-9496">包含可选反反杠的九个或十个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-9496">nine or ten digits containing optional backslash</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-9497">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-9497">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-9498">六个数字，表示出生日期</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-9498">six digits representing date of birth</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-9499">可选斜杠 (/) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-9499">optional slash (/)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-9500">三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-9500">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-9501">一个可选检查数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-9501">one optional check digit</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-9502">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-9502">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="088e4-9503">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-9503">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-9504">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-9504">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="088e4-9505">在 300 个字符的邻近度内，DLP 策略可高可信度地检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-9505">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-9506">该  `Func_slovakia_eu_national_id_card` 函数查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-9506">The function  `Func_slovakia_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-9507">找到一个  `Keywords_slovakia_eu_national_id_card` 关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-9507">A keyword from  `Keywords_slovakia_eu_national_id_card` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="088e4-9508">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，置信度较低：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-9508">A DLP policy has low confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-9509">该  `Func_slovakia_eu_national_id_card` 函数查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-9509">The function  `Func_slovakia_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Slovakia Personal Number -->
      <Entity id="951c26b7-3b35-4f73-924b-15dd599cb9ab" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_slovakia_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_slovakia_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_slovakia_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
    </Version>
```

## <a name="slovakia-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-9556">斯洛伐克护照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-9556">Slovakia passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-9557">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-9557">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="088e4-9558">一个数字或字母后跟七个数字，没有空格或分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-9558">one digit or letter followed by seven digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-9559">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-9559">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="088e4-9560">一个数字或字母 (不区分大小写) 后跟七个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-9560">one digit or letter (not case-sensitive) followed by seven digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-9561">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-9561">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="088e4-9562">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-9562">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-9563">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-9563">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="088e4-9564">在 300 个字符的邻近度内，DLP 策略可高可信度地检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-9564">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-9565">正则表达式查找  `Regex_slovakia_eu_passport_number` 与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-9565">The regular expression  `Regex_slovakia_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-9566">找到或  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` 找到 `Keywords_slovakia_eu_passport_number` 的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-9566">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_slovakia_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-9567">正则表达式查找 `Regex_eu_passport_date1` DD.MM.YYYY 格式的日期或找到 `Keywords_eu_passport_date` 的关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-9567">The regular expression `Regex_eu_passport_date1` finds date in the format DD.MM.YYYY or a keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_date` is found</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="088e4-9568">在 300 个字符的邻近度内，DLP 策略具有中等可信度，即检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-9568">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-9569">正则表达式查找  `Regex_slovakia_eu_passport_number` 与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-9569">The regular expression  `Regex_slovakia_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-9570">找到或  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` 找到 `Keywords_slovakia_eu_passport_number` 的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-9570">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_slovakia_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Slovakia Passport Number -->
      <Entity id="238e1f08-d80e-4793-af33-9b57918335b7" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_slovakia_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_slovakia_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Regex_eu_passport_date1" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_date" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_slovakia_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_slovakia_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="slovenia-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-9592">斯洛文尼亚驾驶证号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-9592">Slovenia driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-9593">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-9593">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="088e4-9594">不带空格和分隔符的九个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-9594">nine digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-9595">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-9595">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="088e4-9596">九个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-9596">nine digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-9597">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-9597">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="088e4-9598">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-9598">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-9599">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-9599">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="088e4-9600">在 300 个字符的邻近度内，DLP 策略具有中等可信度，即检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-9600">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-9601">正则表达式查找  `Regex_slovenia_eu_driver's_license_number` 与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-9601">The regular expression  `Regex_slovenia_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-9602">找到或  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` 找到 `Keywords_slovenia_eu_driver's_license_number` 的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-9602">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_slovenia_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Slovenia Driver's License Number -->
      <Entity id="d5bc089a-f2ee-433d-a6b1-5c253051d6f2" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_slovenia_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_slovenia_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-9605">driverlic</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-9605">driverlic</span></span>

## <a name="slovenia-unique-master-citizen-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-9729">斯洛文尼亚唯一主公民编号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-9729">Slovenia Unique Master Citizen Number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="088e4-9730">此敏感信息类型仅适用于：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-9730">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-9731">数据丢失防护策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-9731">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-9732">通信合规性策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-9732">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-9733">信息治理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-9733">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-9734">记录管理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-9734">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-9735">Microsoft 云应用安全</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-9735">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-9736">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-9736">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="088e4-9737">13 个数字，不带空格或分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-9737">13 digits without spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-9738">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-9738">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="088e4-9739">指定模式中的 13 个数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-9739">13 digits in the specified pattern:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-9740">与 DDMMLLL (日期对应的七个数字) 其中"LLL"对应于出生日期的最后三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-9740">seven digits that correspond to the birth date (DDMMLLL) where "LLL" corresponds to the last three digits of the birth year</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-9741">对应于出生日期"50"的两个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-9741">two digits that correspond to the area of birth "50"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-9742">三个数字，对应于同一天（男性为 (000-499）和 500-999（对于男性）的性别和序列号) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-9742">three digits that correspond to a combination of gender and serial number for persons born on the same day (000-499 for male and 500-999 for female)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-9743">一个检查数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-9743">one check digit</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-9744">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-9744">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="088e4-9745">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-9745">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-9746">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-9746">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="088e4-9747">在 300 个字符的邻近度内，DLP 策略可高可信度地检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-9747">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-9748">该  `Func_slovenia_eu_national_id_card` 函数查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-9748">The function  `Func_slovenia_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-9749">找到一个  `Keywords_slovenia_eu_national_id_card` 关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-9749">A keyword from  `Keywords_slovenia_eu_national_id_card` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="088e4-9750">在 300 个字符的邻近度内，DLP 策略具有中等可信度，即检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-9750">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-9751">该  `Func_slovenia_eu_national_id_card` 函数查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-9751">The function  `Func_slovenia_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Slovenia Unique Master Citizen Number -->
      <Entity id="68948b27-803d-41e4-adf1-13e05eb541bb" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_slovenia_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_slovenia_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_slovenia_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="slovenia-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-9779">斯洛文尼亚护照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-9779">Slovenia passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-9780">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-9780">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="088e4-9781">两个字母后跟七个数字，无空格或分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-9781">two letters followed by seven digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-9782">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-9782">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="088e4-9783">两个字母后跟七个数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-9783">two letters followed by seven digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-9784">字母"P"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-9784">the letter "P"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-9785">一个小写字母</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-9785">one uppercase letter</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-9786">七个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-9786">seven digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-9787">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-9787">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="088e4-9788">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-9788">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-9789">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-9789">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="088e4-9790">在 300 个字符的邻近度内，DLP 策略可高可信度地检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-9790">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-9791">正则表达式查找  `Regex_slovenia_eu_passport_number` 与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-9791">The regular expression  `Regex_slovenia_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-9792">找到或  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` 找到 `Keywords_slovenia_eu_passport_number` 的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-9792">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_slovenia_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-9793">正则表达式查找 `Regex_eu_passport_date1` DD.MM.YYYY 格式的日期或找到 `Keywords_eu_passport_date` 的关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-9793">The regular expression `Regex_eu_passport_date1` finds date in the format DD.MM.YYYY or a keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_date` is found</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="088e4-9794">在 300 个字符的邻近度内，DLP 策略具有中等可信度，即检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-9794">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-9795">正则表达式查找  `Regex_slovenia_eu_passport_number` 与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-9795">The regular expression  `Regex_slovenia_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-9796">找到或  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` 找到 `Keywords_slovenia_eu_passport_number` 的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-9796">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_slovenia_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Slovenia Passport Number -->
      <Entity id="235b7976-7bbe-4df5-bb40-08678e749d1a" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_slovenia_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_slovenia_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Regex_eu_passport_date1" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_date" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_slovenia_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_slovenia_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

#### <a name="keywords_slovenia_eu_passport_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-9809">Keywords_slovenia_eu_passport_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-9809">Keywords_slovenia_eu_passport_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-9810">以tevilka potnega lista</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-9810">številka potnega lista</span></span>

## <a name="slovenia-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-9819">斯洛文尼亚税务标识号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-9819">Slovenia tax identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="088e4-9820">此敏感信息类型仅适用于：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-9820">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-9821">数据丢失防护策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-9821">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-9822">通信合规性策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-9822">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-9823">信息治理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-9823">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-9824">记录管理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-9824">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-9825">Microsoft 云应用安全</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-9825">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-9826">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-9826">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="088e4-9827">八个数字，无空格或分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-9827">eight digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-9828">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-9828">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-9829">一个数字，从 1 到 9</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-9829">one digit from 1-9</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-9830">六个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-9830">six digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-9831">一个检查数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-9831">one check digit</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-9832">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-9832">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="088e4-9833">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-9833">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-9834">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-9834">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="088e4-9835">在 300 个字符的邻近度内，DLP 策略可高可信度地检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-9835">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-9836">该  `Func_slovenia_eu_tax_file_number` 函数查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-9836">The function  `Func_slovenia_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-9837">找到一个  `Keywords_slovenia_eu_tax_file_number` 关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-9837">A keyword from  `Keywords_slovenia_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="088e4-9838">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，置信度较低：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-9838">A DLP policy has low confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-9839">该  `Func_slovenia_eu_tax_file_number` 函数查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-9839">The function  `Func_slovenia_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Slovenia Tax Identification Number -->
      <Entity id="e47b071e-c352-4d70-8241-8c215ad65505" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_slovenia_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_slovenia_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_slovenia_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-9840">关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-9840">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keywords_slovenia_eu_tax_file_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-9841">Keywords_slovenia_eu_tax_file_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-9841">Keywords_slovenia_eu_tax_file_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-9842">dav-na 以tevilka</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-9842">davčna številka</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-9843">identifkacijska 0tevilka davka</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-9843">identifikacijska številka davka</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-9844">gamtevilka dav-ne datoatoatoe</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-9844">številka davčne datoteke</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-9845">tax file no</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-9845">tax file no</span></span>
