## <a name="south-africa-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-9863">南非标识号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-9863">South Africa identification number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-9864">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-9864">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="088e4-9865">13 个数字（可能包含空格）</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-9865">13 digits that may contain spaces</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-9866">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-9866">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="088e4-9867">13 个数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-9867">13 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-9868">YYMMDD 格式的六个数字，即出生日期</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-9868">six digits in the format YYMMDD, which are the date of birth</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-9869">四个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-9869">four digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-9870">单数字公民指示符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-9870">a single-digit citizenship indicator</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-9871">数字"8"或"9"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-9871">the digit "8" or "9"</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-9872">一个数字，即校验和数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-9872">one digit, which is a checksum digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-9873">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-9873">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="088e4-9874">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-9874">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-9875">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-9875">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="088e4-9876">在 300 个字符的邻近度内，DLP 策略可高可信度地检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-9876">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-9877">函数 Func_south_africa_identification_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-9877">The function Func_south_africa_identification_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-9878">找到 Keyword_south_africa_identification_number 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-9878">A keyword from Keyword_south_africa_identification_number is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-9879">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-9879">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- South Africa Identification Number -->
<Entity id="e2adf7cb-8ea6-4048-a2ed-d89eb65f2780" recommendedConfidence="85" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_south_africa_identification_number"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_south_africa_identification_number"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-9880">关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-9880">Keywords</span></span>
   
#### <a name="keyword_south_africa_identification_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-9881">Keyword_south_africa_identification_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-9881">Keyword_south_africa_identification_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-9883">ID</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-9883">ID</span></span>

## <a name="south-korea-resident-registration-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-9885">韩国居民注册号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-9885">South Korea resident registration number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-9886">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-9886">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="088e4-9887">13 个数字（包含连字符）</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-9887">13 digits containing a hyphen</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-9888">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-9888">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="088e4-9889">13 个数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-9889">13 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-9890">YYMMDD 格式的六个数字，即出生日期</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-9890">six digits in the format YYMMDD, which are the date of birth</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-9891">连字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-9891">a hyphen</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-9892">由世纪和性别确定的一个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-9892">one digit determined by the century and gender</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-9893">四位数的出生日期区域代码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-9893">four-digit region-of-birth code</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-9894">一个数字，用于区分前面数字完全相同的人</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-9894">one digit used to differentiate people for whom the preceding numbers are identical</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-9895">一个检查数字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-9895">a check digit.</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-9896">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-9896">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="088e4-9897">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-9897">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-9898">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-9898">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="088e4-9899">在 300 个字符的邻近度内，DLP 策略可高可信度地检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-9899">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-9900">函数 Func_south_korea_resident_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-9900">The function Func_south_korea_resident_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-9901">找到 Keyword_south_korea_resident_number 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-9901">A keyword from Keyword_south_korea_resident_number is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-9902">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-9902">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="088e4-9903">在 300 个字符的邻近度内，DLP 策略具有中等可信度，即检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-9903">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-9904">函数 Func_south_korea_resident_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-9904">The function Func_south_korea_resident_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-9905">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-9905">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- South Korea Resident Registration Number -->
<Entity id="5b802e18-ba80-44c4-bc83-bf2ad36ae36a" recommendedConfidence="85" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_south_korea_resident_number"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_south_korea_resident_number"/>
  </Pattern>
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_south_korea_resident_number"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-9906">关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-9906">Keywords</span></span>
   
#### <a name="keyword_south_korea_resident_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-9907">Keyword_south_korea_resident_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-9907">Keyword_south_korea_resident_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-9910">Jumin deungnok beonho</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-9910">Jumin deungnok beonho</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-9911">RRN</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-9911">RRN</span></span>

## <a name="spain-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-9913">西班牙驾驶证号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-9913">Spain driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-9914">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-9914">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="088e4-9915">八个数字后跟一个字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-9915">eight digits followed by one character</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-9916">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-9916">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="088e4-9917">八个数字后跟一个字符：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-9917">eight digits followed by one character:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-9918">八个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-9918">eight digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-9919">一个数字或字母 (不区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-9919">one digit or letter (not case-sensitive)</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-9920">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-9920">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="088e4-9921">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-9921">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-9922">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-9922">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="088e4-9923">在 300 个字符的邻近度内，DLP 策略可高可信度地检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-9923">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-9924">函数  `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen` 或 `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_foreigner` 查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-9924">The function  `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen` or `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_foreigner` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-9925">找到或  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` 找到 `Keywords_spain_eu_driver's_license_number` 的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-9925">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_spain_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 

<span data-ttu-id="088e4-9926">在 300 个字符的邻近度内，DLP 策略具有中等可信度，即检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-9926">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-9927">函数  `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen` 或 `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_foreigner` 查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-9927">The function  `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen` or `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_foreigner` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Spain Driver's License Number -->
      <Entity id="d5a82922-b501-4f40-8868-341321146aa2" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_spain_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_foreigner" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_spain_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_foreigner" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="spain-dni"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-10061">西班牙 DNI</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-10061">Spain DNI</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="088e4-10062">此敏感信息类型仅适用于：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-10062">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-10063">数据丢失防护策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-10063">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-10064">通信合规性策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-10064">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-10065">信息治理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-10065">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-10066">记录管理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-10066">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-10067">Microsoft 云应用安全</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-10067">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-10068">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-10068">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="088e4-10069">八个数字后跟一个字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-10069">eight digits followed by one character</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-10070">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-10070">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="088e4-10071">七个数字后跟一个字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-10071">seven digits followed by one character</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-10072">八个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-10072">eight digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-10073">可选空格或连字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-10073">An optional space or hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-10074">一个检查 (不区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-10074">one check letter (not case-sensitive)</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-10075">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-10075">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="088e4-10076">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-10076">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-10077">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-10077">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="088e4-10078">在 300 个字符的邻近度内，DLP 策略可高可信度地检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-10078">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-10079">函数  `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen` 或 `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_foreigner` 查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-10079">The function  `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen` or `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_foreigner` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-10080">找到一个  `Keywords_spain_eu_national_id_card"` 关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-10080">A keyword from  `Keywords_spain_eu_national_id_card"` is found.</span></span> 

<span data-ttu-id="088e4-10081">在 300 个字符的邻近度内，DLP 策略具有中等可信度，即检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-10081">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-10082">函数  `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen` 或 `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_foreigner` 查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-10082">The function  `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen` or `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_foreigner` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 

    
```xml
      <!-- Spain DNI -->
      <Entity id="8e6251b9-47b4-40e8-a42b-0f80876be192" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_spain_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_foreigner" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_spain_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_foreigner" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="spain-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-10106">西班牙护照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-10106">Spain passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-10107">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-10107">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="088e4-10108">字母和数字的八字符或九字符组合，无空格或分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-10108">an eight- or nine-character combination of letters and numbers with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-10109">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-10109">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="088e4-10110">字母和数字的八字符或九字符组合：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-10110">an eight- or nine-character combination of letters and numbers:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-10111">两个数字或字母</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-10111">two digits or letters</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-10112">一个数字或字母 (可选) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-10112">one digit or letter (optional)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-10113">六个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-10113">six digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-10114">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-10114">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="088e4-10115">不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-10115">Not applicable</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-10116">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-10116">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="088e4-10117">在 300 个字符的邻近度内，DLP 策略可高可信度地检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-10117">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-10118">正则表达式查找  `Regex_spain_eu_passport_number` 与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-10118">The regular expression  `Regex_spain_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-10119">找到或  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` 找到 `Keywords_spain_eu_passport_number` 的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-10119">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_spain_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-10120">正则表达式查找 `Regex_spain_eu_passport_date` DD-MM-YYYY 格式的日期或找到 `Keywords_eu_passport_date` 的关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-10120">The regular expression `Regex_spain_eu_passport_date` finds date in the format DD-MM-YYYY or a keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_date` is found</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="088e4-10121">在 300 个字符的邻近度内，DLP 策略具有中等可信度，即检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-10121">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-10122">正则表达式查找  `Regex_spain_eu_passport_number` 与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-10122">The regular expression  `Regex_spain_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-10123">找到或  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` 找到 `Keywords_spain_eu_passport_number` 的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-10123">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_spain_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span>
    
```xml
      <!-- Spain Passport Number -->
      <Entity id="d17a57de-9fa5-4e9f-85d3-85c26d89686e" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_spain_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_spain_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Regex_spain_eu_passport_date" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_date" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_spain_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_spain_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="spain-social-security-number-ssn"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-10152">西班牙社会保险号码 (SSN) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-10152">Spain social security number (SSN)</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="088e4-10153">此敏感信息类型实体包含在欧盟社会保险号或等效 ID 敏感信息类型中。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-10153">This sensitive information type entity is included in the EU Social Security Number or Equivalent ID sensitive information type.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="088e4-10154">它作为独立的敏感信息类型实体提供。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-10154">It's  available as a stand-alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-10155">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-10155">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="088e4-10156">11-12 个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-10156">11-12 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-10157">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-10157">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="088e4-10158">11-12 个数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-10158">11-12 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-10159">两个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-10159">two digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-10160">可选 (斜杠) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-10160">a forward slash (optional)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-10161">七到八个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-10161">seven to eight digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-10162">可选 (斜杠) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-10162">a forward slash (optional)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-10163">两个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-10163">two digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-10164">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-10164">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="088e4-10165">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-10165">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-10166">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-10166">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="088e4-10167">在 300 个字符的邻近度内，DLP 策略可高可信度地检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-10167">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-10168">函数 Func_spanish_social_security_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-10168">The function Func_spanish_social_security_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-10169">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-10169">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Spain SSN -->
<Entity id="5df987c0-8eae-4bce-ace7-b316347f3070" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_spanish_social_security_number" />
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-10170">关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-10170">Keywords</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="088e4-10171">无</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-10171">None</span></span>

## <a name="spain-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-10172">西班牙税务标识号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-10172">Spain tax identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="088e4-10173">此敏感信息类型仅适用于：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-10173">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-10174">数据丢失防护策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-10174">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-10175">通信合规性策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-10175">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-10176">信息治理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-10176">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-10177">记录管理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-10177">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-10178">Microsoft 云应用安全</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-10178">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-10179">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-10179">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="088e4-10180">指定模式中七个或八个数字以及一个或两个字母</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-10180">seven or eight digits and one or two letters in the specified pattern</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-10181">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-10181">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="088e4-10182">拥有西班牙国家身份证的西班牙自然人：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-10182">Spanish Natural Persons with a Spain National Identity Card:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-10183">八个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-10183">eight digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-10184">一个小写字母 (区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-10184">one uppercase letter (case-sensitive)</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="088e4-10185">没有西班牙国家身份证的非居民西班牙人</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-10185">Non-resident Spaniards without a Spain National Identity Card</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-10186">一个小写字母"L" (区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-10186">one uppercase letter "L" (case-sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-10187">七个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-10187">seven digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-10188">一个小写字母 (区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-10188">one uppercase letter (case-sensitive)</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="088e4-10189">没有西班牙国家身份证的 14 岁以下的儿童居民：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-10189">Resident Spaniards under the age of 14 years without a Spain National Identity Card:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-10190">一个小写字母"K" (区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-10190">one uppercase letter "K" (case-sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-10191">七个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-10191">seven digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-10192">一个小写字母 (区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-10192">one uppercase letter (case-sensitive)</span></span>
    
<span data-ttu-id="088e4-10193">具有一位用户标识号的百万美元</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-10193">Foreigners with a Foreigner's Identification Number</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-10194">一个区分大小写的大写字母"X"、"Y"或"Z" (区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-10194">one uppercase letter that is "X", "Y", or "Z" (case-sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-10195">七个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-10195">seven digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-10196">一个小写字母 (区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-10196">one uppercase letter (case-sensitive)</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="088e4-10197">没有一个百万的标识号的百万美元</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-10197">Foreigners without a Foreigner's Identification Number</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-10198">一个区分大小写的大写字母 ("M") </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-10198">one uppercase letter that is "M" (case-sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-10199">七个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-10199">seven digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-10200">一个小写字母 (区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-10200">one uppercase letter (case-sensitive)</span></span> 
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-10201">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-10201">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="088e4-10202">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-10202">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-10203">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-10203">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="088e4-10204">在 300 个字符的邻近度内，DLP 策略可高可信度地检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-10204">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-10205">函数  `Func_spain_eu_tax_file_number` 或 `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen` 查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-10205">The function  `Func_spain_eu_tax_file_number` or `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-10206">找到一个  `Keywords_spain_eu_tax_file_number` 关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-10206">A keyword from  `Keywords_spain_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="088e4-10207">在 300 个字符的邻近度内，DLP 策略具有中等可信度，即检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-10207">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-10208">函数  `Func_spain_eu_tax_file_number` 或 `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen` 查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-10208">The function  `Func_spain_eu_tax_file_number` or `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Spain Tax Identification Number -->
      <Entity id="10f0d113-b0e1-47dc-872a-a4f45b9376a3" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_spain_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_spain_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_spain_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_spain_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="sql-server-connection-string"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-10239">SQL Server连接字符串</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-10239">SQL Server connection string</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-10240">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-10240">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="088e4-10241">字符串"User Id"、"User ID"、"uid"或"UserId"后跟以下模式中列出的字符和字符串。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-10241">The string "User Id", "User ID", "uid", or "UserId" followed by the characters and strings outlined in the pattern below.</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-10242">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-10242">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-10243">字符串"User Id"、"User ID"、"uid"或"UserId"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-10243">the string "User Id", "User ID", "uid", or "UserId"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-10244">1-200 位小写字母或大写字母、数字、符号、特殊字符或空格之间的任意组合</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-10244">any combination of between 1-200 lower- or uppercase letters, digits, symbols, special characters, or spaces</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-10245">字符串"Password"或"pwd"，其中"pwd"的前面没有小写字母</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-10245">the string "Password" or "pwd" where "pwd" isn't preceded by a lowercase letter</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-10246">等号 (=) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-10246">an equal sign (=)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-10247">任何不是美元符号 ($) 的字符，百分比符号 (%) ，大于符号 (>) ，符号为 (@) ，引号 (") ，分号 (;) ，左大括号 ([) ，或左括号 ({) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-10247">any character that isn't a dollar sign ($), percent symbol (%), greater than symbol (>), at symbol (@), quotation mark ("), semicolon (;), left brace([), or left bracket ({)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-10248">不是分号 (;) 、正斜杠 (/) 或引号 (" ( 的任意组合) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-10248">any combination of 7-128 characters that are not a semicolon (;), forward slash (/), or quotation mark (")</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-10249">一个分号 (;) 或引号 (") </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-10249">a semicolon (;) or quotation mark (")</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-10250">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-10250">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="088e4-10251">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-10251">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-10252">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-10252">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="088e4-10253">在 300 个字符的邻近度内，DLP 策略可高可信度地检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-10253">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-10254">正则表达式CEP_Regex_SQLServerConnectionString查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-10254">The regular expression CEP_Regex_SQLServerConnectionString finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-10255">未找到CEP_GlobalFilter关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-10255">A keyword from CEP_GlobalFilter isn't found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-10256">正则表达式CEP_PasswordPlaceHolder找不到与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-10256">The regular expression CEP_PasswordPlaceHolder doesn't find content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-10257">正则表达式CEP_CommonExampleKeywords找不到与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-10257">The regular expression CEP_CommonExampleKeywords doesn't find content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```sql
<!---SQL Server Connection String>
<Entity id="e76b6205-d3cb-46f2-bd63-c90153f2f97d" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="CEP_Regex_SQLServerConnectionString" />
        <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="CEP_GlobalFilter" />
            <Match idRef="CEP_PasswordPlaceHolder" />
            <Match idRef="CEP_CommonExampleKeywords" />
        </Any>
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-10258">关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-10258">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="cep_globalfilter"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-10259">CEP_GlobalFilter</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-10259">CEP_GlobalFilter</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-10260">some-password</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-10260">some-password</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-10261">somepassword</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-10261">somepassword</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-10262">secretPassword</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-10262">secretPassword</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-10263">示例</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-10263">sample</span></span>

#### <a name="cep_passwordplaceholder"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-10264">CEP_PasswordPlaceHolder</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-10264">CEP_PasswordPlaceHolder</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="088e4-10265"> (请注意，从技术上说，此敏感信息类型通过使用正则表达式（而不是关键字列表）来标识这些关键字。) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-10265">(Note that technically, this sensitive information type identifies these keywords by using a regular expression, not a keyword list.)</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-10266">密码或 pwd 后跟 0-2 个空格、等号 (=) 、0-2 个空格和星号 (\*) -OR-</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-10266">Password or pwd followed by 0-2 spaces, an equal sign (=), 0-2 spaces, and an asterisk (\*) -OR-</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-10267">密码或 pwd 后跟：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-10267">Password or pwd followed by:</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="088e4-10268">等号 (=) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-10268">Equal sign (=)</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="088e4-10269">小于符号 (<) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-10269">Less than symbol (<)</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="088e4-10270">大写或小写字母、数字、星号 (\*) 、连字符 (-) 、下划线 (_) 或空格字符的 1-200 个字符的任意组合</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-10270">Any combination of 1-200 characters that are upper- or lowercase letters, digits, an asterisk (\*), hyphen (-), underline (_), or whitespace character</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="088e4-10271">大于符号 (>) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-10271">Greater than symbol (>)</span></span>

#### <a name="cep_commonexamplekeywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-10272">CEP_CommonExampleKeywords</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-10272">CEP_CommonExampleKeywords</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="088e4-10273"> (请注意，从技术上说，此敏感信息类型通过使用正则表达式（而不是关键字列表）来标识这些关键字。) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-10273">(Note that technically, this sensitive information type identifies these keywords by using a regular expression, not a keyword list.)</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-10274">contoso</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-10274">contoso</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-10275">fabrikam</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-10275">fabrikam</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-10276">northwind</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-10276">northwind</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-10277">沙盒</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-10277">sandbox</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-10278">onebox</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-10278">onebox</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-10279">localhost</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-10279">localhost</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-10280">127.0.0.1</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-10280">127.0.0.1</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-10283">s-int。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-10283">s-int.</span></span><!--no-hyperlink--><span data-ttu-id="088e4-10284">net</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-10284">net</span></span>

## <a name="sweden-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-10285">瑞典驾驶证号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-10285">Sweden driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-10286">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-10286">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="088e4-10287">包含连字符的十个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-10287">ten digits containing a hyphen</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-10288">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-10288">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="088e4-10289">包含连字符的十个数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-10289">ten digits containing a hyphen:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-10290">六个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-10290">six digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-10291">连字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-10291">a hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-10292">四个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-10292">four digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-10293">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-10293">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="088e4-10294">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-10294">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-10295">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-10295">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="088e4-10296">在 300 个字符的邻近度内，DLP 策略具有中等可信度，即检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-10296">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-10297">正则表达式查找  `Regex_sweden_eu_driver's_license_number` 与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-10297">The regular expression  `Regex_sweden_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-10298">找到或  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` 找到 `Keywords_sweden_eu_driver's_license_number` 的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-10298">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_sweden_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Sweden Driver's License Number -->
      <Entity id="70088720-90dd-47f5-805e-5525f3567391" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_sweden_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_sweden_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

-  <span data-ttu-id="088e4-10429">דריווערס דערלויבעניש</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-10429">דריווערס דערלויבעניש</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-10430">körkortsnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-10430">körkortsnummer</span></span>

## <a name="sweden-national-id"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-10431">瑞典国家/区 ID</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-10431">Sweden national ID</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-10432">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-10432">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="088e4-10433">10 个或 12 个数字和一个可选分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-10433">10 or 12 digits and an optional delimiter</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-10434">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-10434">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="088e4-10435">10 或 12 位数字和可选的分隔符：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-10435">10 or 12 digits and an optional delimiter:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-10436">两个数字 (可选) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-10436">two digits (optional)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-10437">采用日期格式 YYMMDD 的六位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-10437">Six digits in date format YYMMDD</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-10438">"-"或"+"分隔符 (可选) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-10438">delimiter of "-" or "+" (optional)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-10439">四个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-10439">four digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-10440">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-10440">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="088e4-10441">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-10441">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-10442">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-10442">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="088e4-10443">在 300 个字符的邻近度内，DLP 策略可高可信度地检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-10443">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-10444">该 `Func_swedish_national_identifier` 函数查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-10444">The function `Func_swedish_national_identifier` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-10445">找到一个 `Keywords_swedish_national_identifier` 关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-10445">A keyword from `Keywords_swedish_national_identifier` is found</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-10446">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-10446">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="088e4-10447">在 300 个字符的邻近度内，DLP 策略具有中等可信度，即检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-10447">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-10448">该 `Func_swedish_national_identifier` 函数查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-10448">The function `Func_swedish_national_identifier` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-10449">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-10449">The checksum passes.</span></span>


```xml
    <!-- Sweden National ID -->
    <Entity id="f69aaf40-79be-4fac-8f05-fd1910d272c8" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_swedish_national_identifier" />
        <Match idRef="Keywords_swedish_national_identifier" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_swedish_national_identifier" />
      </Pattern>
    </Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-10465">personnummer#</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-10465">personnummer#</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-10467">identteidentifikationsnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-10467">skatteidentifikationsnummer</span></span>
   
## <a name="sweden-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-10468">瑞典护照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-10468">Sweden passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="088e4-10469">此敏感信息类型实体包含在欧盟护照号码敏感信息类型中，并作为独立的敏感信息类型实体提供。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-10469">This sensitive information type entity is included in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type and is available as a stand alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-10470">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-10470">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="088e4-10471">八个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-10471">eight digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-10472">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-10472">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="088e4-10473">八个连续的数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-10473">eight consecutive digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-10474">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-10474">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="088e4-10475">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-10475">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-10476">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-10476">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="088e4-10477">在 300 个字符的邻近度内，DLP 策略具有中等可信度，即检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-10477">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-10478">正则表达式Regex_sweden_passport_number查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-10478">the regular expression Regex_sweden_passport_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-10479">下列情况之一为 true：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-10479">one of the following is true:</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="088e4-10480">找到搜索Keyword_passport关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-10480">a keyword from Keyword_passport is found.</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="088e4-10481">找到Keyword_sweden_passport关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-10481">a keyword from Keyword_sweden_passport is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Sweden Passport Number -->
<Entity id="ba4e7456-55a9-4d89-9140-c33673553526" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_sweden_passport_number" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_passport" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_sweden_passport" />
        </Any>
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="sweden-social-security-number-or-equivalent-identification"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-10512">瑞典社会保险号或等效标识</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-10512">Sweden social security number or equivalent identification</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="088e4-10513">此敏感信息类型实体仅在欧盟社会保险号或等效 ID 敏感信息类型中可用。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-10513">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Social Security Number or Equivalent ID sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-10514">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-10514">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="088e4-10515">12 个数字，不含空格和分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-10515">12 digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-10516">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-10516">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="088e4-10517">12 个数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-10517">12 digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-10518">对应于 YYYYMMDD (出生日期的八个数字) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-10518">eight digits that correspond to the birth date (YYYYMMDD)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-10519">三个数字，对应于一个序列号，其中：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-10519">three digits that correspond to a serial number where:</span></span> 
  - <span data-ttu-id="088e4-10520">序列号中的最后一个数字通过为男性分配奇数和偶数表示性别</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-10520">the last digit in the serial number indicates gender by the assignment of an odd number for male and an even number for female</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="088e4-10521">在 1990 之前，序列号的分配对应于该号码的承载人所位于的县。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-10521">Before 1990, the assignment of a serial number corresponded to the county where the bearer of the number was born.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="088e4-10522">或者 (在 1947 年 1 月 1 日根据税务记录) 在 1947 年 1 月 1 日之前 (特殊代码 (通常 9 作为) 第七个数字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-10522">Or (if born before 1947) where they had been living, according to tax records, on January 1, 1947, with a special code (usually 9 as the seventh digit) for immigrants.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-10523">一个检查数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-10523">one check digit</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-10524">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-10524">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="088e4-10525">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-10525">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-10526">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-10526">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="088e4-10527">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-10527">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-10528">该  `Func_sweden_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` 函数查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-10528">The function  `Func_sweden_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-10529">找到一个  `Keywords_sweden_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` 关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-10529">A keyword from  `Keywords_sweden_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="088e4-10530">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-10530">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-10531">该  `Func_sweden_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` 函数查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-10531">The function  `Func_sweden_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU SSN or Equivalent Number -->
<Entity id="d24e32a4-c0bb-4ba8-899d-6303b95742d9" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_sweden_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_sweden_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
        </Pattern> 
       <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_sweden_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
        </Pattern>      
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-10532">关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-10532">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keywords_sweden_eu_ssn_or_equivalent"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-10533">Keywords_sweden_eu_ssn_or_equivalent</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-10533">Keywords_sweden_eu_ssn_or_equivalent</span></span>

## <a name="sweden-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-10547">瑞典税务标识号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-10547">Sweden tax identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="088e4-10548">此敏感信息类型仅适用于：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-10548">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-10549">数据丢失防护策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-10549">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-10550">通信合规性策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-10550">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-10551">信息治理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-10551">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-10552">记录管理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-10552">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-10553">Microsoft 云应用安全</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-10553">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-10554">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-10554">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="088e4-10555">10 个数字和指定模式中的符号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-10555">10 digits and a symbol in the specified pattern</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-10556">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-10556">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="088e4-10557">10 个数字和一个符号：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-10557">10 digits and a symbol:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-10558">六个数字，对应于 YYMMDD (出生日期) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-10558">six digits that correspond to the birth date (YYMMDD)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-10559">加号或减号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-10559">a plus sign or minus sign</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-10560">使标识号唯一的三个数字，其中：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-10560">three digits that make the identification number unique where:</span></span> 
  - <span data-ttu-id="088e4-10561">对于 1990 之前颁发的数字，第七位和第八位标识出生日期或外种人</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-10561">for numbers issued before 1990, the seventh and eighth digit identify the county of birth or foreign-born people</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="088e4-10562">第九个位置的数字表示性别（对于男性或甚至对于男性）为奇数</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-10562">the digit in the ninth position indicates gender by either odd for male or even for female</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-10563">一个检查数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-10563">one check digit</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-10564">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-10564">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="088e4-10565">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-10565">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-10566">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-10566">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="088e4-10567">在 300 个字符的邻近度内，DLP 策略可高可信度地检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-10567">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-10568">该  `Func_sweden_eu_tax_file_number` 函数查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-10568">The function  `Func_sweden_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-10569">找到一个  `Keywords_sweden_eu_tax_file_number` 关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-10569">A keyword from  `Keywords_sweden_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="088e4-10570">在 300 个字符的邻近度内，DLP 策略具有中等可信度，即检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-10570">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-10571">该  `Func_sweden_eu_tax_file_number` 函数查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-10571">The function  `Func_sweden_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Sweden Tax Identification Number -->
      <Entity id="139acba0-a5bc-4fbb-876d-f7a493ae8a40" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_sweden_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_sweden_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_sweden_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_sweden_eu_telephone_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_sweden_eu_mobile_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="swift-code"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-10597">SWIFT 代码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-10597">SWIFT code</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-10598">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-10598">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="088e4-10599">四个字母后跟 5-31 个字母或数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-10599">four letters followed by 5-31 letters or digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-10600">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-10600">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="088e4-10601">四个字母后跟 5-31 个字母或数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-10601">four letters followed by 5-31 letters or digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-10602">四个字母银行 (不区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-10602">four-letter bank code (not case-sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-10603">可选空格</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-10603">an optional space</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-10604">4-28 个字母或数字（基本银行账号 (BBAN)）</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-10604">4-28 letters or digits (the Basic Bank Account Number (BBAN))</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-10605">可选空格</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-10605">an optional space</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-10606">BBAN 代码的剩余部分 (一到三个字母或) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-10606">one to three letters or digits (remainder of the BBAN)</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-10607">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-10607">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="088e4-10608">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-10608">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-10609">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-10609">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="088e4-10610">在 300 个字符的邻近度内，DLP 策略具有中等可信度，即检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-10610">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-10611">正则表达式 Regex_swift 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-10611">The regular expression Regex_swift finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-10612">找到 Keyword_swift 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-10612">A keyword from Keyword_swift is found.</span></span>

```xml
<Entity id="cb2ab58c-9cb8-4c81-baf8-a4e106791df4" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
<Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_swift" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_swift" />
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="switzerland-ssn-ahv-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-10649">瑞士 SSN AHV 号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-10649">Switzerland SSN AHV number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="088e4-10650">此敏感信息类型仅适用于：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-10650">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-10651">数据丢失防护策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-10651">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-10652">通信合规性策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-10652">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-10653">信息治理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-10653">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-10654">记录管理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-10654">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-10655">Microsoft 云应用安全</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-10655">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-10656">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-10656">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="088e4-10657">13 个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-10657">13 digit number</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-10658">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-10658">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="088e4-10659">13 个数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-10659">13 digit number:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-10660">三个数字 - 756</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-10660">three digits - 756</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-10661">可选点</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-10661">an optional dot</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-10662">四个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-10662">four digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-10663">可选点</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-10663">an optional dot</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-10664">四个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-10664">four digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-10665">可选点</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-10665">an optional dot</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-10666">两个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-10666">two digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-10667">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-10667">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="088e4-10668">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-10668">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-10669">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-10669">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="088e4-10670">在 300 个字符的邻近度内，DLP 策略可高可信度地检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-10670">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-10671">函数Func_swiss_social_security_number_ahv查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-10671">The function Func_swiss_social_security_number_ahv finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-10672">找到来自Keywords_swiss_social_security_number_ahv的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-10672">A keyword from Keywords_swiss_social_security_number_ahv is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="088e4-10673">在 300 个字符的邻近度内，DLP 策略具有中等可信度，即检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-10673">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-10674">函数Func_swiss_social_security_number_ahv查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-10674">The function Func_swiss_social_security_number_ahv finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Swiss SSN AHV Number -->
      <Entity id="277cfa4b-6eaa-4a1b-9492-099dec849971" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_swiss_social_security_number_ahv" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_swiss_social_security_number_ahv" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_swiss_social_security_number_ahv" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="taiwan-national-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-10695">台湾地区身份证号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-10695">Taiwan national identification number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-10696">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-10696">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="088e4-10697">一个字母 (英语) 后跟九个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-10697">one letter (in English) followed by nine digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-10698">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-10698">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="088e4-10699">一个字母 (英语) 后跟九个数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-10699">one letter (in English) followed by nine digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-10700">一个字母 (英语，不区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-10700">one letter (in English, not case-sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-10701">数字"1"或"2"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-10701">the digit "1" or "2"</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-10702">八个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-10702">eight digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-10703">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-10703">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="088e4-10704">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-10704">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-10705">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-10705">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="088e4-10706">在 300 个字符的邻近度内，DLP 策略可高可信度地检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-10706">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-10707">函数 Func_taiwanese_national_id 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-10707">The function Func_taiwanese_national_id finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-10708">找到 Keyword_taiwanese_national_id 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-10708">A keyword from Keyword_taiwanese_national_id is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-10709">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-10709">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="088e4-10710">在 300 个字符的邻近度内，DLP 策略具有中等可信度，即检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-10710">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-10711">函数 Func_taiwanese_national_id 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-10711">The function Func_taiwanese_national_id finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-10712">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-10712">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Taiwanese National ID -->
<Entity id="4C7BFC34-8DD1-421D-8FB7-6C6182C2AF03" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_taiwanese_national_id" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_taiwanese_national_id" />
      </Pattern>
       <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
         <IdMatch idRef="Func_taiwanese_national_id" />
       </Pattern>
</Entity>
```
