#### <a name="keyword_taiwan_national_id"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-10714">Keyword_taiwan_national_id</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-10714">Keyword_taiwan_national_id</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-10715">身份證字號</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-10715">身份證字號</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-10716">身份證</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-10716">身份證</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-10717">身份證號碼</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-10717">身份證號碼</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-10718">身份證號</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-10718">身份證號</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-10719">身分證字號</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-10719">身分證字號</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-10720">身分證</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-10720">身分證</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-10721">身分證號碼</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-10721">身分證號碼</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-10722">身份證號</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-10722">身份證號</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-10723">身分證統一編號</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-10723">身分證統一編號</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-10724">國民身分證統一編號</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-10724">國民身分證統一編號</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-10725">簽名</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-10725">簽名</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-10726">蓋章</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-10726">蓋章</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-10727">簽名或蓋章</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-10727">簽名或蓋章</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-10728">簽章</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-10728">簽章</span></span>   
   
## <a name="taiwan-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-10729">台湾护照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-10729">Taiwan passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-10730">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-10730">Format</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-10731">生物识别护照号码：九个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-10731">biometric passport number: nine digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-10732">非生物识别护照号码：九个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-10732">non-biometric passport number: nine digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-10733">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-10733">Pattern</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="088e4-10734">生物识别护照号：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-10734">biometric passport number:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-10735">字符"3"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-10735">the character "3"</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-10736">八个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-10736">eight digits</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="088e4-10737">非生物识别护照号码：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-10737">non-biometric passport number:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-10738">九个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-10738">nine digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-10739">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-10739">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="088e4-10740">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-10740">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-10741">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-10741">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="088e4-10742">在 300 个字符的邻近度内，DLP 策略具有中等可信度，即检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-10742">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-10743">正则表达式 Regex_taiwan_passport 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-10743">The regular expression Regex_taiwan_passport finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-10744">找到 Keyword_taiwan_passport 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-10744">A keyword from Keyword_taiwan_passport is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Taiwan Passport Number -->
<Entity id="e7251cb4-4c2c-41df-963e-924eb3dae04a" recommendedConfidence="75" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Regex_taiwan_passport"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_taiwan_passport"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-10745">关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-10745">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_taiwan_passport"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-10746">Keyword_taiwan_passport</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-10746">Keyword_taiwan_passport</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-10747">ROC passport number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-10747">ROC passport number</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-10748">Passport number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-10748">Passport number</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-10749">Passport no</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-10749">Passport no</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-10750">Passport Num</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-10750">Passport Num</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-10751">Passport #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-10751">Passport #</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-10752">护照</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-10752">护照</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-10753">中華民國護照</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-10753">中華民國護照</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-10754">Zhōnghuá Mínguó hùzhào</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-10754">Zhōnghuá Mínguó hùzhào</span></span>
   
## <a name="taiwan-resident-certificate-arctarc-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-10755">台湾居民证书 (ARC/TARC) 号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-10755">Taiwan resident certificate (ARC/TARC) number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-10756">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-10756">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="088e4-10757">10 letters and digits</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-10757">10 letters and digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-10758">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-10758">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="088e4-10759">10 个字母和数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-10759">10 letters and digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-10760">两个字母 (不区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-10760">two letters (not case-sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-10761">八个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-10761">eight digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-10762">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-10762">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="088e4-10763">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-10763">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-10764">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-10764">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="088e4-10765">在 300 个字符的邻近度内，DLP 策略具有中等可信度，即检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-10765">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-10766">正则表达式 Regex_taiwan_resident_certificate 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-10766">The regular expression Regex_taiwan_resident_certificate finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-10767">找到 Keyword_taiwan_resident_certificate 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-10767">A keyword from Keyword_taiwan_resident_certificate is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Taiwan Resident Certificate (ARC/TARC) -->
<Entity id="48269fec-05ea-46ea-b326-f5623a58c6e9" recommendedConfidence="75" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Regex_taiwan_resident_certificate"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_taiwan_resident_certificate"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="thai-population-identification-code"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-10781">泰语总体标识代码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-10781">Thai population identification code</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-10782">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-10782">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="088e4-10783">13 位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-10783">13 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-10784">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-10784">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="088e4-10785">13 个数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-10785">13 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-10786">第一个数字不为零或九</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-10786">first digit isn't zero or nine</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-10787">12 个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-10787">12 digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-10788">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-10788">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="088e4-10789">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-10789">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-10790">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-10790">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="088e4-10791">在 300 个字符的邻近度内，DLP 策略可高可信度地检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-10791">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-10792">函数Func_Thai_Citizen_Id查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-10792">The function Func_Thai_Citizen_Id finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-10793">找到来自Keyword_Thai_Citizen_Id关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-10793">A keyword from Keyword_Thai_Citizen_Id is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="088e4-10794">在 300 个字符的邻近度内，DLP 策略具有中等可信度，即检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-10794">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-10795">函数Func_Thai_Citizen_Id查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-10795">The function Func_Thai_Citizen_Id finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Thai Citizen ID -->
-<Entity id="44ca9e86-ead7-4c5d-884a-e2eaa401515e" recommendedConfidence="75" patternsProximity="300">
   -<Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
      <IdMatch idRef="Func_Thai_Citizen_Id"/>
      <Match idRef="Keyword_Thai_Citizen_Id"/>
   </Pattern>
   -<Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
      <IdMatch idRef="Func_Thai_Citizen_Id"/>
   </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-10800">บัตรประชาชน</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-10800">บัตรประชาชน</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-10801">รหัสบัตรประชาชน</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-10801">รหัสบัตรประชาชน</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-10802">บัตรประชาชน</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-10802">บัตรประชาชน</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-10803">รหัสบัตรประชาชน</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-10803">รหัสบัตรประชาชน</span></span>
  
## <a name="turkish-national-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-10804">土耳其国家标识号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-10804">Turkish national identification number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-10805">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-10805">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="088e4-10806">11 个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-10806">11 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-10807">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-10807">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="088e4-10808">11 个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-10808">11 digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-10809">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-10809">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="088e4-10810">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-10810">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-10811">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-10811">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="088e4-10812">在 300 个字符的邻近度内，DLP 策略可高可信度地检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-10812">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-10813">该函数Func_Turkish_National_Id查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-10813">The function Func_Turkish_National_Id finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-10814">找到搜索Keyword_Turkish_National_Id关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-10814">A keyword from Keyword_Turkish_National_Id is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="088e4-10815">在 300 个字符的邻近度内，DLP 策略具有中等可信度，即检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-10815">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-10816">该函数Func_Turkish_National_Id查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-10816">The function Func_Turkish_National_Id finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Turkish National Identity -->
-<Entity id="fb621f20-3876-4cfc-acec-8c8e73ca32c7" recommendedConfidence="75" patternsProximity="300">
   -<Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
      <IdMatch idRef="Func_Turkish_National_Id"/>
      <Match idRef="Keyword_Turkish_National_Id"/>
   </Pattern>
   -<Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
      <IdMatch idRef="Func_Turkish_National_Id"/>
   </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

#### <a name="keyword_turkish_national_id"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-10818">Keyword_turkish_national_id</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-10818">Keyword_turkish_national_id</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-10819">TC Kimkim No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-10819">TC Kimlik No</span></span>

## <a name="uk-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-10823">英国</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-10823">U.K.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="088e4-10824">driver's license number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-10824">driver's license number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="088e4-10825">此敏感信息类型实体包含在欧盟驾驶证号码敏感信息类型中。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-10825">This sensitive information type entity is included in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="088e4-10826">它作为独立的敏感信息类型实体提供。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-10826">It's available as a stand-alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-10827">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-10827">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="088e4-10828">特定格式的 18 个字母和数字组合</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-10828">Combination of 18 letters and digits in the specified format</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-10829">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-10829">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="088e4-10830">18 个字母和数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-10830">18 letters and digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-10831">五个字母 (不区分大小写) 或数字"9"来表示字母。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-10831">Five letters (not case-sensitive) or the digit "9" in place of a letter.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-10832">一个数字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-10832">One digit.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-10833">出生日期的日期格式 MMDDY 中的五个数字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-10833">Five digits in the date format MMDDY for date of birth.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="088e4-10834">如果驱动程序是男性，则第七个字符将递增 50;对于考试，51 到 62，而不是 01 到 12。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-10834">The seventh character is incremented by 50 if driver is female; for exampe, 51 to 62 instead of 01 to 12.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-10835">两个字母 (不区分大小写) 或数字"9"来表示字母。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-10835">Two letters (not case-sensitive) or the digit "9" in place of a letter.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-10836">五个数字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-10836">Five digits.</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-10837">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-10837">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="088e4-10838">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-10838">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-10839">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-10839">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="088e4-10840">在 300 个字符的邻近度内，DLP 策略具有中等可信度，即检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-10840">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-10841">函数 Func_uk_drivers_license 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-10841">The function Func_uk_drivers_license finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-10842">找到 Keyword_uk_drivers_license 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-10842">A keyword from Keyword_uk_drivers_license is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-10843">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-10843">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- U.K. Driver's License Number -->
<Entity id="f93de4be-d94c-40df-a8be-461738047551" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_uk_drivers_license" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_uk_drivers_license" />
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="uk-electoral-roll-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-10861">英国</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-10861">U.K.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="088e4-10862">roll roll number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-10862">electoral roll number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-10863">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-10863">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="088e4-10864">两个字母后跟 1-4 个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-10864">two letters followed by 1-4 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-10865">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-10865">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="088e4-10866">两个字母 (不区分大小写) 后跟 1-4 个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-10866">two letters (not case-sensitive) followed by 1-4 numbers</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-10867">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-10867">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="088e4-10868">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-10868">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-10869">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-10869">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="088e4-10870">在 300 个字符的邻近度内，DLP 策略具有中等可信度，即检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-10870">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-10871">正则表达式 Regex_uk_electoral 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-10871">The regular expression Regex_uk_electoral finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-10872">找到 Keyword_uk_electoral 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-10872">A keyword from Keyword_uk_electoral is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- U.K. Electoral Number -->
<Entity id="a3eea206-dc0c-4f06-9e22-aa1be3059963" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_uk_electoral" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_uk_electoral" />
        </Any>
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-10873">关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-10873">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_uk_electoral"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-10874">Keyword_uk_electoral</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-10874">Keyword_uk_electoral</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-10875">council nomination</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-10875">council nomination</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-10876">nomination form</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-10876">nomination form</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-10877">electoral register</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-10877">electoral register</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-10878">electoral roll</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-10878">electoral roll</span></span>

   
## <a name="uk-national-health-service-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-10879">英国</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-10879">U.K.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="088e4-10880">national health service number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-10880">national health service number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-10881">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-10881">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="088e4-10882">10-17 个数字，通过空格分隔 </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-10882">10-17 digits separated by spaces</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-10883">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-10883">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="088e4-10884">10-17 位数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-10884">10-17 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-10885">3 个或 10 个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-10885">either 3 or 10 digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-10886">空格</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-10886">a space</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-10887">三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-10887">three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-10888">空格</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-10888">a space</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-10889">四个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-10889">four digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-10890">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-10890">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="088e4-10891">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-10891">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-10892">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-10892">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="088e4-10893">在 300 个字符的邻近度内，DLP 策略可高可信度地检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-10893">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-10894">函数 Func_uk_nhs_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-10894">The function Func_uk_nhs_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-10895">下列其中一项为真：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-10895">One of the following is true:</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="088e4-10896">找到 Keyword_uk_nhs_number 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-10896">A keyword from Keyword_uk_nhs_number is found.</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="088e4-10897">找到 Keyword_uk_nhs_number1 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-10897">A keyword from Keyword_uk_nhs_number1 is found.</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="088e4-10898">找到 Keyword_uk_nhs_number_dob 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-10898">A keyword from Keyword_uk_nhs_number_dob is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-10899">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-10899">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- U.K. NHS Number -->
<Entity id="3192014e-2a16-44e9-aa69-4b20375c9a78" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_uk_nhs_number" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_uk_nhs_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_uk_nhs_number1" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_uk_nhs_number_dob" />
        </Any>
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

#### <a name="keyword_uk_nhs_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-10901">Keyword_uk_nhs_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-10901">Keyword_uk_nhs_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-10902">national health service</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-10902">national health service</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-10903">nhs</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-10903">nhs</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-10904">health services authority</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-10904">health services authority</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-10905">health authority</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-10905">health authority</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_uk_nhs_number1"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-10906">Keyword_uk_nhs_number1</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-10906">Keyword_uk_nhs_number1</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-10907">patient id</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-10907">patient id</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-10908">patient identification</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-10908">patient identification</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-10909">patient no</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-10909">patient no</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-10910">patient number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-10910">patient number</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_uk_nhs_number_dob"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-10911">Keyword_uk_nhs_number_dob</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-10911">Keyword_uk_nhs_number_dob</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-10912">GP</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-10912">GP</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-10913">DOB</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-10913">DOB</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-10914">D.O.B</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-10914">D.O.B</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-10915">Date of Birth</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-10915">Date of Birth</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-10916">Birth Date</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-10916">Birth Date</span></span> 
   
## <a name="uk-national-insurance-number-nino"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-10917">英国</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-10917">U.K.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="088e4-10918">NINO 国家/ (号码) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-10918">national insurance number (NINO)</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="088e4-10919">此敏感信息类型实体包含在欧盟国家标识号敏感信息类型中。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-10919">This sensitive information type entity is included in the EU National Identification Number sensitive information type.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="088e4-10920">它作为独立的敏感信息类型实体提供。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-10920">It's available as a stand-alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-10921">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-10921">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="088e4-10922">七个字符或九个字符，用空格或短划线分隔</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-10922">seven characters or nine characters separated by spaces or dashes</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-10923">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-10923">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="088e4-10924">两种可能的模式：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-10924">two possible patterns:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-10925">两个字母 (有效 NINOs 仅使用此前缀中的某些字符，此模式将对此进行验证;不区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-10925">two letters (valid NINOs use only certain characters in this prefix, which this pattern validates; not case-sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-10926">六个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-10926">six digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-10927">"A"、"B"、"C"或"D" (类似前缀，后缀中只允许某些字符;不区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-10927">either 'A', 'B', 'C', or 'D' (like the prefix, only certain characters are allowed in the suffix; not case-sensitive)</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="088e4-10928">或</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-10928">OR</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-10929">两个字母</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-10929">two letters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-10930">空格或短划线</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-10930">a space or dash</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-10931">两个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-10931">two digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-10932">空格或短划线</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-10932">a space or dash</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-10933">两个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-10933">two digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-10934">空格或短划线</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-10934">a space or dash</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-10935">两个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-10935">two digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-10936">空格或短划线</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-10936">a space or dash</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-10937">"A"、"B"、"C"或"D"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-10937">either 'A', 'B', 'C', or 'D'</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-10938">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-10938">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="088e4-10939">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-10939">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-10940">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-10940">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="088e4-10941">在 300 个字符的邻近度内，DLP 策略可高可信度地检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-10941">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-10942">函数 Func_uk_nino 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-10942">The function Func_uk_nino finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-10943">找到 Keyword_uk_nino 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-10943">A keyword from Keyword_uk_nino is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="088e4-10944">在 300 个字符的邻近度内，DLP 策略具有中等可信度，即检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-10944">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-10945">函数 Func_uk_nino 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-10945">The function Func_uk_nino finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
    <!-- U.K. NINO -->
    <Entity id="16c07343-c26f-49d2-a987-3daf717e94cc" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75" relaxProximity="true">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_uk_nino" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_uk_nino" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_uk_nino" />
      </Pattern>
    </Entity>
```

## <a name="uk-unique-taxpayer-reference-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-10967">英国</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-10967">U.K.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="088e4-10968">唯一的税务参考编号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-10968">Unique Taxpayer Reference Number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="088e4-10969">此敏感信息类型仅适用于：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-10969">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-10970">数据丢失防护策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-10970">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-10971">通信合规性策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-10971">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-10972">信息治理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-10972">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-10973">记录管理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-10973">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-10974">Microsoft 云应用安全</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-10974">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-10975">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-10975">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="088e4-10976">10 个数字，不带空格和分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-10976">10 digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
 
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-10977">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-10977">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="088e4-10978">10 个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-10978">10 digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-10979">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-10979">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="088e4-10980">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-10980">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-10981">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-10981">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="088e4-10982">在 300 个字符的邻近度内，DLP 策略具有中等可信度，即检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-10982">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-10983">该  `Func_uk_eu_tax_file_number` 函数查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-10983">The function  `Func_uk_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-10984">找到一个  `Keywords_uk_eu_tax_file_number` 关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-10984">A keyword from  `Keywords_uk_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- U.K. Unique Taxpayer Reference Number -->
      <Entity id="ad4a8116-0db8-439a-b545-6d967642f0ec" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_uk_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_uk_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="us-bank-account-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-11004">美国银行帐号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-11004">U.S. bank account number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-11005">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-11005">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="088e4-11006">6-17 个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-11006">6-17 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-11007">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-11007">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="088e4-11008">6-17 个连续的数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-11008">6-17 consecutive digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-11009">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-11009">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="088e4-11010">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-11010">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-11011">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-11011">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="088e4-11012">在 300 个字符的邻近度内，DLP 策略具有中等可信度，即检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-11012">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-11013">正则表达式 Regex_usa_bank_account_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-11013">The regular expression Regex_usa_bank_account_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-11014">找到 Keyword_usa_Bank_Account 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-11014">A keyword from Keyword_usa_Bank_Account is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- U.S. Bank Account Number -->
<Entity id="a2ce32a8-f935-4bb6-8e96-2a5157672e2c" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_usa_bank_account_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_usa_Bank_Account" />
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="us-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-11044">美国驾驶证号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-11044">U.S. driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-11045">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-11045">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="088e4-11046">取决于州</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-11046">Depends on the state</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-11047">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-11047">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="088e4-11048">取决于州 -例如，纽约：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-11048">depends on the state - for example, New York:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-11049">9 个数字，格式设置为 ddd ddd ddd 将匹配。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-11049">nine digits formatted like ddd ddd ddd will match.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-11050">九位数字（如 dddddddddd）不匹配。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-11050">nine digits like ddddddddd will not match.</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-11051">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-11051">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="088e4-11052">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-11052">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-11053">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-11053">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="088e4-11054">在 300 个字符的邻近度内，DLP 策略具有中等可信度，即检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-11054">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-11055">函数 Func_new_york_drivers_license_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-11055">The function Func_new_york_drivers_license_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-11056">找到 Keyword_[state_name]_drivers_license_name 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-11056">A keyword from Keyword_[state_name]_drivers_license_name is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-11057">找到 Keyword_us_drivers_license 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-11057">A keyword from Keyword_us_drivers_license is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="088e4-11058">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，置信度较低：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-11058">A DLP policy has low confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-11059">函数 Func_new_york_drivers_license_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-11059">The function Func_new_york_drivers_license_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-11060">找到 Keyword_[state_name]_drivers_license_name 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-11060">A keyword from Keyword_[state_name]_drivers_license_name is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-11061">找到 Keyword_us_drivers_license_abbreviations 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-11061">A keyword from Keyword_us_drivers_license_abbreviations is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-11062">未找到 Keyword_us_drivers_license 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-11062">No keyword from Keyword_us_drivers_license is found.</span></span>

```xml
<Entity id="dfeb356f-61cd-459e-bf0f-7c6d28b458c6 patternsProximity="300">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_new_york_drivers_license_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_new_york_drivers_license_name" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_us_drivers_license" />
    </Pattern>
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_new_york_drivers_license_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_new_york_drivers_license_name" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_us_drivers_license_abbreviations" />
        <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_us_drivers_license" />
        </Any>
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="us-individual-taxpayer-identification-number-itin"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-11160">美国个人纳税标识号 (ITIN) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-11160">U.S. individual taxpayer identification number (ITIN)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-11161">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-11161">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="088e4-11162">九个数字，以"9"开头，包含"7"或"8"作为第四个数字，可选格式为空格或短划线</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-11162">nine digits that start with a "9" and contain a "7" or "8" as the fourth digit, optionally formatted with spaces or dashes</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-11163">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-11163">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="088e4-11164">格式化：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-11164">formatted:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-11165">数字"9"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-11165">the digit "9"</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-11166">两个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-11166">two digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-11167">空格或短划线</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-11167">a space or dash</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-11168">a "7" or "8"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-11168">a "7" or "8"</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-11169">一个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-11169">a digit</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-11170">空格或短划线</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-11170">a space, or dash</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-11171">四个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-11171">four digits</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="088e4-11172">unformatted：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-11172">unformatted:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-11173">数字"9"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-11173">the digit "9"</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-11174">两个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-11174">two digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-11175">a "7" or "8"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-11175">a "7" or "8"</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-11176">五个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-11176">five digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-11177">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-11177">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="088e4-11178">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-11178">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-11179">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-11179">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="088e4-11180">在 300 个字符的邻近度内，DLP 策略可高可信度地检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-11180">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-11181">函数 Func_formatted_itin 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-11181">The function Func_formatted_itin finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-11182">找到 Keyword_itin 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-11182">A keyword from Keyword_itin is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="088e4-11183">在 300 个字符的邻近度内，DLP 策略具有中等可信度，即检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-11183">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-11184">函数 Func_unformatted_itin 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-11184">The function Func_unformatted_itin finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-11185">找到 Keyword_itin 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-11185">A keyword from Keyword_itin is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="088e4-11186">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，置信度较低：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-11186">A DLP policy has low confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-11187">该函数Func_formatted_itin或Func_unformatted_itin找到与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-11187">The function Func_formatted_itin or Func_unformatted_itin finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
    <!-- U.S. Individual Taxpayer Identification Number (ITIN) -->
    <Entity id="e55e2a32-f92d-4985-a35d-a0b269eb687b" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_formatted_itin" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_itin" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_unformatted_itin" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_itin" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_formatted_itin" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_unformatted_itin" />
      </Pattern>
    </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-11188">关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-11188">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_itin"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-11189">Keyword_itin</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-11189">Keyword_itin</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-11192">tax identification</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-11192">tax identification</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-11193">itin</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-11193">itin</span></span>

## <a name="us-social-security-number-ssn"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-11202">SSN (美国社会保险号码) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-11202">U.S. social security number (SSN)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-11203">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-11203">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="088e4-11204">九个数字，可能采用格式化或无格式模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-11204">nine digits, which may be in a formatted or unformatted pattern</span></span>

> [!NOTE]
> <span data-ttu-id="088e4-11205">如果在 2011 年中旬前发布，则 SSN 具有强格式，即数字的某部分必须介于某个有效的范围中（但是没有校验和）。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-11205">If issued before mid-2011, an SSN has strong formatting where certain parts of the number must fall within certain ranges to be valid (but there's no checksum).</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-11206">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-11206">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="088e4-11207">四个函数以四种不同的模式查找 SSN：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-11207">four functions look for SSNs in four different patterns:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-11208">Func_ssn 查找具有 2011 年以前使用短划线或空格格式化的强格式的 SSN（ddd-dd-dddd 或 ddd dd dddd）</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-11208">Func_ssn finds SSNs with pre-2011 strong formatting that are formatted with dashes or spaces (ddd-dd-dddd OR ddd dd dddd)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-11209">Func_unformatted_ssn 查找具有 2011 年以前未格式化为 9 个连续数字的强格式的 SSN (ddddddddd)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-11209">Func_unformatted_ssn finds SSNs with pre-2011 strong formatting that are unformatted as nine consecutive digits (ddddddddd)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-11210">Func_randomized_formatted_ssn 查找 2011 年后使用短划线或空格（ddd-dd-dddd 或 ddd dd dddd）格式化的 SSN</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-11210">Func_randomized_formatted_ssn finds post-2011 SSNs that are formatted with dashes or spaces (ddd-dd-dddd OR ddd dd dddd)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-11211">Func_randomized_unformatted_ssn 查找 2011 年后未格式化为 9 个连续数字 (ddddddddd) 的 SSN</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-11211">Func_randomized_unformatted_ssn finds post-2011 SSNs that are unformatted as nine consecutive digits (ddddddddd)</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-11212">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-11212">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="088e4-11213">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-11213">No</span></span>


### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-11214">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-11214">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="088e4-11215">在 300 个字符的邻近度内，DLP 策略可高可信度地检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-11215">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-11216">函数 Func_ssn 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-11216">The function Func_ssn finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-11217">找到 Keyword_ssn 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-11217">A keyword from Keyword_ssn is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="088e4-11218">在 300 个字符的邻近度内，DLP 策略具有中等可信度，即检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-11218">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-11219">函数 Func_unformatted_ssn 查找与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-11219">The function Func_unformatted_ssn finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-11220">找到 Keyword_ssn 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-11220">A keyword from Keyword_ssn is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="088e4-11221">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，置信度较低：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-11221">A DLP policy has low confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-11222">函数 Func_randomized_formatted_ssn 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-11222">The function Func_randomized_formatted_ssn finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-11223">找到 Keyword_ssn 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-11223">A keyword from Keyword_ssn is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="088e4-11224">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 55% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-11224">A DLP policy is 55% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-11225">函数 Func_randomized_unformatted_ssn 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-11225">The function Func_randomized_unformatted_ssn finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-11226">找到 Keyword_ssn 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-11226">A keyword from Keyword_ssn is found.</span></span>


```xml
<!-- U.S. Social Security Number (SSN) -->
  <Entity id="a44669fe-0d48-453d-a9b1-2cc83f2cba77" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_ssn" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_ssn" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_unformatted_ssn" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_ssn" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_randomized_formatted_ssn" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_ssn" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="55">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_randomized_unformatted_ssn" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_ssn" />
      </Pattern>
  </Entity>
```

## <a name="us--uk-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-11241">美国/英国</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-11241">U.S. / U.K.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="088e4-11242">passport number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-11242">passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="088e4-11243">英国</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-11243">The U.K.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="088e4-11244">passport number sensitive information type entity is available in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-11244">passport number sensitive information type entity is available in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="088e4-11245">它作为独立的敏感信息类型实体提供。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-11245">It's available as a stand-alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-11246">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-11246">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="088e4-11247">九个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-11247">nine digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-11248">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-11248">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="088e4-11249">九个连续的数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-11249">nine consecutive digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-11250">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-11250">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="088e4-11251">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-11251">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-11252">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-11252">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="088e4-11253">在 300 个字符的邻近度内，DLP 策略具有中等可信度，即检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-11253">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-11254">函数 Func_usa_uk_passport 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-11254">The function Func_usa_uk_passport finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-11255">找到 Keyword_passport 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-11255">A keyword from Keyword_passport is found.</span></span>

```xml
<Entity id="178ec42a-18b4-47cc-85c7-d62c92fd67f8" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_usa_uk_passport" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_passport" />
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="ukraine-passport-domestic"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-11276">乌克兰护照国内</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-11276">Ukraine passport domestic</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="088e4-11277">此敏感信息类型仅适用于：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-11277">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-11278">数据丢失防护策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-11278">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-11279">通信合规性策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-11279">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-11280">信息治理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-11280">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-11281">记录管理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-11281">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-11282">Microsoft 云应用安全</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-11282">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-11283">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-11283">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="088e4-11284">九个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-11284">nine digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-11285">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-11285">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="088e4-11286">九个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-11286">nine digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-11287">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-11287">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="088e4-11288">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-11288">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-11289">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-11289">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="088e4-11290">在 300 个字符的邻近度内，DLP 策略具有中等可信度，即检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-11290">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-11291">正则表达式Regex_Ukraine_Passport_Domestic查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-11291">The regex Regex_Ukraine_Passport_Domestic finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-11292">找到来自Keyword_Ukraine_Passport_Domestic的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-11292">A keyword from Keyword_Ukraine_Passport_Domestic is found.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Ukraine Passport Domestic -->
      <Entity id="1817a540-221f-4459-9202-3bd78b81d803" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_Ukraine_Passport_Domestic"/>
          <Match idRef="Keyword_Ukraine_Passport_Domestic"/>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="ukraine-passport-international"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-11301">乌克兰护照国际</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-11301">Ukraine passport international</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="088e4-11302">此敏感信息类型仅适用于：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-11302">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-11303">数据丢失防护策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-11303">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-11304">通信合规性策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-11304">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-11305">信息治理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-11305">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-11306">记录管理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-11306">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-11307">Microsoft 云应用安全</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-11307">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-11308">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-11308">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="088e4-11309">八字符字母数字模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-11309">eight-character alphanumeric pattern</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-11310">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-11310">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="088e4-11311">八字符字母数字模式：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-11311">eight-character alphanumeric pattern:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-11312">两个字母或数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-11312">two letters or digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-11313">六个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-11313">six digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-11314">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-11314">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="088e4-11315">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-11315">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="088e4-11316">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-11316">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="088e4-11317">在 300 个字符的邻近度内，DLP 策略具有中等可信度，即检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-11317">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-11318">正则表达式Regex_Ukraine_Passport_International查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-11318">The regex Regex_Ukraine_Passport_International finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="088e4-11319">找到来自Keyword_Ukraine_Passport_International的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="088e4-11319">A keyword from Keyword_Ukraine_Passport_International is found.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Ukraine Passport International -->
      <Entity id="cfbe032d-22e0-4f28-ab68-d66e9641f1e2" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_Ukraine_Passport_International"/>
          <Match idRef="Keyword_Ukraine_Passport_International"/>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```
